gveda RVa agnim īḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam RVc hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam RVa agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta RVc sa devāṃ eha vakṣati RVa agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive RVc yaśasaṃ vīravattamam RVa agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi RVc sa id deveṣu gacchati RVa agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ RVc devo devebhir ā gamat RVa yad aṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi RVc tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ RVa upa tvāgne divedive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam RVc namo bharanta emasi RVa rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim RVc vardhamānaṃ sve dame RVa sa naḥ piteva sūnave gne sūpāyano bhava RVc sacasvā naḥ svastaye RVa vāyav ā yāhi darśateme somā araṅkṛtāḥ RVc teṣām pāhi śrudhī havam RVa vāya ukthebhir jarante tvām acchā jaritāraḥ RVc sutasomā aharvidaḥ RVa vāyo tava prapṛñcatī dhenā jigāti dāśuṣe RVc urūcī somapītaye RVa indravāyū ime sutā upa prayobhir ā gatam RVc indavo vām uśanti hi RVa vāyav indraś ca cetathaḥ sutānāṃ vājinīvasū RVc tāv ā yātam upa dravat RVa vāyav indraś ca sunvata ā yātam upa niṣkṛtam RVc makṣv itthā dhiyā narā RVa mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣaṃ varuṇaṃ ca riśādasam RVc dhiyaṃ ghṛtācīṃ sādhantā RVa ṛtena mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvṛdhāv ṛtaspṛśā RVc kratum bṛhantam āśāthe RVa kavī no mitrāvaruṇā tuvijātā urukṣayā RVc dakṣaṃ dadhāte apasam RVa aśvinā yajvarīr iṣo dravatpāṇī śubhas patī RVc purubhujā canasyatam RVa aśvinā purudaṃsasā narā śavīrayā dhiyā RVc dhiṣṇyā vanataṃ giraḥ RVa dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutā nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ RVc ā yātaṃ rudravartanī RVa indrā yāhi citrabhāno sutā ime tvāyavaḥ RVc aṇvībhis tanā pūtāsaḥ RVa indrā yāhi dhiyeṣito viprajūtaḥ sutāvataḥ RVc upa brahmāṇi vāghataḥ RVa indrā yāhi tūtujāna upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ RVc sute dadhiṣva naś canaḥ RVa omāsaś carṣaṇīdhṛto viśve devāsa ā gata RVc dāśvāṃso dāśuṣaḥ sutam RVa viśve devāso apturaḥ sutam ā ganta tūrṇayaḥ RVc usrā iva svasarāṇi RVa viśve devāso asridha ehimāyāso adruhaḥ RVc medhaṃ juṣanta vahnayaḥ RVa pāvakā naḥ sarasvatī vājebhir vājinīvatī RVc yajñaṃ vaṣṭu dhiyāvasuḥ RVa codayitrī sūnṛtānāṃ cetantī sumatīnām RVc yajñaṃ dadhe sarasvatī RVa maho arṇaḥ sarasvatī pra cetayati ketunā RVc dhiyo viśvā vi rājati RVa surūpakṛtnum ūtaye sudughām iva goduhe RVc juhūmasi dyavidyavi RVa upa naḥ savanā gahi somasya somapāḥ piba RVc godā id revato madaḥ RVa athā te antamānāṃ vidyāma sumatīnām RVc mā no ati khya ā gahi RVa parehi vigram astṛtam indram pṛcchā vipaścitam RVc yas te sakhibhya ā varam RVa uta bruvantu no nido nir anyataś cid ārata RVc dadhānā indra id duvaḥ RVa uta naḥ subhagāṃ arir voceyur dasma kṛṣṭayaḥ RVc syāmed indrasya śarmaṇi RVa em āśum āśave bhara yajñaśriyaṃ nṛmādanam RVc patayan mandayatsakham RVa asya pītvā śatakrato ghano vṛtrāṇām abhavaḥ RVc prāvo vājeṣu vājinam RVa taṃ tvā vājeṣu vājinaṃ vājayāmaḥ śatakrato RVc dhanānām indra sātaye RVa yo rāyo vanir mahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā RVc tasmā indrāya gāyata RVa ā tv etā ni ṣīdatendram abhi pra gāyata RVc sakhāya stomavāhasaḥ RVa purūtamam purūṇām īśānaṃ vāryāṇām RVc indraṃ some sacā sute RVa sa ghā no yoga ā bhuvat sa rāye sa purandhyām RVc gamad vājebhir ā sa naḥ RVa yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate harī samatsu śatravaḥ RVc tasmā indrāya gāyata RVa sutapāvne sutā ime śucayo yanti vītaye RVc somāso dadhyāśiraḥ RVa tvaṃ sutasya pītaye sadyo vṛddho ajāyathāḥ RVc indra jyaiṣṭhyāya sukrato RVa ā tvā viśantv āśavaḥ somāsa indra girvaṇaḥ RVc śaṃ te santu pracetase RVa tvāṃ stomā avīvṛdhan tvām ukthā śatakrato RVc tvāṃ vardhantu no giraḥ RVa akṣitotiḥ saned imaṃ vājam indraḥ sahasriṇam RVc yasmin viśvāni pauṃsyā RVa mā no martā abhi druhan tanūnām indra girvaṇaḥ RVc īśāno yavayā vadham RVa yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣaṃ carantam pari tasthuṣaḥ RVc rocante rocanā divi RVa yuñjanty asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe RVc śoṇā dhṛṣṇū nṛvāhasā RVa ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketave peśo maryā apeśase RVc sam uṣadbhir ajāyathāḥ RVa ād aha svadhām anu punar garbhatvam erire RVc dadhānā nāma yajñiyam RVa vīḷu cid ārujatnubhir guhā cid indra vahnibhiḥ RVc avinda usriyā anu RVa devayanto yathā matim acchā vidadvasuṃ giraḥ RVc mahām anūṣata śrutam RVa indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase saṃjagmāno abibhyuṣā RVc mandū samānavarcasā RVa anavadyair abhidyubhir makhaḥ sahasvad arcati RVc gaṇair indrasya kāmyaiḥ RVa ataḥ parijmann ā gahi divo vā rocanād adhi RVc sam asminn ṛñjate giraḥ RVa ito vā sātim īmahe divo vā pārthivād adhi RVc indram maho vā rajasaḥ RVa indram id gāthino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ RVc indraṃ vāṇīr anūṣata RVa indra id dharyoḥ sacā sammiśla ā vacoyujā RVc indro vajrī hiraṇyayaḥ RVa indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi RVc vi gobhir adrim airayat RVa indra vājeṣu no va sahasrapradhaneṣu ca RVc ugra ugrābhir ūtibhiḥ RVa indraṃ vayam mahādhana indram arbhe havāmahe RVc yujaṃ vṛtreṣu vajriṇam RVa sa no vṛṣann amuṃ caruṃ satrādāvann apā vṛdhi RVc asmabhyam apratiṣkutaḥ RVa tuñjetuñje ya uttare stomā indrasya vajriṇaḥ RVc na vindhe asya suṣṭutim RVa vṛṣā yūtheva vaṃsagaḥ kṛṣṭīr iyarty ojasā RVc īśāno apratiṣkutaḥ RVa ya ekaś carṣaṇīnāṃ vasūnām irajyati RVc indraḥ pañca kṣitīnām RVa indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ RVc asmākam astu kevalaḥ RVa endra sānasiṃ rayiṃ sajitvānaṃ sadāsaham RVc varṣiṣṭham ūtaye bhara RVa ni yena muṣṭihatyayā ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai RVc tvotāso ny arvatā RVa indra tvotāsa ā vayaṃ vajraṃ ghanā dadīmahi RVc jayema saṃ yudhi spṛdhaḥ RVa vayaṃ śūrebhir astṛbhir indra tvayā yujā vayam RVc sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ RVa mahāṃ indraḥ paraś ca nu mahitvam astu vajriṇe RVc dyaur na prathinā śavaḥ RVa samohe vā ya āśata naras tokasya sanitau RVc viprāso vā dhiyāyavaḥ RVa yaḥ kukṣiḥ somapātamaḥ samudra iva pinvate RVc urvīr āpo na kākudaḥ RVa evā hy asya sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī RVc pakvā śākhā na dāśuṣe RVa evā hi te vibhūtaya ūtaya indra māvate RVc sadyaś cit santi dāśuṣe RVa evā hy asya kāmyā stoma ukthaṃ ca śaṃsyā RVc indrāya somapītaye RVa indrehi matsy andhaso viśvebhiḥ somaparvabhiḥ RVc mahāṃ abhiṣṭir ojasā RVa em enaṃ sṛjatā sute mandim indrāya mandine RVc cakriṃ viśvāni cakraye RVa matsvā suśipra mandibhi stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇe RVc sacaiṣu savaneṣv ā RVa asṛgram indra te giraḥ prati tvām ud ahāsata RVc ajoṣā vṛṣabham patim RVa saṃ codaya citram arvāg rādha indra vareṇyam RVc asad it te vibhu prabhu RVa asmān su tatra codayendra rāye rabhasvataḥ RVc tuvidyumna yaśasvataḥ RVa saṃ gomad indra vājavad asme pṛthu śravo bṛhat RVc viśvāyur dhehy akṣitam RVa asme dhehi śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ sahasrasātamam RVc indra tā rathinīr iṣaḥ RVa vasor indraṃ vasupatiṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanta ṛgmiyam RVc homa gantāram ūtaye RVa sutesute nyokase bṛhad bṛhata ed ariḥ RVc indrāya śūṣam arcati RVa gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇo rcanty arkam arkiṇaḥ RVc brahmāṇas tvā śatakrata ud vaṃśam iva yemire RVa yat sānoḥ sānum āruhad bhūry aspaṣṭa kartvam RVc tad indro arthaṃ cetati yūthena vṛṣṇir ejati RVa yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣyaprā RVc athā na indra somapā girām upaśrutiṃ cara RVa ehi stomāṃ abhi svarābhi gṛṇīhy ā ruva RVc brahma ca no vaso sacendra yajñaṃ ca vardhaya RVa uktham indrāya śaṃsyaṃ vardhanam puruniṣṣidhe RVc śakro yathā suteṣu ṇo rāraṇat sakhyeṣu ca RVa tam it sakhitva īmahe taṃ rāye taṃ suvīrye RVc sa śakra uta naḥ śakad indro vasu dayamānaḥ RVa suvivṛtaṃ sunirajam indra tvādātam id yaśaḥ RVc gavām apa vrajaṃ vṛdhi kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ RVa nahi tvā rodasī ubhe ṛghāyamāṇam invataḥ RVc jeṣaḥ svarvatīr apaḥ saṃ gā asmabhyaṃ dhūnuhi RVa āśrutkarṇa śrudhī havaṃ nū cid dadhiṣva me giraḥ RVc indra stomam imam mama kṛṣvā yujaś cid antaram RVa vidmā hi tvā vṛṣantamaṃ vājeṣu havanaśrutam RVc vṛṣantamasya hūmaha ūtiṃ sahasrasātamām RVa ā tū na indra kauśika mandasānaḥ sutam piba RVc navyam āyuḥ pra sū tira kṛdhī sahasrasām ṛṣim RVa pari tvā girvaṇo gira imā bhavantu viśvataḥ RVc vṛddhāyum anu vṛddhayo juṣṭā bhavantu juṣṭayaḥ RVa indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhan samudravyacasaṃ giraḥ RVc rathītamaṃ rathīnāṃ vājānāṃ satpatim patim RVa sakhye ta indra vājino mā bhema śavasas pate RVc tvām abhi pra ṇonumo jetāram aparājitam RVa pūrvīr indrasya rātayo na vi dasyanty ūtayaḥ RVc yadī vājasya gomata stotṛbhyo maṃhate magham RVa purām bhindur yuvā kavir amitaujā ajāyata RVc indro viśvasya karmaṇo dhartā vajrī puruṣṭutaḥ RVa tvaṃ valasya gomato pāvar adrivo bilam RVc tvāṃ devā abibhyuṣas tujyamānāsa āviṣuḥ RVa tavāhaṃ śūra rātibhiḥ praty āyaṃ sindhum āvadan RVc upātiṣṭhanta girvaṇo viduṣ ṭe tasya kāravaḥ RVa māyābhir indra māyinaṃ tvaṃ śuṣṇam avātiraḥ RVc viduṣ ṭe tasya medhirās teṣāṃ śravāṃsy ut tira RVa indram īśānam ojasābhi stomā anūṣata RVc sahasraṃ yasya rātaya uta vā santi bhūyasīḥ RVa agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam RVc asya yajñasya sukratum RVa agnimagniṃ havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim RVc havyavāham purupriyam RVa agne devāṃ ihā vaha jajñāno vṛktabarhiṣe RVc asi hotā na īḍyaḥ RVa tāṃ uśato vi bodhaya yad agne yāsi dūtyam RVc devair ā satsi barhiṣi RVa ghṛtāhavana dīdivaḥ prati ṣma riṣato daha RVc agne tvaṃ rakṣasvinaḥ RVa agnināgniḥ sam idhyate kavir gṛhapatir yuvā RVc havyavāḍ juhvāsyaḥ RVa kavim agnim upa stuhi satyadharmāṇam adhvare RVc devam amīvacātanam RVa yas tvām agne haviṣpatir dūtaṃ deva saparyati RVc tasya sma prāvitā bhava RVa yo agniṃ devavītaye haviṣmāṃ āvivāsati RVc tasmai pāvaka mṛḷaya RVa sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo gne devāṃ ihā vaha RVc upa yajñaṃ haviś ca naḥ RVa sa na stavāna ā bhara gāyatreṇa navīyasā RVc rayiṃ vīravatīm iṣam RVa agne śukreṇa śociṣā viśvābhir devahūtibhiḥ RVc imaṃ stomaṃ juṣasva naḥ RVa susamiddho na ā vaha devāṃ agne haviṣmate RVc hotaḥ pāvaka yakṣi ca RVa madhumantaṃ tanūnapād yajñaṃ deveṣu naḥ kave RVc adyā kṛṇuhi vītaye RVa narāśaṃsam iha priyam asmin yajña upa hvaye RVc madhujihvaṃ haviṣkṛtam RVa agne sukhatame rathe devāṃ īḷita ā vaha RVc asi hotā manurhitaḥ RVa stṛṇīta barhir ānuṣag ghṛtapṛṣṭham manīṣiṇaḥ RVc yatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇam RVa vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdho dvāro devīr asaścataḥ RVc adyā nūnaṃ ca yaṣṭave RVa naktoṣāsā supeśasāsmin yajña upa hvaye RVc idaṃ no barhir āsade RVa tā sujihvā upa hvaye hotārā daivyā kavī RVc yajñaṃ no yakṣatām imam RVa iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīr mayobhuvaḥ RVc barhiḥ sīdantv asridhaḥ RVa iha tvaṣṭāram agriyaṃ viśvarūpam upa hvaye RVc asmākam astu kevalaḥ RVa ava sṛjā vanaspate deva devebhyo haviḥ RVc pra dātur astu cetanam RVa svāhā yajñaṃ kṛṇotanendrāya yajvano gṛhe RVc tatra devāṃ upa hvaye RVa aibhir agne duvo giro viśvebhiḥ somapītaye RVc devebhir yāhi yakṣi ca RVa ā tvā kaṇvā ahūṣata gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ RVc devebhir agna ā gahi RVa indravāyū bṛhaspatim mitrāgnim pūṣaṇam bhagam RVc ādityān mārutaṃ gaṇam RVa pra vo bhriyanta indavo matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ RVc drapsā madhvaś camūṣadaḥ RVa īḷate tvām avasyavaḥ kaṇvāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ RVc haviṣmanto araṅkṛtaḥ RVa ghṛtapṛṣṭhā manoyujo ye tvā vahanti vahnayaḥ RVc ā devān somapītaye RVa tān yajatrāṃ ṛtāvṛdho gne patnīvatas kṛdhi RVc madhvaḥ sujihva pāyaya RVa ye yajatrā ya īḍyās te te pibantu jihvayā RVc madhor agne vaṣaṭkṛti RVa ākīṃ sūryasya rocanād viśvān devāṃ uṣarbudhaḥ RVc vipro hoteha vakṣati RVa viśvebhiḥ somyam madhv agna indreṇa vāyunā RVc pibā mitrasya dhāmabhiḥ RVa tvaṃ hotā manurhito gne yajñeṣu sīdasi RVc semaṃ no adhvaraṃ yaja RVa yukṣvā hy aruṣī rathe harito deva rohitaḥ RVc tābhir devāṃ ihā vaha RVa indra somam piba ṛtunā tvā viśantv indavaḥ RVc matsarāsas tadokasaḥ RVa marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā potrād yajñam punītana RVc yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānavaḥ RVa abhi yajñaṃ gṛṇīhi no gnāvo neṣṭaḥ piba ṛtunā RVc tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi RVa agne devāṃ ihā vaha sādayā yoniṣu triṣu RVc pari bhūṣa piba ṛtunā RVa brāhmaṇād indra rādhasaḥ pibā somam ṛtūṃr anu RVc taved dhi sakhyam astṛtam RVa yuvaṃ dakṣaṃ dhṛtavrata mitrāvaruṇa dūḷabham RVc ṛtunā yajñam āśāthe RVa draviṇodā draviṇaso grāvahastāso adhvare RVc yajñeṣu devam īḷate RVa draviṇodā dadātu no vasūni yāni śṛṇvire RVc deveṣu tā vanāmahe RVa draviṇodāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata RVc neṣṭrād ṛtubhir iṣyata RVa yat tvā turīyam ṛtubhir draviṇodo yajāmahe RVc adha smā no dadir bhava RVa aśvinā pibatam madhu dīdyagnī śucivratā RVc ṛtunā yajñavāhasā RVa gārhapatyena santya ṛtunā yajñanīr asi RVc devān devayate yaja RVa ā tvā vahantu harayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somapītaye RVc indra tvā sūracakṣasaḥ RVa imā dhānā ghṛtasnuvo harī ihopa vakṣataḥ RVc indraṃ sukhatame rathe RVa indram prātar havāmaha indram prayaty adhvare RVc indraṃ somasya pītaye RVa upa naḥ sutam ā gahi haribhir indra keśibhiḥ RVc sute hi tvā havāmahe RVa semaṃ na stomam ā gahy upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam RVc gauro na tṛṣitaḥ piba RVa ime somāsa indavaḥ sutāso adhi barhiṣi RVc tāṃ indra sahase piba RVa ayaṃ te stomo agriyo hṛdispṛg astu śantamaḥ RVc athā somaṃ sutam piba RVa viśvam it savanaṃ sutam indro madāya gacchati RVc vṛtrahā somapītaye RVa semaṃ naḥ kāmam ā pṛṇa gobhir aśvaiḥ śatakrato RVc stavāma tvā svādhyaḥ RVa indrāvaruṇayor ahaṃ samrājor ava ā vṛṇe RVc tā no mṛḷāta īdṛśe RVa gantārā hi stho vase havaṃ viprasya māvataḥ RVc dhartārā carṣaṇīnām RVa anukāmaṃ tarpayethām indrāvaruṇa rāya ā RVc tā vāṃ nediṣṭham īmahe RVa yuvāku hi śacīnāṃ yuvāku sumatīnām RVc bhūyāma vājadāvnām RVa indraḥ sahasradāvnāṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃsyānām RVc kratur bhavaty ukthyaḥ RVa tayor id avasā vayaṃ sanema ni ca dhīmahi RVc syād uta prarecanam RVa indrāvaruṇa vām ahaṃ huve citrāya rādhase RVc asmān su jigyuṣas kṛtam RVa indrāvaruṇa nū nu vāṃ siṣāsantīṣu dhīṣv ā RVc asmabhyaṃ śarma yacchatam RVa pra vām aśnotu suṣṭutir indrāvaruṇa yāṃ huve RVc yām ṛdhāthe sadhastutim RVa somānaṃ svaraṇaṃ kṛṇuhi brahmaṇas pate RVc kakṣīvantaṃ ya auśijaḥ RVa yo revān yo amīvahā vasuvit puṣṭivardhanaḥ RVc sa naḥ siṣaktu yas turaḥ RVa mā naḥ śaṃso araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṅ martyasya RVc rakṣā ṇo brahmaṇas pate RVa sa ghā vīro na riṣyati yam indro brahmaṇas patiḥ RVc somo hinoti martyam RVa tvaṃ tam brahmaṇas pate soma indraś ca martyam RVc dakṣiṇā pātv aṃhasaḥ RVa sadasas patim adbhutam priyam indrasya kāmyam RVc sanim medhām ayāsiṣam RVa yasmād ṛte na sidhyati yajño vipaścitaś cana RVc sa dhīnāṃ yogam invati RVa ād ṛdhnoti haviṣkṛtim prāñcaṃ kṛṇoty adhvaram RVc hotrā deveṣu gacchati RVa narāśaṃsaṃ sudhṛṣṭamam apaśyaṃ saprathastamam RVc divo na sadmamakhasam RVa prati tyaṃ cārum adhvaraṃ gopīthāya pra hūyase RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa nahi devo na martyo mahas tava kratum paraḥ RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa ye maho rajaso vidur viśve devāso adruhaḥ RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa ya ugrā arkam ānṛcur anādhṛṣṭāsa ojasā RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa ye śubhrā ghoravarpasaḥ sukṣatrāso riśādasaḥ RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa ye nākasyādhi rocane divi devāsa āsate RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa ya īṅkhayanti parvatān tiraḥ samudram arṇavam RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa ā ye tanvanti raśmibhis tiraḥ samudram ojasā RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa abhi tvā pūrvapītaye sṛjāmi somyam madhu RVc marudbhir agna ā gahi RVa ayaṃ devāya janmane stomo viprebhir āsayā RVc akāri ratnadhātamaḥ RVa ya indrāya vacoyujā tatakṣur manasā harī RVc śamībhir yajñam āśata RVa takṣan nāsatyābhyām parijmānaṃ sukhaṃ ratham RVc takṣan dhenuṃ sabardughām RVa yuvānā pitarā punaḥ satyamantrā ṛjūyavaḥ RVc ṛbhavo viṣṭy akrata RVa saṃ vo madāso agmatendreṇa ca marutvatā RVc ādityebhiś ca rājabhiḥ RVa uta tyaṃ camasaṃ navaṃ tvaṣṭur devasya niṣkṛtam RVc akarta caturaḥ punaḥ RVa te no ratnāni dhattana trir ā sāptāni sunvate RVc ekamekaṃ suśastibhiḥ RVa adhārayanta vahnayo bhajanta sukṛtyayā RVc bhāgaṃ deveṣu yajñiyam RVa ihendrāgnī upa hvaye tayor it stomam uśmasi RVc tā somaṃ somapātamā RVa tā yajñeṣu pra śaṃsatendrāgnī śumbhatā naraḥ RVc tā gāyatreṣu gāyata RVa tā mitrasya praśastaya indrāgnī tā havāmahe RVc somapā somapītaye RVa ugrā santā havāmaha upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam RVc indrāgnī eha gacchatām RVa tā mahāntā sadaspatī indrāgnī rakṣa ubjatam RVc aprajāḥ santv atriṇaḥ RVa tena satyena jāgṛtam adhi pracetune pade RVc indrāgnī śarma yacchatam RVa prātaryujā vi bodhayāśvināv eha gacchatām RVc asya somasya pītaye RVa yā surathā rathītamobhā devā divispṛśā RVc aśvinā tā havāmahe RVa yā vāṃ kaśā madhumaty aśvinā sūnṛtāvatī RVc tayā yajñam mimikṣatam RVa nahi vām asti dūrake yatrā rathena gacchathaḥ RVc aśvinā somino gṛham RVa hiraṇyapāṇim ūtaye savitāram upa hvaye RVc sa cettā devatā padam RVa apāṃ napātam avase savitāram upa stuhi RVc tasya vratāny uśmasi RVa vibhaktāraṃ havāmahe vasoś citrasya rādhasaḥ RVc savitāraṃ nṛcakṣasam RVa sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata savitā stomyo nu naḥ RVc dātā rādhāṃsi śumbhati RVa agne patnīr ihā vaha devānām uśatīr upa RVc tvaṣṭāraṃ somapītaye RVa ā gnā agna ihāvase hotrāṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratīm RVc varūtrīṃ dhiṣaṇāṃ vaha RVa abhi no devīr avasā mahaḥ śarmaṇā nṛpatnīḥ RVc acchinnapatrāḥ sacantām RVa ihendrāṇīm upa hvaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye RVc agnāyīṃ somapītaye RVa mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñam mimikṣatām RVc pipṛtāṃ no bharīmabhiḥ RVa tayor id ghṛtavat payo viprā rihanti dhītibhiḥ RVc gandharvasya dhruve pade RVa syonā pṛthivi bhavānṛkṣarā niveśanī RVc yacchā naḥ śarma saprathaḥ RVa ato devā avantu no yato viṣṇur vicakrame RVc pṛthivyāḥ sapta dhāmabhiḥ RVa idaṃ viṣṇur vi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe padam RVc samūḷham asya pāṃsure RVa trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇur gopā adābhyaḥ RVc ato dharmāṇi dhārayan RVa viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paspaśe RVc indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā RVa tad viṣṇoḥ paramam padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ RVc divīva cakṣur ātatam RVa tad viprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate RVc viṣṇor yat paramam padam RVa tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahy āśīrvantaḥ sutā ime RVc vāyo tān prasthitān piba RVa ubhā devā divispṛśendravāyū havāmahe RVc asya somasya pītaye RVa indravāyū manojuvā viprā havanta ūtaye RVc sahasrākṣā dhiyas patī RVa mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmahe varuṇaṃ somapītaye RVc jajñānā pūtadakṣasā RVa ṛtena yāv ṛtāvṛdhāv ṛtasya jyotiṣas patī RVc tā mitrāvaruṇā huve RVa varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvan mitro viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ RVc karatāṃ naḥ surādhasaḥ RVa marutvantaṃ havāmaha indram ā somapītaye RVc sajūr gaṇena tṛmpatu RVa indrajyeṣṭhā marudgaṇā devāsaḥ pūṣarātayaḥ RVc viśve mama śrutā havam RVa hata vṛtraṃ sudānava indreṇa sahasā yujā RVc mā no duḥśaṃsa īśata RVa viśvān devān havāmahe marutaḥ somapītaye RVc ugrā hi pṛśnimātaraḥ RVa jayatām iva tanyatur marutām eti dhṛṣṇuyā RVc yac chubhaṃ yāthanā naraḥ RVa haskārād vidyutas pary ato jātā avantu naḥ RVc maruto mṛḷayantu naḥ RVa ā pūṣañ citrabarhiṣam āghṛṇe dharuṇaṃ divaḥ RVc ājā naṣṭaṃ yathā paśum RVa pūṣā rājānam āghṛṇir apagūḷhaṃ guhā hitam RVc avindac citrabarhiṣam RVa uto sa mahyam indubhiḥ ṣaḍ yuktāṃ anuseṣidhat RVc gobhir yavaṃ na carkṛṣat RVa ambayo yanty adhvabhir jāmayo adhvarīyatām RVc pṛñcatīr madhunā payaḥ RVa amūr yā upa sūrye yābhir vā sūryaḥ saha RVc tā no hinvantv adhvaram RVa apo devīr upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ RVc sindhubhyaḥ kartvaṃ haviḥ RVa apsv antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta praśastaye RVc devā bhavata vājinaḥ RVa apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā RVc agniṃ ca viśvaśambhuvam āpaś ca viśvabheṣajīḥ RVa āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama RVc jyok ca sūryaṃ dṛśe RVa idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritam mayi RVc yad vāham abhidudroha yad vā śepa utānṛtam RVa āpo adyānv acāriṣaṃ rasena sam agasmahi RVc payasvān agna ā gahi tam mā saṃ sṛja varcasā RVa sam māgne varcasā sṛja sam prajayā sam āyuṣā RVc vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ RVa kasya nūnaṃ katamasyāmṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma RVc ko no mahyā aditaye punar dāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyam mātaraṃ ca RVa agner vayam prathamasyāmṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma RVc sa no mahyā aditaye punar dāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyam mātaraṃ ca RVa abhi tvā deva savitar īśānaṃ vāryāṇām RVc sadāvan bhāgam īmahe RVa yaś cid dhi ta itthā bhagaḥ śaśamānaḥ purā nidaḥ RVc adveṣo hastayor dadhe RVa bhagabhaktasya te vayam ud aśema tavāvasā RVc mūrdhānaṃ rāya ārabhe RVa nahi te kṣatraṃ na saho na manyuṃ vayaś canāmī patayanta āpuḥ RVc nemā āpo animiṣaṃ carantīr na ye vātasya praminanty abhvam RVa abudhne rājā varuṇo vanasyordhvaṃ stūpaṃ dadate pūtadakṣaḥ RVc nīcīnā sthur upari budhna eṣām asme antar nihitāḥ ketavaḥ syuḥ RVa uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaś cakāra sūryāya panthām anvetavā u RVc apade pādā pratidhātave kar utāpavaktā hṛdayāvidhaś cit RVa śataṃ te rājan bhiṣajaḥ sahasram urvī gabhīrā sumatiṣ ṭe astu RVc bādhasva dūre nirṛtim parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ pra mumugdhy asmat RVa amī ya ṛkṣā nihitāsa uccā naktaṃ dadṛśre kuha cid diveyuḥ RVc adabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni vicākaśac candramā naktam eti RVa tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānas tad ā śāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ RVc aheḷamāno varuṇeha bodhy uruśaṃsa mā na āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ RVa tad in naktaṃ tad divā mahyam āhus tad ayaṃ keto hṛda ā vi caṣṭe RVc śunaḥśepo yam ahvad gṛbhītaḥ so asmān rājā varuṇo mumoktu RVa śunaḥśepo hy ahvad gṛbhītas triṣv ādityaṃ drupadeṣu baddhaḥ RVc avainaṃ rājā varuṇaḥ sasṛjyād vidvāṃ adabdho vi mumoktu pāśān RVa ava te heḷo varuṇa namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ RVc kṣayann asmabhyam asura pracetā rājann enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni RVa ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya RVc athā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma RVa yac cid dhi te viśo yathā pra deva varuṇa vratam RVc minīmasi dyavidyavi RVa mā no vadhāya hatnave jihīḷānasya rīradhaḥ RVc mā hṛṇānasya manyave RVa vi mṛḷīkāya te mano rathīr aśvaṃ na saṃditam RVc gīrbhir varuṇa sīmahi RVa parā hi me vimanyavaḥ patanti vasyaiṣṭaye RVc vayo na vasatīr upa RVa kadā kṣatraśriyaṃ naram ā varuṇaṃ karāmahe RVc mṛḷīkāyorucakṣasam RVa tad it samānam āśāte venantā na pra yucchataḥ RVc dhṛtavratāya dāśuṣe RVa vedā yo vīnām padam antarikṣeṇa patatām RVc veda nāvaḥ samudriyaḥ RVa veda māso dhṛtavrato dvādaśa prajāvataḥ RVc vedā ya upajāyate RVa veda vātasya vartanim uror ṛṣvasya bṛhataḥ RVc vedā ye adhyāsate RVa ni ṣasāda dhṛtavrato varuṇaḥ pastyāsv ā RVc sāmrājyāya sukratuḥ RVa ato viśvāny adbhutā cikitvāṃ abhi paśyati RVc kṛtāni yā ca kartvā RVa sa no viśvāhā sukratur ādityaḥ supathā karat RVc pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat RVa bibhrad drāpiṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇo vasta nirṇijam RVc pari spaśo ni ṣedire RVa na yaṃ dipsanti dipsavo na druhvāṇo janānām RVc na devam abhimātayaḥ RVa uta yo mānuṣeṣv ā yaśaś cakre asāmy ā RVc asmākam udareṣv ā RVa parā me yanti dhītayo gāvo na gavyūtīr anu RVc icchantīr urucakṣasam RVa saṃ nu vocāvahai punar yato me madhv ābhṛtam RVc hoteva kṣadase priyam RVa darśaṃ nu viśvadarśataṃ darśaṃ ratham adhi kṣami RVc etā juṣata me giraḥ RVa imam me varuṇa śrudhī havam adyā ca mṛḷaya RVc tvām avasyur ā cake RVa tvaṃ viśvasya medhira divaś ca gmaś ca rājasi RVc sa yāmani prati śrudhi RVa ud uttamam mumugdhi no vi pāśam madhyamaṃ cṛta RVc avādhamāni jīvase RVa vasiṣvā hi miyedhya vastrāṇy ūrjām pate RVc semaṃ no adhvaraṃ yaja RVa ni no hotā vareṇyaḥ sadā yaviṣṭha manmabhiḥ RVc agne divitmatā vacaḥ RVa ā hi ṣmā sūnave pitāpir yajaty āpaye RVc sakhā sakhye vareṇyaḥ RVa ā no barhī riśādaso varuṇo mitro aryamā RVc sīdantu manuṣo yathā RVa pūrvya hotar asya no mandasva sakhyasya ca RVc imā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ RVa yac cid dhi śaśvatā tanā devaṃdevaṃ yajāmahe RVc tve id dhūyate haviḥ RVa priyo no astu viśpatir hotā mandro vareṇyaḥ RVc priyāḥ svagnayo vayam RVa svagnayo hi vāryaṃ devāso dadhire ca naḥ RVc svagnayo manāmahe RVa athā na ubhayeṣām amṛta martyānām RVc mithaḥ santu praśastayaḥ RVa viśvebhir agne agnibhir imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vacaḥ RVc cano dhāḥ sahaso yaho RVa aśvaṃ na tvā vāravantaṃ vandadhyā agniṃ namobhiḥ RVc samrājantam adhvarāṇām RVa sa ghā naḥ sūnuḥ śavasā pṛthupragāmā suśevaḥ RVc mīḍhvāṃ asmākam babhūyāt RVa sa no dūrāc cāsāc ca ni martyād aghāyoḥ RVc pāhi sadam id viśvāyuḥ RVa imam ū ṣu tvam asmākaṃ saniṃ gāyatraṃ navyāṃsam RVc agne deveṣu pra vocaḥ RVa ā no bhaja parameṣv ā vājeṣu madhyameṣu RVc śikṣā vasvo antamasya RVa vibhaktāsi citrabhāno sindhor ūrmā upāka ā RVc sadyo dāśuṣe kṣarasi RVa yam agne pṛtsu martyam avā vājeṣu yaṃ junāḥ RVc sa yantā śaśvatīr iṣaḥ RVa nakir asya sahantya paryetā kayasya cit RVc vājo asti śravāyyaḥ RVa sa vājaṃ viśvacarṣaṇir arvadbhir astu tarutā RVc viprebhir astu sanitā RVa jarābodha tad viviḍḍhi viśeviśe yajñiyāya RVc stomaṃ rudrāya dṛśīkam RVa sa no mahāṃ animāno dhūmaketuḥ puruścandraḥ RVc dhiye vājāya hinvatu RVa sa revāṃ iva viśpatir daivyaḥ ketuḥ śṛṇotu naḥ RVc ukthair agnir bṛhadbhānuḥ RVa namo mahadbhyo namo arbhakebhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āśinebhyaḥ RVc yajāma devān yadi śaknavāma mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsam ā vṛkṣi devāḥ RVa yatra grāvā pṛthubudhna ūrdhvo bhavati sotave RVc ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ RVa yatra dvāv iva jaghanādhiṣavaṇyā kṛtā RVc ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ RVa yatra nāry apacyavam upacyavaṃ ca śikṣate RVc ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ RVa yatra manthāṃ vibadhnate raśmīn yamitavā iva RVc ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ RVa yac cid dhi tvaṃ gṛhegṛha ulūkhalaka yujyase RVc iha dyumattamaṃ vada jayatām iva dundubhiḥ RVa uta sma te vanaspate vāto vi vāty agram it RVc atho indrāya pātave sunu somam ulūkhala RVa āyajī vājasātamā tā hy uccā vijarbhṛtaḥ RVc harī ivāndhāṃsi bapsatā RVa tā no adya vanaspatī ṛṣvāv ṛṣvebhiḥ sotṛbhiḥ RVc indrāya madhumat sutam RVa uc chiṣṭaṃ camvor bhara somam pavitra ā sṛja RVc ni dhehi gor adhi tvaci RVa yac cid dhi satya somapā anāśastā iva smasi RVc ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha RVa śiprin vājānām pate śacīvas tava daṃsanā RVc ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha RVa ni ṣvāpayā mithūdṛśā sastām abudhyamāne RVc ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha RVa sasantu tyā arātayo bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ RVc ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha RVa sam indra gardabham mṛṇa nuvantam pāpayāmuyā RVc ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha RVa patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā dūraṃ vāto vanād adhi RVc ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha RVa sarvam parikrośaṃ jahi jambhayā kṛkadāśvam RVc ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha RVa ā va indraṃ kriviṃ yathā vājayantaḥ śatakratum RVc maṃhiṣṭhaṃ siñca indubhiḥ RVa śataṃ vā yaḥ śucīnāṃ sahasraṃ vā samāśirām RVc ed u nimnaṃ na rīyate RVa saṃ yan madāya śuṣmiṇa enā hy asyodare RVc samudro na vyaco dadhe RVa ayam u te sam atasi kapota iva garbhadhim RVc vacas tac cin na ohase RVa stotraṃ rādhānām pate girvāho vīra yasya te RVc vibhūtir astu sūnṛtā RVa ūrdhvas tiṣṭhā na ūtaye smin vāje śatakrato RVc sam anyeṣu bravāvahai RVa yogeyoge tavastaraṃ vājevāje havāmahe RVc sakhāya indram ūtaye RVa ā ghā gamad yadi śravat sahasriṇībhir ūtibhiḥ RVc vājebhir upa no havam RVa anu pratnasyaukaso huve tuvipratiṃ naram RVc yaṃ te pūrvam pitā huve RVa taṃ tvā vayaṃ viśvavārā śāsmahe puruhūta RVc sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ RVa asmākaṃ śipriṇīnāṃ somapāḥ somapāvnām RVc sakhe vajrin sakhīnām RVa tathā tad astu somapāḥ sakhe vajrin tathā kṛṇu RVc yathā ta uśmasīṣṭaye RVa revatīr naḥ sadhamāda indre santu tuvivājāḥ RVc kṣumanto yābhir madema RVa ā gha tvāvān tmanāpta stotṛbhyo dhṛṣṇav iyānaḥ RVc ṛṇor akṣaṃ na cakryoḥ RVa ā yad duvaḥ śatakratav ā kāmaṃ jaritṝṇām RVc ṛṇor akṣaṃ na śacībhiḥ RVa śaśvad indraḥ popruthadbhir jigāya nānadadbhiḥ śāśvasadbhir dhanāni RVc sa no hiraṇyarathaṃ daṃsanāvān sa naḥ sanitā sanaye sa no dāt RVa āśvināv aśvāvatyeṣā yātaṃ śavīrayā RVc gomad dasrā hiraṇyavat RVa samānayojano hi vāṃ ratho dasrāv amartyaḥ RVc samudre aśvineyate RVa ny aghnyasya mūrdhani cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ RVc pari dyām anyad īyate RVa kas ta uṣaḥ kadhapriye bhuje marto amartye RVc kaṃ nakṣase vibhāvari RVa vayaṃ hi te amanmahy āntād ā parākāt RVc aśve na citre aruṣi RVa tvaṃ tyebhir ā gahi vājebhir duhitar divaḥ RVc asme rayiṃ ni dhāraya RVa tvam agne prathamo aṅgirā ṛṣir devo devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā RVc tava vrate kavayo vidmanāpaso jāyanta maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ RVa tvam agne prathamo aṅgirastamaḥ kavir devānām pari bhūṣasi vratam RVc vibhur viśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiro dvimātā śayuḥ katidhā cid āyave RVa tvam agne prathamo mātariśvana āvir bhava sukratūyā vivasvate RVc arejetāṃ rodasī hotṛvūrye saghnor bhāram ayajo maho vaso RVa tvam agne manave dyām avāśayaḥ purūravase sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ RVc śvātreṇa yat pitror mucyase pary ā tvā pūrvam anayann āparam punaḥ RVa tvam agne vṛṣabhaḥ puṣṭivardhana udyatasruce bhavasi śravāyyaḥ RVc ya āhutim pari vedā vaṣaṭkṛtim ekāyur agre viśa āvivāsasi RVa tvam agne vṛjinavartaniṃ naraṃ sakman piparṣi vidathe vicarṣaṇe RVc yaḥ śūrasātā paritakmye dhane dabhrebhiś cit samṛtā haṃsi bhūyasaḥ RVa tvaṃ tam agne amṛtatva uttame martaṃ dadhāsi śravase divedive RVc yas tātṛṣāṇa ubhayāya janmane mayaḥ kṛṇoṣi praya ā ca sūraye RVa tvaṃ no agne sanaye dhanānāṃ yaśasaṃ kāruṃ kṛṇuhi stavānaḥ RVc ṛdhyāma karmāpasā navena devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ RVa tvaṃ no agne pitror upastha ā devo deveṣv anavadya jāgṛviḥ RVc tanūkṛd bodhi pramatiś ca kārave tvaṃ kalyāṇa vasu viśvam opiṣe RVa tvam agne pramatis tvam pitāsi nas tvaṃ vayaskṛt tava jāmayo vayam RVc saṃ tvā rāyaḥ śatinaḥ saṃ sahasriṇaḥ suvīraṃ yanti vratapām adābhya RVa tvām agne prathamam āyum āyave devā akṛṇvan nahuṣasya viśpatim RVc iḷām akṛṇvan manuṣasya śāsanīm pitur yat putro mamakasya jāyate RVa tvaṃ no agne tava deva pāyubhir maghono rakṣa tanvaś ca vandya RVc trātā tokasya tanaye gavām asy animeṣaṃ rakṣamāṇas tava vrate RVa tvam agne yajyave pāyur antaro niṣaṅgāya caturakṣa idhyase RVc yo rātahavyo vṛkāya dhāyase kīreś cin mantram manasā vanoṣi tam RVa tvam agna uruśaṃsāya vāghate spārhaṃ yad rekṇaḥ paramaṃ vanoṣi tat RVc ādhrasya cit pramatir ucyase pitā pra pākaṃ śāssi pra diśo viduṣṭaraḥ RVa tvam agne prayatadakṣiṇaṃ naraṃ varmeva syūtam pari pāsi viśvataḥ RVc svādukṣadmā yo vasatau syonakṛj jīvayājaṃ yajate sopamā divaḥ RVa imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣo na imam adhvānaṃ yam agāma dūrāt RVc āpiḥ pitā pramatiḥ somyānām bhṛmir asy ṛṣikṛn martyānām RVa manuṣvad agne aṅgirasvad aṅgiro yayātivat sadane pūrvavac chuce RVc accha yāhy ā vahā daivyaṃ janam ā sādaya barhiṣi yakṣi ca priyam RVa etenāgne brahmaṇā vāvṛdhasva śaktī vā yat te cakṛmā vidā vā RVc uta pra ṇeṣy abhi vasyo asmān saṃ naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyā RVa indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī RVc ahann ahim anv apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām RVa ahann ahim parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa RVc vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram ava jagmur āpaḥ RVa vṛṣāyamāṇo vṛṇīta somaṃ trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasya RVc ā sāyakam maghavādatta vajram ahann enam prathamajām ahīnām RVa yad indrāhan prathamajām ahīnām ān māyinām amināḥ prota māyāḥ RVc āt sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsaṃ tādītnā śatruṃ na kilā vivitse RVa ahan vṛtraṃ vṛtrataraṃ vyaṃsam indro vajreṇa mahatā vadhena RVc skandhāṃsīva kuliśenā vivṛkṇāhiḥ śayata upapṛk pṛthivyāḥ RVa ayoddheva durmada ā hi juhve mahāvīraṃ tuvibādham ṛjīṣam RVc nātārīd asya samṛtiṃ vadhānāṃ saṃ rujānāḥ pipiṣa indraśatruḥ RVa apād ahasto apṛtanyad indram āsya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna RVc vṛṣṇo vadhriḥ pratimānam bubhūṣan purutrā vṛtro aśayad vyastaḥ RVa nadaṃ na bhinnam amuyā śayānam mano ruhāṇā ati yanty āpaḥ RVc yāś cid vṛtro mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīr babhūva RVa nīcāvayā abhavad vṛtraputrendro asyā ava vadhar jabhāra RVc uttarā sūr adharaḥ putra āsīd dānuḥ śaye sahavatsā na dhenuḥ RVa atiṣṭhantīnām aniveśanānāṃ kāṣṭhānām madhye nihitaṃ śarīram RVc vṛtrasya niṇyaṃ vi caranty āpo dīrghaṃ tama āśayad indraśatruḥ RVa dāsapatnīr ahigopā atiṣṭhan niruddhā āpaḥ paṇineva gāvaḥ RVc apām bilam apihitaṃ yad āsīd vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ apa tad vavāra RVa aśvyo vāro abhavas tad indra sṛke yat tvā pratyahan deva ekaḥ RVc ajayo gā ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn RVa nāsmai vidyun na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yām miham akirad dhrāduniṃ ca RVc indraś ca yad yuyudhāte ahiś cotāparībhyo maghavā vi jigye RVa aher yātāraṃ kam apaśya indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣo bhīr agacchat RVc nava ca yan navatiṃ ca sravantīḥ śyeno na bhīto ataro rajāṃsi RVa indro yāto vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ RVc sed u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva RVa etāyāmopa gavyanta indram asmākaṃ su pramatiṃ vāvṛdhāti RVc anāmṛṇaḥ kuvid ād asya rāyo gavāṃ ketam param āvarjate naḥ RVa uped ahaṃ dhanadām apratītaṃ juṣṭāṃ na śyeno vasatim patāmi RVc indraṃ namasyann upamebhir arkair ya stotṛbhyo havyo asti yāman RVa ni sarvasena iṣudhīṃr asakta sam aryo gā ajati yasya vaṣṭi RVc coṣkūyamāṇa indra bhūri vāmam mā paṇir bhūr asmad adhi pravṛddha RVa vadhīr hi dasyuṃ dhaninaṃ ghanenaṃ ekaś carann upaśākebhir indra RVc dhanor adhi viṣuṇak te vy āyann ayajvānaḥ sanakāḥ pretim īyuḥ RVa parā cic chīrṣā vavṛjus ta indrāyajvāno yajvabhi spardhamānāḥ RVc pra yad divo hariva sthātar ugra nir avratāṃ adhamo rodasyoḥ RVa ayuyutsann anavadyasya senām ayātayanta kṣitayo navagvāḥ RVc vṛṣāyudho na vadhrayo niraṣṭāḥ pravadbhir indrāc citayanta āyan RVa tvam etān rudato jakṣataś cāyodhayo rajasa indra pāre RVc avādaho diva ā dasyum uccā pra sunvata stuvataḥ śaṃsam āvaḥ RVa cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇaham pṛthivyā hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ RVc na hinvānāsas titirus ta indram pari spaśo adadhāt sūryeṇa RVa pari yad indra rodasī ubhe abubhojīr mahinā viśvataḥ sīm RVc amanyamānāṃ abhi manyamānair nir brahmabhir adhamo dasyum indra RVa na ye divaḥ pṛthivyā antam āpur na māyābhir dhanadām paryabhūvan RVc yujaṃ vajraṃ vṛṣabhaś cakra indro nir jyotiṣā tamaso gā adukṣat RVa anu svadhām akṣarann āpo asyāvardhata madhya ā nāvyānām RVc sadhrīcīnena manasā tam indra ojiṣṭhena hanmanāhann abhi dyūn RVa ny āvidhyad ilībiśasya dṛḷhā vi śṛṅgiṇam abhinac chuṣṇam indraḥ RVc yāvat taro maghavan yāvad ojo vajreṇa śatrum avadhīḥ pṛtanyum RVa abhi sidhmo ajigād asya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇā puro bhet RVc saṃ vajreṇāsṛjad vṛtram indraḥ pra svām matim atirac chāśadānaḥ RVa āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmiñ cākan prāvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum RVc śaphacyuto reṇur nakṣata dyām uc chvaitreyo nṛṣāhyāya tasthau RVa āvaḥ śamaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tugryāsu kṣetrajeṣe maghavañ chvitryaṃ gām RVc jyok cid atra tasthivāṃso akrañ chatrūyatām adharā vedanākaḥ RVa triś cin no adyā bhavataṃ navedasā vibhur vāṃ yāma uta rātir aśvinā RVc yuvor hi yantraṃ himyeva vāsaso bhyāyaṃsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ RVa trayaḥ pavayo madhuvāhane rathe somasya venām anu viśva id viduḥ RVc traya skambhāsa skabhitāsa ārabhe trir naktaṃ yāthas trir v aśvinā divā RVa samāne ahan trir avadyagohanā trir adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam RVc trir vājavatīr iṣo aśvinā yuvaṃ doṣā asmabhyam uṣasaś ca pinvatam RVa trir vartir yātaṃ trir anuvrate jane triḥ suprāvye tredheva śikṣatam RVc trir nāndyaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ triḥ pṛkṣo asme akṣareva pinvatam RVa trir no rayiṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ trir devatātā trir utāvataṃ dhiyaḥ RVc triḥ saubhagatvaṃ trir uta śravāṃsi nas triṣṭhaṃ vāṃ sūre duhitā ruhad ratham RVa trir no aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā triḥ pārthivāni trir u dattam adbhyaḥ RVc omānaṃ śaṃyor mamakāya sūnave tridhātu śarma vahataṃ śubhas patī RVa trir no aśvinā yajatā divedive pari tridhātu pṛthivīm aśāyatam RVc tisro nāsatyā rathyā parāvata ātmeva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gacchatam RVa trir aśvinā sindhubhiḥ saptamātṛbhis traya āhāvās tredhā haviṣ kṛtam RVc tisraḥ pṛthivīr upari pravā divo nākaṃ rakṣethe dyubhir aktubhir hitam RVa kva trī cakrā trivṛto rathasya kva trayo vandhuro ye sanīḷāḥ RVc kadā yogo vājino rāsabhasya yena yajñaṃ nāsatyopayāthaḥ RVa ā nāsatyā gacchataṃ hūyate havir madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhiḥ RVc yuvor hi pūrvaṃ savitoṣaso ratham ṛtāya citraṃ ghṛtavantam iṣyati RVa ā nāsatyā tribhir ekādaśair iha devebhir yātam madhupeyam aśvinā RVc prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā RVa ā no aśvinā trivṛtā rathenārvāñcaṃ rayiṃ vahataṃ suvīram RVc śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau RVa hvayāmy agnim prathamaṃ svastaye hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇāv ihāvase RVc hvayāmi rātrīṃ jagato niveśanīṃ hvayāmi devaṃ savitāram ūtaye RVa ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamāno niveśayann amṛtam martyaṃ ca RVc hiraṇyayena savitā rathenā devo yāti bhuvanāni paśyan RVa yāti devaḥ pravatā yāty udvatā yāti śubhrābhyāṃ yajato haribhyām RVc ā devo yāti savitā parāvato pa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ RVa abhīvṛtaṃ kṛśanair viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyaśamyaṃ yajato bṛhantam RVc āsthād rathaṃ savitā citrabhānuḥ kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi taviṣīṃ dadhānaḥ RVa vi janāñ chyāvāḥ śitipādo akhyan rathaṃ hiraṇyapraugaṃ vahantaḥ RVc śaśvad viśaḥ savitur daivyasyopasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ RVa tisro dyāvaḥ savitur dvā upasthāṃ ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāṭ RVc āṇiṃ na rathyam amṛtādhi tasthur iha bravītu ya u tac ciketat RVa vi suparṇo antarikṣāṇy akhyad gabhīravepā asuraḥ sunīthaḥ RVc kvedānīṃ sūryaḥ kaś ciketa katamāṃ dyāṃ raśmir asyā tatāna RVa aṣṭau vy akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyās trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn RVc hiraṇyākṣaḥ savitā deva āgād dadhad ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi RVa hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇir ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate RVc apāmīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti RVa hiraṇyahasto asuraḥ sunīthaḥ sumṛḷīkaḥ svavāṃ yātv arvāṅ RVc apasedhan rakṣaso yātudhānān asthād devaḥ pratidoṣaṃ gṛṇānaḥ RVa ye te panthāḥ savitaḥ pūrvyāso reṇavaḥ sukṛtā antarikṣe RVc tebhir no adya pathibhiḥ sugebhī rakṣā ca no adhi ca brūhi deva RVa pra vo yahvam purūṇāṃ viśāṃ devayatīnām RVc agniṃ sūktebhir vacobhir īmahe yaṃ sīm id anya īḷate RVa janāso agniṃ dadhire sahovṛdhaṃ haviṣmanto vidhema te RVc sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā ihāvitā bhavā vājeṣu santya RVa pra tvā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam RVc mahas te sato vi caranty arcayo divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ RVa devāsas tvā varuṇo mitro aryamā saṃ dūtam pratnam indhate RVc viśvaṃ so agne jayati tvayā dhanaṃ yas te dadāśa martyaḥ RVa mandro hotā gṛhapatir agne dūto viśām asi RVc tve viśvā saṃgatāni vratā dhruvā yāni devā akṛṇvata RVa tve id agne subhage yaviṣṭhya viśvam ā hūyate haviḥ RVc sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā utāparaṃ yakṣi devān suvīryā RVa taṃ ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate RVc hotrābhir agnim manuṣaḥ sam indhate titirvāṃso ati sridhaḥ RVa ghnanto vṛtram ataran rodasī apa uru kṣayāya cakrire RVc bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumny āhutaḥ krandad aśvo gaviṣṭiṣu RVa saṃ sīdasva mahāṃ asi śocasva devavītamaḥ RVc vi dhūmam agne aruṣam miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam RVa yaṃ tvā devāso manave dadhur iha yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana RVc yaṃ kaṇvo medhyātithir dhanaspṛtaṃ yaṃ vṛṣā yam upastutaḥ RVa yam agnim medhyātithiḥ kaṇva īdha ṛtād adhi RVc tasya preṣo dīdiyus tam imā ṛcas tam agniṃ vardhayāmasi RVa rāyas pūrdhi svadhāvo sti hi te gne deveṣv āpyam RVc tvaṃ vājasya śrutyasya rājasi sa no mṛḷa mahāṃ asi RVa ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaye tiṣṭhā devo na savitā RVc ūrdhvo vājasya sanitā yad añjibhir vāghadbhir vihvayāmahe RVa ūrdhvo naḥ pāhy aṃhaso ni ketunā viśvaṃ sam atriṇaṃ daha RVc kṛdhī na ūrdhvāñ carathāya jīvase vidā deveṣu no duvaḥ RVa pāhi no agne rakṣasaḥ pāhi dhūrter arāvṇaḥ RVc pāhi rīṣata uta vā jighāṃsato bṛhadbhāno yaviṣṭhya RVa ghaneva viṣvag vi jahy arāvṇas tapurjambha yo asmadhruk RVc yo martyaḥ śiśīte aty aktubhir mā naḥ sa ripur īśata RVa agnir vavne suvīryam agniḥ kaṇvāya saubhagam RVc agniḥ prāvan mitrota medhyātithim agniḥ sātā upastutam RVa agninā turvaśaṃ yadum parāvata ugrādevaṃ havāmahe RVc agnir nayan navavāstvam bṛhadrathaṃ turvītiṃ dasyave sahaḥ RVa ni tvām agne manur dadhe jyotir janāya śaśvate RVc dīdetha kaṇva ṛtajāta ukṣito yaṃ namasyanti kṛṣṭayaḥ RVa tveṣāso agner amavanto arcayo bhīmāso na pratītaye RVc rakṣasvinaḥ sadam id yātumāvato viśvaṃ sam atriṇaṃ daha RVa krīḷaṃ vaḥ śardho mārutam anarvāṇaṃ ratheśubham RVc kaṇvā abhi pra gāyata RVa ye pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ sākaṃ vāśībhir añjibhiḥ RVc ajāyanta svabhānavaḥ RVa iheva śṛṇva eṣāṃ kaśā hasteṣu yad vadān RVc ni yāmañ citram ṛñjate RVa pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye tveṣadyumnāya śuṣmiṇe RVc devattam brahma gāyata RVa pra śaṃsā goṣv aghnyaṃ krīḷaṃ yac chardho mārutam RVc jambhe rasasya vāvṛdhe RVa ko vo varṣiṣṭha ā naro divaś ca gmaś ca dhūtayaḥ RVc yat sīm antaṃ na dhūnutha RVa ni vo yāmāya mānuṣo dadhra ugrāya manyave RVc jihīta parvato giriḥ RVa yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī jujurvāṃ iva viśpatiḥ RVc bhiyā yāmeṣu rejate RVa sthiraṃ hi jānam eṣāṃ vayo mātur niretave RVc yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ RVa ud u tye sūnavo giraḥ kāṣṭhā ajmeṣv atnata RVc vāśrā abhijñu yātave RVa tyaṃ cid ghā dīrgham pṛthum miho napātam amṛdhram RVc pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ RVa maruto yad dha vo balaṃ janāṃ acucyavītana RVc girīṃr acucyavītana RVa yad dha yānti marutaḥ saṃ ha bruvate dhvann ā RVc śṛṇoti kaś cid eṣām RVa pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ santi kaṇveṣu vo duvaḥ RVc tatro ṣu mādayādhvai RVa asti hi ṣmā madāya vaḥ smasi ṣmā vayam eṣām RVc viśvaṃ cid āyur jīvase RVa kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyaḥ pitā putraṃ na hastayoḥ RVc dadhidhve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ RVa kva nūnaṃ kad vo arthaṃ gantā divo na pṛthivyāḥ RVc kva vo gāvo na raṇyanti RVa kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā RVc kvo viśvāni saubhagā RVa yad yūyam pṛśnimātaro martāsaḥ syātana RVc stotā vo amṛtaḥ syāt RVa mā vo mṛgo na yavase jaritā bhūd ajoṣyaḥ RVc pathā yamasya gād upa RVa mo ṣu ṇaḥ parāparā nirṛtir durhaṇā vadhīt RVc padīṣṭa tṛṣṇayā saha RVa satyaṃ tveṣā amavanto dhanvañ cid ā rudriyāsaḥ RVc mihaṃ kṛṇvanty avātām RVa vāśreva vidyun mimāti vatsaṃ na mātā siṣakti RVc yad eṣāṃ vṛṣṭir asarji RVa divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti parjanyenodavāhena RVc yat pṛthivīṃ vyundanti RVa adha svanān marutāṃ viśvam ā sadma pārthivam RVc arejanta pra mānuṣāḥ RVa maruto vīḷupāṇibhiś citrā rodhasvatīr anu RVc yātem akhidrayāmabhiḥ RVa sthirā vaḥ santu nemayo rathā aśvāsa eṣām RVc susaṃskṛtā abhīśavaḥ RVa acchā vadā tanā girā jarāyai brahmaṇas patim RVc agnim mitraṃ na darśatam RVa mimīhi ślokam āsye parjanya iva tatanaḥ RVc gāya gāyatram ukthyam RVa vandasva mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam RVc asme vṛddhā asann iha RVa pra yad itthā parāvataḥ śocir na mānam asyatha RVc kasya kratvā marutaḥ kasya varpasā kaṃ yātha kaṃ ha dhūtayaḥ RVa sthirā vaḥ santv āyudhā parāṇude vīḷū uta pratiṣkabhe RVc yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī mā martyasya māyinaḥ RVa parā ha yat sthiraṃ hatha naro vartayathā guru RVc vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyā vy āśāḥ parvatānām RVa nahi vaḥ śatrur vivide adhi dyavi na bhūmyāṃ riśādasaḥ RVc yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā rudrāso nū cid ādhṛṣe RVa pra vepayanti parvatān vi viñcanti vanaspatīn RVc pro ārata maruto durmadā iva devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā RVa upo ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ RVc ā vo yāmāya pṛthivī cid aśrod abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ RVa ā vo makṣū tanāya kaṃ rudrā avo vṛṇīmahe RVc gantā nūnaṃ no vasā yathā puretthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe RVa yuṣmeṣito maruto martyeṣita ā yo no abhva īṣate RVc vi taṃ yuyota śavasā vy ojasā vi yuṣmākābhir ūtibhiḥ RVa asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ kaṇvaṃ dada pracetasaḥ RVc asāmibhir maruta ā na ūtibhir gantā vṛṣṭiṃ na vidyutaḥ RVa asāmy ojo bibhṛthā sudānavo sāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ RVc ṛṣidviṣe marutaḥ parimanyava iṣuṃ na sṛjata dviṣam RVa ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devayantas tvemahe RVc upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānava indra prāśūr bhavā sacā RVa tvām id dhi sahasas putra martya upabrūte dhane hite RVc suvīryam maruta ā svaśvyaṃ dadhīta yo va ācake RVa praitu brahmaṇas patiḥ pra devy etu sūnṛtā RVc acchā vīraṃ naryam paṅktirādhasaṃ devā yajñaṃ nayantu naḥ RVa yo vāghate dadāti sūnaraṃ vasu sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ RVc tasmā iḷāṃ suvīrām ā yajāmahe supratūrtim anehasam RVa pra nūnam brahmaṇas patir mantraṃ vadaty ukthyam RVc yasminn indro varuṇo mitro aryamā devā okāṃsi cakrire RVa tam id vocemā vidatheṣu śambhuvam mantraṃ devā anehasam RVc imāṃ ca vācam pratiharyathā naro viśved vāmā vo aśnavat RVa ko devayantam aśnavaj janaṃ ko vṛktabarhiṣam RVc prapra dāśvān pastyābhir asthitāntarvāvat kṣayaṃ dadhe RVa upa kṣatram pṛñcīta hanti rājabhir bhaye cit sukṣitiṃ dadhe RVc nāsya vartā na tarutā mahādhane nārbhe asti vajriṇaḥ RVa yaṃ rakṣanti pracetaso varuṇo mitro aryamā RVc nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ RVa yam bāhuteva piprati pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ RVc ariṣṭaḥ sarva edhate RVa vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puro ghnanti rājāna eṣām RVc nayanti duritā tiraḥ RVa sugaḥ panthā anṛkṣara ādityāsa ṛtaṃ yate RVc nātrāvakhādo asti vaḥ RVa yaṃ yajñaṃ nayathā nara ādityā ṛjunā pathā RVc pra vaḥ sa dhītaye naśat RVa sa ratnam martyo vasu viśvaṃ tokam uta tmanā RVc acchā gacchaty astṛtaḥ RVa kathā rādhāma sakhāya stomam mitrasyāryamṇaḥ RVc mahi psaro varuṇasya RVa mā vo ghnantam mā śapantam prati voce devayantam RVc sumnair id va ā vivāse RVa caturaś cid dadamānād bibhīyād ā nidhātoḥ RVc na duruktāya spṛhayet RVa sam pūṣann adhvanas tira vy aṃho vimuco napāt RVc sakṣvā deva pra ṇas puraḥ RVa yo naḥ pūṣann agho vṛko duḥśeva ādideśati RVc apa sma tam patho jahi RVa apa tyam paripanthinam muṣīvāṇaṃ huraścitam RVc dūram adhi sruter aja RVa tvaṃ tasya dvayāvino ghaśaṃsasya kasya cit RVc padābhi tiṣṭha tapuṣim RVa ā tat te dasra mantumaḥ pūṣann avo vṛṇīmahe RVc yena pitṝn acodayaḥ RVa adhā no viśvasaubhaga hiraṇyavāśīmattama RVc dhanāni suṣaṇā kṛdhi RVa ati naḥ saścato naya sugā naḥ supathā kṛṇu RVc pūṣann iha kratuṃ vidaḥ RVa abhi sūyavasaṃ naya na navajvāro adhvane RVc pūṣann iha kratuṃ vidaḥ RVa śagdhi pūrdhi pra yaṃsi ca śiśīhi prāsy udaram RVc pūṣann iha kratuṃ vidaḥ RVa na pūṣaṇam methāmasi sūktair abhi gṛṇīmasi RVc vasūni dasmam īmahe RVa kad rudrāya pracetase mīḷhuṣṭamāya tavyase RVc vocema śantamaṃ hṛde RVa yathā no aditiḥ karat paśve nṛbhyo yathā gave RVc yathā tokāya rudriyam RVa yathā no mitro varuṇo yathā rudraś ciketati RVc yathā viśve sajoṣasaḥ RVa gāthapatim medhapatiṃ rudraṃ jalāṣabheṣajam RVc tac chaṃyoḥ sumnam īmahe RVa yaḥ śukra iva sūryo hiraṇyam iva rocate RVc śreṣṭho devānāṃ vasuḥ RVa śaṃ naḥ karaty arvate sugam meṣāya meṣye RVc nṛbhyo nāribhyo gave RVa asme soma śriyam adhi ni dhehi śatasya nṛṇām RVc mahi śravas tuvinṛmṇam RVa mā naḥ somaparibādho mārātayo juhuranta RVc ā na indo vāje bhaja RVa yās te prajā amṛtasya parasmin dhāmann ṛtasya RVc mūrdhā nābhā soma vena ābhūṣantīḥ soma vedaḥ RVa agne vivasvad uṣasaś citraṃ rādho amartya RVc ā dāśuṣe jātavedo vahā tvam adyā devāṃ uṣarbudhaḥ RVa juṣṭo hi dūto asi havyavāhano gne rathīr adhvarāṇām RVc sajūr aśvibhyām uṣasā suvīryam asme dhehi śravo bṛhat RVa adyā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe vasum agnim purupriyam RVc dhūmaketum bhāṛjīkaṃ vyuṣṭiṣu yajñānām adhvaraśriyam RVa śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭham atithiṃ svāhutaṃ juṣṭaṃ janāya dāśuṣe RVc devāṃ acchā yātave jātavedasam agnim īḷe vyuṣṭiṣu RVa staviṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ viśvasyāmṛta bhojana RVc agne trātāram amṛtam miyedhya yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana RVa suśaṃso bodhi gṛṇate yaviṣṭhya madhujihvaḥ svāhutaḥ RVc praskaṇvasya pratirann āyur jīvase namasyā daivyaṃ janam RVa hotāraṃ viśvavedasaṃ saṃ hi tvā viśa indhate RVc sa ā vaha puruhūta pracetaso gne devāṃ iha dravat RVa savitāram uṣasam aśvinā bhagam agniṃ vyuṣṭiṣu kṣapaḥ RVc kaṇvāsas tvā sutasomāsa indhate havyavāhaṃ svadhvara RVa patir hy adhvarāṇām agne dūto viśām asi RVc uṣarbudha ā vaha somapītaye devāṃ adya svardṛśaḥ RVa agne pūrvā anūṣaso vibhāvaso dīdetha viśvadarśataḥ RVc asi grāmeṣv avitā purohito si yajñeṣu mānuṣaḥ RVa ni tvā yajñasya sādhanam agne hotāram ṛtvijam RVc manuṣvad deva dhīmahi pracetasaṃ jīraṃ dūtam amartyam RVa yad devānām mitramahaḥ purohito ntaro yāsi dūtyam RVc sindhor iva prasvanitāsa ūrmayo gner bhrājante arcayaḥ RVa śrudhi śrutkarṇa vahnibhir devair agne sayāvabhiḥ RVc ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitro aryamā prātaryāvāṇo adhvaram RVa śṛṇvantu stomam marutaḥ sudānavo gnijihvā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ RVc pibatu somaṃ varuṇo dhṛtavrato śvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ RVa tvam agne vasūṃr iha rudrāṃ ādityāṃ uta RVc yajā svadhvaraṃ janam manujātaṃ ghṛtapruṣam RVa śruṣṭīvāno hi dāśuṣe devā agne vicetasaḥ RVc tān rohidaśva girvaṇas trayastriṃśatam ā vaha RVa priyamedhavad atrivaj jātavedo virūpavat RVc aṅgirasvan mahivrata praskaṇvasya śrudhī havam RVa mahikerava ūtaye priyamedhā ahūṣata RVc rājantam adhvarāṇām agniṃ śukreṇa śociṣā RVa ghṛtāhavana santyemā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ RVc yābhiḥ kaṇvasya sūnavo havante vase tvā RVa tvāṃ citraśravastama havante vikṣu jantavaḥ RVc śociṣkeśam purupriyāgne havyāya voḷhave RVa ni tvā hotāram ṛtvijaṃ dadhire vasuvittamam RVc śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ viprā agne diviṣṭiṣu RVa ā tvā viprā acucyavuḥ sutasomā abhi prayaḥ RVc bṛhad bhā bibhrato havir agne martāya dāśuṣe RVa prātaryāvṇaḥ sahaskṛta somapeyāya santya RVc ihādya daivyaṃ janam barhir ā sādayā vaso RVa arvāñcaṃ daivyaṃ janam agne yakṣva sahūtibhiḥ RVc ayaṃ somaḥ sudānavas tam pāta tiroahnyam RVa eṣo uṣā apūrvyā vy ucchati priyā divaḥ RVc stuṣe vām aśvinā bṛhat RVa yā dasrā sindhumātarā manotarā rayīṇām RVc dhiyā devā vasuvidā RVa vacyante vāṃ kakuhāso jūrṇāyām adhi viṣṭapi RVc yad vāṃ ratho vibhiṣ patāt RVa haviṣā jāro apām piparti papurir narā RVc pitā kuṭasya carṣaṇiḥ RVa ādāro vām matīnāṃ nāsatyā matavacasā RVc pātaṃ somasya dhṛṣṇuyā RVa yā naḥ pīparad aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamas tiraḥ RVc tām asme rāsāthām iṣam RVa ā no nāvā matīnāṃ yātam pārāya gantave RVc yuñjāthām aśvinā ratham RVa aritraṃ vāṃ divas pṛthu tīrthe sindhūnāṃ rathaḥ RVc dhiyā yuyujra indavaḥ RVa divas kaṇvāsa indavo vasu sindhūnām pade RVc svaṃ vavriṃ kuha dhitsathaḥ RVa abhūd u bhā u aṃśave hiraṇyam prati sūryaḥ RVc vy akhyaj jihvayāsitaḥ RVa abhūd u pāram etave panthā ṛtasya sādhuyā RVc adarśi vi srutir divaḥ RVa tattad id aśvinor avo jaritā prati bhūṣati RVc made somasya pipratoḥ RVa vāvasānā vivasvati somasya pītyā girā RVc manuṣvac chambhū ā gatam RVa yuvor uṣā anu śriyam parijmanor upācarat RVc ṛtā vanatho aktubhiḥ RVa ubhā pibatam aśvinobhā naḥ śarma yacchatam RVc avidriyābhir ūtibhiḥ RVa ayaṃ vām madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā RVc tam aśvinā pibataṃ tiroahnyaṃ dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe RVa trivandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā rathenā yātam aśvinā RVc kaṇvāso vām brahma kṛṇvanty adhvare teṣāṃ su śṛṇutaṃ havam RVa aśvinā madhumattamam pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā RVc athādya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam RVa triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśvavedasā madhvā yajñam mimikṣatam RVc kaṇvāso vāṃ sutasomā abhidyavo yuvāṃ havante aśvinā RVa yābhiḥ kaṇvam abhiṣṭibhiḥ prāvataṃ yuvam aśvinā RVc tābhiḥ ṣv asmāṃ avataṃ śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā RVa sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe pṛkṣo vahatam aśvinā RVc rayiṃ samudrād uta vā divas pary asme dhattam puruspṛham RVa yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhi turvaśe RVc ato rathena suvṛtā na ā gataṃ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ RVa arvāñcā vāṃ saptayo dhvaraśriyo vahantu savaned upa RVc iṣam pṛñcantā sukṛte sudānava ā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā RVa tena nāsatyā gataṃ rathena sūryatvacā RVc yena śaśvad ūhathur dāśuṣe vasu madhvaḥ somasya pītaye RVa ukthebhir arvāg avase purūvasū arkaiś ca ni hvayāmahe RVc śaśvat kaṇvānāṃ sadasi priye hi kaṃ somam papathur aśvinā RVa saha vāmena na uṣo vy ucchā duhitar divaḥ RVc saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari rāyā devi dāsvatī RVa aśvāvatīr gomatīr viśvasuvido bhūri cyavanta vastave RVc ud īraya prati mā sūnṛtā uṣaś coda rādho maghonām RVa uvāsoṣā ucchāc ca nu devī jīrā rathānām RVc ye asyā ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire samudre na śravasyavaḥ RVa uṣo ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate mano dānāya sūrayaḥ RVc atrāha tat kaṇva eṣāṃ kaṇvatamo nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām RVa ā ghā yoṣeva sūnary uṣā yāti prabhuñjatī RVc jarayantī vṛjanam padvad īyata ut pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ RVa vi yā sṛjati samanaṃ vy arthinaḥ padaṃ na vety odatī RVc vayo nakiṣ ṭe paptivāṃsa āsate vyuṣṭau vājinīvati RVa eṣāyukta parāvataḥ sūryasyodayanād adhi RVc śataṃ rathebhiḥ subhagoṣā iyaṃ vi yāty abhi mānuṣān RVa viśvam asyā nānāma cakṣase jagaj jyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī RVc apa dveṣo maghonī duhitā diva uṣā ucchad apa sridhaḥ RVa uṣa ā bhāhi bhānunā candreṇa duhitar divaḥ RVc āvahantī bhūry asmabhyaṃ saubhagaṃ vyucchantī diviṣṭiṣu RVa viśvasya hi prāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ tve vi yad ucchasi sūnari RVc sā no rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari śrudhi citrāmaghe havam RVa uṣo vājaṃ hi vaṃsva yaś citro mānuṣe jane RVc tenā vaha sukṛto adhvarāṃ upa ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ RVa viśvān devāṃ ā vaha somapītaye ntarikṣād uṣas tvam RVc sāsmāsu dhā gomad aśvāvad ukthyam uṣo vājaṃ suvīryam RVa yasyā ruśanto arcayaḥ prati bhadrā adṛkṣata RVc sā no rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ supeśasam uṣā dadātu sugmyam RVa ye cid dhi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrva ūtaye juhūre vase mahi RVc sā na stomāṃ abhi gṛṇīhi rādhasoṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā RVa uṣo yad adya bhānunā vi dvārāv ṛṇavo divaḥ RVc pra no yacchatād avṛkam pṛthu cchardiḥ pra devi gomatīr iṣaḥ RVa saṃ no rāyā bṛhatā viśvapeśasā mimikṣvā sam iḷābhir ā RVc saṃ dyumnena viśvaturoṣo mahi saṃ vājair vājinīvati RVa uṣo bhadrebhir ā gahi divaś cid rocanād adhi RVc vahantv aruṇapsava upa tvā somino gṛham RVa supeśasaṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ yam adhyasthā uṣas tvam RVc tenā suśravasaṃ janam prāvādya duhitar divaḥ RVa vayaś cit te patatriṇo dvipac catuṣpad arjuni RVc uṣaḥ prārann ṛtūṃr anu divo antebhyas pari RVa vyucchantī hi raśmibhir viśvam ābhāsi rocanam RVc tāṃ tvām uṣar vasūyavo gīrbhiḥ kaṇvā ahūṣata RVa ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ RVc dṛśe viśvāya sūryam RVa apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yanty aktubhiḥ RVc sūrāya viśvacakṣase RVa adṛśram asya ketavo vi raśmayo janāṃ anu RVc bhrājanto agnayo yathā RVa taraṇir viśvadarśato jyotiṣkṛd asi sūrya RVc viśvam ā bhāsi rocanam RVa pratyaṅ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ ud eṣi mānuṣān RVc pratyaṅ viśvaṃ svar dṛśe RVa yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janāṃ anu RVc tvaṃ varuṇa paśyasi RVa vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthv ahā mimāno aktubhiḥ RVc paśyañ janmāni sūrya RVa sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya RVc śociṣkeśaṃ vicakṣaṇa RVa ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ RVc tābhir yāti svayuktibhiḥ RVa ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram RVc devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam RVa udyann adya mitramaha ārohann uttarāṃ divam RVc hṛdrogam mama sūrya harimāṇaṃ ca nāśaya RVa śukeṣu me harimāṇaṃ ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi RVc atho hāridraveṣu me harimāṇaṃ ni dadhmasi RVa ud agād ayam ādityo viśvena sahasā saha RVc dviṣantam mahyaṃ randhayan mo ahaṃ dviṣate radham RVa abhi tyam meṣam puruhūtam ṛgmiyam indraṃ gīrbhir madatā vasvo arṇavam RVc yasya dyāvo na vicaranti mānuṣā bhuje maṃhiṣṭham abhi vipram arcata RVa abhīm avanvan svabhiṣṭim ūtayo ntarikṣaprāṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtam RVc indraṃ dakṣāsa ṛbhavo madacyutaṃ śatakratuṃ javanī sūnṛtāruhat RVa tvaṃ gotram aṅgirobhyo vṛṇor apotātraye śatadureṣu gātuvit RVc sasena cid vimadāyāvaho vasv ājāv adriṃ vāvasānasya nartayan RVa tvam apām apidhānāvṛṇor apādhārayaḥ parvate dānumad vasu RVc vṛtraṃ yad indra śavasāvadhīr ahim ād it sūryaṃ divy ārohayo dṛśe RVa tvam māyābhir apa māyino dhamaḥ svadhābhir ye adhi śuptāv ajuhvata RVc tvam pipror nṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra ṛjiśvānaṃ dasyuhatyeṣv āvitha RVa tvaṃ kutsaṃ śuṣṇahatyeṣv āvithārandhayo tithigvāya śambaram RVc mahāntaṃ cid arbudaṃ ni kramīḥ padā sanād eva dasyuhatyāya jajñiṣe RVa tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryag ghitā tava rādhaḥ somapīthāya harṣate RVc tava vajraś cikite bāhvor hito vṛścā śatror ava viśvāni vṛṣṇyā RVa vi jānīhy āryān ye ca dasyavo barhiṣmate randhayā śāsad avratān RVc śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā viśvet tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana RVa anuvratāya randhayann apavratān ābhūbhir indraḥ śnathayann anābhuvaḥ RVc vṛddhasya cid vardhato dyām inakṣata stavāno vamro vi jaghāna saṃdihaḥ RVa takṣad yat ta uśanā sahasā saho vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ RVc ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇo manoyuja ā pūryamāṇam avahann abhi śravaḥ RVa mandiṣṭa yad uśane kāvye sacāṃ indro vaṅkū vaṅkutarādhi tiṣṭhati RVc ugro yayiṃ nir apaḥ srotasāsṛjad vi śuṣṇasya dṛṃhitā airayat puraḥ RVa ā smā rathaṃ vṛṣapāṇeṣu tiṣṭhasi śāryātasya prabhṛtā yeṣu mandase RVc indra yathā sutasomeṣu cākano narvāṇaṃ ślokam ā rohase divi RVa adadā arbhām mahate vacasyave kakṣīvate vṛcayām indra sunvate RVc menābhavo vṛṣaṇaśvasya sukrato viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā RVa indro aśrāyi sudhyo nireke pajreṣu stomo duryo na yūpaḥ RVc aśvayur gavyū rathayur vasūyur indra id rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā RVa idaṃ namo vṛṣabhāya svarāje satyaśuṣmāya tavase vāci RVc asminn indra vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ smat sūribhis tava śarman syāma RVa tyaṃ su meṣam mahayā svarvidaṃ śataṃ yasya subhvaḥ sākam īrate RVc atyaṃ na vājaṃ havanasyadaṃ ratham endraṃ vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ RVa sa parvato na dharuṇeṣv acyutaḥ sahasramūtis taviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe RVc indro yad vṛtram avadhīn nadīvṛtam ubjann arṇāṃsi jarhṛṣāṇo andhasā RVa sa hi dvaro dvariṣu vavra ūdhani candrabudhno madavṛddho manīṣibhiḥ RVc indraṃ tam ahve svapasyayā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭharātiṃ sa hi paprir andhasaḥ RVa ā yam pṛṇanti divi sadmabarhiṣaḥ samudraṃ na subhvaḥ svā abhiṣṭayaḥ RVc taṃ vṛtrahatye anu tasthur ūtayaḥ śuṣmā indram avātā ahrutapsavaḥ RVa abhi svavṛṣṭim made asya yudhyato raghvīr iva pravaṇe sasrur ūtayaḥ RVc indro yad vajrī dhṛṣamāṇo andhasā bhinad valasya paridhīṃr iva tritaḥ RVa parīṃ ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavo po vṛtvī rajaso budhnam āśayat RVc vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvano nijaghantha hanvor indra tanyatum RVa hradaṃ na hi tvā nyṛṣanty ūrmayo brahmāṇīndra tava yāni vardhanā RVc tvaṣṭā cit te yujyaṃ vāvṛdhe śavas tatakṣa vajram abhibhūtyojasam RVa jaghanvāṃ u haribhiḥ sambhṛtakratav indra vṛtram manuṣe gātuyann apaḥ RVc ayacchathā bāhvor vajram āyasam adhārayo divy ā sūryaṃ dṛśe RVa bṛhat svaścandram amavad yad ukthyam akṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇaṃ divaḥ RVc yan mānuṣapradhanā indram ūtayaḥ svar nṛṣāco maruto madann anu RVa dyauś cid asyāmavāṃ aheḥ svanād ayoyavīd bhiyasā vajra indra te RVc vṛtrasya yad badbadhānasya rodasī made sutasya śavasābhinac chiraḥ RVa yad in nv indra pṛthivī daśabhujir ahāni viśvā tatananta kṛṣṭayaḥ RVc atrāha te maghavan viśrutaṃ saho dyām anu śavasā barhaṇā bhuvat RVa tvam asya pāre rajaso vyomanaḥ svabhūtyojā avase dhṛṣanmanaḥ RVc cakṛṣe bhūmim pratimānam ojaso paḥ svaḥ paribhūr eṣy ā divam RVa tvam bhuvaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyā ṛṣvavīrasya bṛhataḥ patir bhūḥ RVc viśvam āprā antarikṣam mahitvā satyam addhā nakir anyas tvāvān RVa na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyaco na sindhavo rajaso antam ānaśuḥ RVc nota svavṛṣṭim made asya yudhyata eko anyac cakṛṣe viśvam ānuṣak RVa ārcann atra marutaḥ sasminn ājau viśve devāso amadann anu tvā RVc vṛtrasya yad bhṛṣṭimatā vadhena ni tvam indra praty ānaṃ jaghantha RVa ny ū ṣu vācam pra mahe bharāmahe gira indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ RVc nū cid dhi ratnaṃ sasatām ivāvidan na duṣṭutir draviṇodeṣu śasyate RVa duro aśvasya dura indra gor asi duro yavasya vasuna inas patiḥ RVc śikṣānaraḥ pradivo akāmakarśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyas tam idaṃ gṛṇīmasi RVa śacīva indra purukṛd dyumattama taved idam abhitaś cekite vasu RVc ataḥ saṃgṛbhyābhibhūta ā bhara mā tvāyato jarituḥ kāmam ūnayīḥ RVa ebhir dyubhiḥ sumanā ebhir indubhir nirundhāno amatiṃ gobhir aśvinā RVc indreṇa dasyuṃ darayanta indubhir yutadveṣasaḥ sam iṣā rabhemahi RVa sam indra rāyā sam iṣā rabhemahi saṃ vājebhiḥ puruścandrair abhidyubhiḥ RVc saṃ devyā pramatyā vīraśuṣmayā goagrayāśvāvatyā rabhemahi RVa te tvā madā amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāso vṛtrahatyeṣu satpate RVc yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇy aprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ RVa yudhā yudham upa ghed eṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puraṃ sam idaṃ haṃsy ojasā RVc namyā yad indra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayo namuciṃ nāma māyinam RVa tvaṃ karañjam uta parṇayaṃ vadhīs tejiṣṭhayātithigvasya vartanī RVc tvaṃ śatā vaṅgṛdasyābhinat puro nānudaḥ pariṣūtā ṛjiśvanā RVa tvam etāñ janarājño dvir daśābandhunā suśravasopajagmuṣaḥ RVc ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā navatiṃ nava śruto ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadāvṛṇak RVa tvam āvitha suśravasaṃ tavotibhis tava trāmabhir indra tūrvayāṇam RVc tvam asmai kutsam atithigvam āyum mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ RVa ya udṛcīndra devagopāḥ sakhāyas te śivatamā asāma RVc tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ RVa mā no asmin maghavan pṛtsv aṃhasi nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe RVc akrandayo nadyo roruvad vanā kathā na kṣoṇīr bhiyasā sam ārata RVa arcā śakrāya śākine śacīvate śṛṇvantam indram mahayann abhi ṣṭuhi RVc yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe vṛṣā vṛṣatvā vṛṣabho nyṛñjate RVa arcā dive bṛhate śūṣyaṃ vacaḥ svakṣatraṃ yasya dhṛṣato dhṛṣan manaḥ RVc bṛhacchravā asuro barhaṇā kṛtaḥ puro haribhyāṃ vṛṣabho ratho hi ṣaḥ RVa tvaṃ divo bṛhataḥ sānu kopayo va tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaram bhinat RVc yan māyino vrandino mandinā dhṛṣac chitāṃ gabhastim aśanim pṛtanyasi RVa ni yad vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani śuṣṇasya cid vrandino roruvad vanā RVc prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā yad adyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kas tvā pari RVa tvam āvitha naryaṃ turvaśaṃ yaduṃ tvaṃ turvītiṃ vayyaṃ śatakrato RVc tvaṃ ratham etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane tvam puro navatiṃ dambhayo nava RVa sa ghā rājā satpatiḥ śūśuvaj jano rātahavyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsam invati RVc ukthā vā yo abhigṛṇāti rādhasā dānur asmā uparā pinvate divaḥ RVa asamaṃ kṣatram asamā manīṣā pra somapā apasā santu neme RVc ye ta indra daduṣo vardhayanti mahi kṣatraṃ sthaviraṃ vṛṣṇyaṃ ca RVa tubhyed ete bahulā adridugdhāś camūṣadaś camasā indrapānāḥ RVc vy aśnuhi tarpayā kāmam eṣām athā mano vasudeyāya kṛṣva RVa apām atiṣṭhad dharuṇahvaraṃ tamo ntar vṛtrasya jaṭhareṣu parvataḥ RVc abhīm indro nadyo vavriṇā hitā viśvā anuṣṭhāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate RVa sa śevṛdham adhi dhā dyumnam asme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḷ indra tavyam RVc rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ RVa divaś cid asya varimā vi papratha indraṃ na mahnā pṛthivī cana prati RVc bhīmas tuviṣmāñ carṣaṇibhya ātapaḥ śiśīte vajraṃ tejase na vaṃsagaḥ RVa so arṇavo na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti viśritā varīmabhiḥ RVc indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate sanāt sa yudhma ojasā panasyate RVa tvaṃ tam indra parvataṃ na bhojase maho nṛmṇasya dharmaṇām irajyasi RVc pra vīryeṇa devatāti cekite viśvasmā ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ RVa sa id vane namasyubhir vacasyate cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇa indriyam RVc vṛṣā chandur bhavati haryato vṛṣā kṣemeṇa dhenām maghavā yad invati RVa sa in mahāni samithāni majmanā kṛṇoti yudhma ojasā janebhyaḥ RVc adhā cana śrad dadhati tviṣīmata indrāya vajraṃ nighanighnate vadham RVa sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā kṣmayā vṛdhāna ojasā vināśayan RVc jyotīṃṣi kṛṇvann avṛkāṇi yajyave va sukratuḥ sartavā apaḥ sṛjat RVa dānāya manaḥ somapāvann astu te rvāñcā harī vandanaśrud ā kṛdhi RVc yamiṣṭhāsaḥ sārathayo ya indra te na tvā ketā ā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ RVa aprakṣitaṃ vasu bibharṣi hastayor aṣāḷhaṃ sahas tanvi śruto dadhe RVc āvṛtāso vatāso na kartṛbhis tanūṣu te kratava indra bhūrayaḥ RVa eṣa pra pūrvīr ava tasya camriṣo tyo na yoṣām ud ayaṃsta bhurvaṇiḥ RVc dakṣam mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayaṃ ratham āvṛtyā hariyogam ṛbhvasam RVa taṃ gūrtayo nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ RVc patiṃ dakṣasya vidathasya nū saho giriṃ na venā adhi roha tejasā RVa sa turvaṇir mahāṃ areṇu pauṃsye girer bhṛṣṭir na bhrājate tujā śavaḥ RVc yena śuṣṇam māyinam āyaso made dudhra ābhūṣu rāmayan ni dāmani RVa devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhotaya indraṃ siṣakty uṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ RVc yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tama iyarti reṇum bṛhad arhariṣvaṇiḥ RVa vi yat tiro dharuṇam acyutaṃ rajo tiṣṭhipo diva ātāsu barhaṇā RVc svarmīḷhe yan mada indra harṣyāhan vṛtraṃ nir apām aubjo arṇavam RVa tvaṃ divo dharuṇaṃ dhiṣa ojasā pṛthivyā indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ RVc tvaṃ sutasya made ariṇā apo vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyārujaḥ RVa pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satyaśuṣmāya tavase matim bhare RVc apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharaṃ rādho viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam RVa adha te viśvam anu hāsad iṣṭaya āpo nimneva savanā haviṣmataḥ RVc yat parvate na samaśīta haryata indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ RVa asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvara uṣo na śubhra ā bharā panīyase RVc yasya dhāma śravase nāmendriyaṃ jyotir akāri harito nāyase RVa ime ta indra te vayam puruṣṭuta ye tvārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso RVc nahi tvad anyo girvaṇo giraḥ saghat kṣoṇīr iva prati no harya tad vacaḥ RVa bhūri ta indra vīryaṃ tava smasy asya stotur maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa RVc anu te dyaur bṛhatī vīryam mama iyaṃ ca te pṛthivī nema ojase RVa tvaṃ tam indra parvatam mahām uruṃ vajreṇa vajrin parvaśaś cakartitha RVc avāsṛjo nivṛtāḥ sartavā apaḥ satrā viśvaṃ dadhiṣe kevalaṃ sahaḥ RVa nū cit sahojā amṛto ni tundate hotā yad dūto abhavad vivasvataḥ RVc vi sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhī rajo mama ā devatātā haviṣā vivāsati RVa ā svam adma yuvamāno ajaras tṛṣv aviṣyann ataseṣu tiṣṭhati RVc atyo na pṛṣṭham pruṣitasya rocate divo na sānu stanayann acikradat RVa krāṇā rudrebhir vasubhiḥ purohito hotā niṣatto rayiṣāḷ amartyaḥ RVc ratho na vikṣv ṛñjasāna āyuṣu vy ānuṣag vāryā deva ṛṇvati RVa vi vātajūto ataseṣu tiṣṭhate vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ RVc tṛṣu yad agne vanino vṛṣāyase kṛṣṇaṃ ta ema ruśadūrme ajara RVa tapurjambho vana ā vātacodito yūthe na sāhvāṃ ava vāti vaṃsagaḥ RVc abhivrajann akṣitam pājasā raja sthātuś caratham bhayate patatriṇaḥ RVa dadhuṣ ṭvā bhṛgavo mānuṣeṣv ā rayiṃ na cāruṃ suhavaṃ janebhyaḥ RVc hotāram agne atithiṃ vareṇyam mitraṃ na śevaṃ divyāya janmane RVa hotāraṃ sapta juhvo yajiṣṭhaṃ yaṃ vāghato vṛṇate adhvareṣu RVc agniṃ viśveṣām aratiṃ vasūnāṃ saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam RVa acchidrā sūno sahaso no adya stotṛbhyo mitramahaḥ śarma yaccha RVc agne gṛṇantam aṃhasa uruṣyorjo napāt pūrbhir āyasībhiḥ RVa bhavā varūthaṃ gṛṇate vibhāvo bhavā maghavan maghavadbhyaḥ śarma RVc uruṣyāgne aṃhaso gṛṇantam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt RVa vayā id agne agnayas te anye tve viśve amṛtā mādayante RVc vaiśvānara nābhir asi kṣitīnāṃ sthūṇeva janāṃ upamid yayantha RVa mūrdhā divo nābhir agniḥ pṛthivyā athābhavad aratī rodasyoḥ RVc taṃ tvā devāso janayanta devaṃ vaiśvānara jyotir id āryāya RVa ā sūrye na raśmayo dhruvāso vaiśvānare dadhire gnā vasūni RVc yā parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu yā mānuṣeṣv asi tasya rājā RVa bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī giro hotā manuṣyo na dakṣaḥ RVc svarvate satyaśuṣmāya pūrvīr vaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ RVa divaś cit te bṛhato jātavedo vaiśvānara pra ririce mahitvam RVc rājā kṛṣṭīnām asi mānuṣīṇāṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaś cakartha RVa pra nū mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasya vocaṃ yam pūravo vṛtrahaṇaṃ sacante RVc vaiśvānaro dasyum agnir jaghanvāṃ adhūnot kāṣṭhā ava śambaram bhet RVa vaiśvānaro mahimnā viśvakṛṣṭir bharadvājeṣu yajato vibhāvā RVc śātavaneye śatinībhir agniḥ puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān RVa vahniṃ yaśasaṃ vidathasya ketuṃ suprāvyaṃ dūtaṃ sadyoartham RVc dvijanmānaṃ rayim iva praśastaṃ rātim bharad bhṛgave mātariśvā RVa asya śāsur ubhayāsaḥ sacante haviṣmanta uśijo ye ca martāḥ RVc divaś cit pūrvo ny asādi hotāpṛcchyo viśpatir vikṣu vedhāḥ RVa taṃ navyasī hṛda ā jāyamānam asmat sukīrtir madhujihvam aśyāḥ RVc yam ṛtvijo vṛjane mānuṣāsaḥ prayasvanta āyavo jījananta RVa uśik pāvako vasur mānuṣeṣu vareṇyo hotādhāyi vikṣu RVc damūnā gṛhapatir dama āṃ agnir bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām RVa taṃ tvā vayam patim agne rayīṇām pra śaṃsāmo matibhir gotamāsaḥ RVc āśuṃ na vājambharam marjayantaḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt RVa asmā id u pra tavase turāya prayo na harmi stomam māhināya RVc ṛcīṣamāyādhrigava oham indrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā RVa asmā id u praya iva pra yaṃsi bharāmy āṅgūṣam bādhe suvṛkti RVc indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyo marjayanta RVa asmā id u tyam upamaṃ svarṣām bharāmy āṅgūṣam āsyena RVc maṃhiṣṭham acchoktibhir matīnāṃ suvṛktibhiḥ sūriṃ vāvṛdhadhyai RVa asmā id u stomaṃ saṃ hinomi rathaṃ na taṣṭeva tatsināya RVc giraś ca girvāhase suvṛktīndrāya viśvaminvam medhirāya RVa asmā id u saptim iva śravasyendrāyārkaṃ juhvā sam añje RVc vīraṃ dānaukasaṃ vandadhyai purāṃ gūrtaśravasaṃ darmāṇam RVa asmā id u tvaṣṭā takṣad vajraṃ svapastamaṃ svaryaṃ raṇāya RVc vṛtrasya cid vidad yena marma tujann īśānas tujatā kiyedhāḥ RVa asyed u mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyo mahaḥ pitum papivāñ cārv annā RVc muṣāyad viṣṇuḥ pacataṃ sahīyān vidhyad varāhaṃ tiro adrim astā RVa asmā id u gnāś cid devapatnīr indrāyārkam ahihatya ūvuḥ RVc pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhra urvī nāsya te mahimānam pari ṣṭaḥ RVa asyed eva pra ririce mahitvaṃ divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt RVc svarāḷ indro dama ā viśvagūrtaḥ svarir amatro vavakṣe raṇāya RVa asyed eva śavasā śuṣantaṃ vi vṛścad vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ RVc gā na vrāṇā avanīr amuñcad abhi śravo dāvane sacetāḥ RVa asyed u tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yad vajreṇa sīm ayacchat RVc īśānakṛd dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādhaṃ turvaṇiḥ kaḥ RVa asmā id u pra bharā tūtujāno vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ RVc gor na parva vi radā tiraśceṣyann arṇāṃsy apāṃ caradhyai RVa asyed u pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navya ukthaiḥ RVc yudhe yad iṣṇāna āyudhāny ṛghāyamāṇo niriṇāti śatrūn RVa asyed u bhiyā girayaś ca dṛḷhā dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣas tujete RVc upo venasya joguvāna oṇiṃ sadyo bhuvad vīryāya nodhāḥ RVa asmā id u tyad anu dāyy eṣām eko yad vavne bhūrer īśānaḥ RVc praitaśaṃ sūrye paspṛdhānaṃ sauvaśvye suṣvim āvad indraḥ RVa evā te hāriyojanā suvṛktīndra brahmāṇi gotamāso akran RVc aiṣu viśvapeśasaṃ dhiyaṃ dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt RVa pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣam āṅgūṣaṃ girvaṇase aṅgirasvat RVc suvṛktibhi stuvata ṛgmiyāyārcāmārkaṃ nare viśrutāya RVa pra vo mahe mahi namo bharadhvam āṅgūṣyaṃ śavasānāya sāma RVc yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñā arcanto aṅgiraso gā avindan RVa indrasyāṅgirasāṃ ceṣṭau vidat saramā tanayāya dhāsim RVc bṛhaspatir bhinad adriṃ vidad gāḥ sam usriyābhir vāvaśanta naraḥ RVa sa suṣṭubhā sa stubhā sapta vipraiḥ svareṇādriṃ svaryo navagvaiḥ RVc saraṇyubhiḥ phaligam indra śakra valaṃ raveṇa darayo daśagvaiḥ RVa gṛṇāno aṅgirobhir dasma vi var uṣasā sūryeṇa gobhir andhaḥ RVc vi bhūmyā aprathaya indra sānu divo raja uparam astabhāyaḥ RVa tad u prayakṣatamam asya karma dasmasya cārutamam asti daṃsaḥ RVc upahvare yad uparā apinvan madhvarṇaso nadyaś catasraḥ RVa dvitā vi vavre sanajā sanīḷe ayāsya stavamānebhir arkaiḥ RVc bhago na mene parame vyomann adhārayad rodasī sudaṃsāḥ RVa sanād divam pari bhūmā virūpe punarbhuvā yuvatī svebhir evaiḥ RVc kṛṣṇebhir aktoṣā ruśadbhir vapurbhir ā carato anyānyā RVa sanemi sakhyaṃ svapasyamānaḥ sūnur dādhāra śavasā sudaṃsāḥ RVc āmāsu cid dadhiṣe pakvam antaḥ payaḥ kṛṣṇāsu ruśad rohiṇīṣu RVa sanāt sanīḷā avanīr avātā vratā rakṣante amṛtāḥ sahobhiḥ RVc purū sahasrā janayo na patnīr duvasyanti svasāro ahrayāṇam RVa sanāyuvo namasā navyo arkair vasūyavo matayo dasma dadruḥ RVc patiṃ na patnīr uśatīr uśantaṃ spṛśanti tvā śavasāvan manīṣāḥ RVa sanād eva tava rāyo gabhastau na kṣīyante nopa dasyanti dasma RVc dyumāṃ asi kratumāṃ indra dhīraḥ śikṣā śacīvas tava naḥ śacībhiḥ RVa sanāyate gotama indra navyam atakṣad brahma hariyojanāya RVc sunīthāya naḥ śavasāna nodhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt RVa tvam mahāṃ indra yo ha śuṣmair dyāvā jajñānaḥ pṛthivī ame dhāḥ RVc yad dha te viśvā girayaś cid abhvā bhiyā dṛḷhāsaḥ kiraṇā naijan RVa ā yad dharī indra vivratā ver ā te vajraṃ jaritā bāhvor dhāt RVc yenāviharyatakrato amitrān pura iṣṇāsi puruhūta pūrvīḥ RVa tvaṃ satya indra dhṛṣṇur etān tvam ṛbhukṣā naryas tvaṃ ṣāṭ RVc tvaṃ śuṣṇaṃ vṛjane pṛkṣa āṇau yūne kutsāya dyumate sacāhan RVa tvaṃ ha tyad indra codīḥ sakhā vṛtraṃ yad vajrin vṛṣakarmann ubhnāḥ RVc yad dha śūra vṛṣamaṇaḥ parācair vi dasyūṃr yonāv akṛto vṛthāṣāṭ RVa tvaṃ ha tyad indrāriṣaṇyan dṛḷhasya cin martānām ajuṣṭau RVc vy asmad ā kāṣṭhā arvate var ghaneva vajriñ chnathihy amitrān RVa tvāṃ ha tyad indrārṇasātau svarmīḷhe nara ājā havante RVc tava svadhāva iyam ā samarya ūtir vājeṣv atasāyyā bhūt RVa tvaṃ ha tyad indra sapta yudhyan puro vajrin purukutsāya dardaḥ RVc barhir na yat sudāse vṛthā varg aṃho rājan varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ RVa tvaṃ tyāṃ na indra deva citrām iṣam āpo na pīpayaḥ parijman RVc yayā śūra praty asmabhyaṃ yaṃsi tmanam ūrjaṃ na viśvadha kṣaradhyai RVa akāri ta indra gotamebhir brahmāṇy oktā namasā haribhyām RVc supeśasaṃ vājam ā bharā naḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt RVa vṛṣṇe śardhāya sumakhāya vedhase nodhaḥ suvṛktim pra bharā marudbhyaḥ RVc apo na dhīro manasā suhastyo giraḥ sam añje vidatheṣv ābhuvaḥ RVa te jajñire diva ṛṣvāsa ukṣaṇo rudrasya maryā asurā arepasaḥ RVc pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryā iva satvāno na drapsino ghoravarpasaḥ RVa yuvāno rudrā ajarā abhogghano vavakṣur adhrigāvaḥ parvatā iva RVc dṛḷhā cid viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā pra cyāvayanti divyāni majmanā RVa citrair añjibhir vapuṣe vy añjate vakṣassu rukmāṃ adhi yetire śubhe RVc aṃseṣv eṣāṃ ni mimṛkṣur ṛṣṭayaḥ sākaṃ jajñire svadhayā divo naraḥ RVa īśānakṛto dhunayo riśādaso vātān vidyutas taviṣībhir akrata RVc duhanty ūdhar divyāni dhūtayo bhūmim pinvanti payasā parijrayaḥ RVa pinvanty apo marutaḥ sudānavaḥ payo ghṛtavad vidatheṣv ābhuvaḥ RVc atyaṃ na mihe vi nayanti vājinam utsaṃ duhanti stanayantam akṣitam RVa mahiṣāso māyinaś citrabhānavo girayo na svatavaso raghuṣyadaḥ RVc mṛgā iva hastinaḥ khādathā vanā yad āruṇīṣu taviṣīr ayugdhvam RVa siṃhā iva nānadati pracetasaḥ piśā iva supiśo viśvavedasaḥ RVc kṣapo jinvantaḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ sam it sabādhaḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ RVa rodasī ā vadatā gaṇaśriyo nṛṣācaḥ śūrāḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ RVc ā vandhureṣv amatir na darśatā vidyun na tasthau maruto ratheṣu vaḥ RVa viśvavedaso rayibhiḥ samokasaḥ sammiślāsas taviṣībhir virapśinaḥ RVc astāra iṣuṃ dadhire gabhastyor anantaśuṣmā vṛṣakhādayo naraḥ RVa hiraṇyayebhiḥ pavibhiḥ payovṛdha ujjighnanta āpathyo na parvatān RVc makhā ayāsaḥ svasṛto dhruvacyuto dudhrakṛto maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ RVa ghṛṣum pāvakaṃ vaninaṃ vicarṣaṇiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā gṛṇīmasi RVc rajasturaṃ tavasam mārutaṃ gaṇam ṛjīṣiṇaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ saścata śriye RVa pra nū sa martaḥ śavasā janāṃ ati tasthau va ūtī maruto yam āvata RVc arvadbhir vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhir āpṛcchyaṃ kratum ā kṣeti puṣyati RVa carkṛtyam marutaḥ pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ dyumantaṃ śuṣmam maghavatsu dhattana RVc dhanaspṛtam ukthyaṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ tokam puṣyema tanayaṃ śataṃ himāḥ RVa nū ṣṭhiram maruto vīravantam ṛtīṣāhaṃ rayim asmāsu dhatta RVc sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃ śūśuvāṃsam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt RV paśvā na tāyuṃ guhā catantaṃ namo yujānaṃ namo vahantam RV sajoṣā dhīrāḥ padair anu gmann upa tvā sīdan viśve yajatrāḥ RV ṛtasya devā anu vratā gur bhuvat pariṣṭir dyaur na bhūma RV vardhantīm āpaḥ panvā suśiśvim ṛtasya yonā garbhe sujātam RV puṣṭir na raṇvā kṣitir na pṛthvī girir na bhujma kṣodo na śambhu RV atyo nājman sargaprataktaḥ sindhur na kṣodaḥ ka īṃ varāte RV jāmiḥ sindhūnām bhrāteva svasrām ibhyān na rājā vanāny atti RV yad vātajūto vanā vy asthād agnir ha dāti romā pṛthivyāḥ RV śvasity apsu haṃso na sīdan kratvā cetiṣṭho viśām uṣarbhut RV somo na vedhā ṛtaprajātaḥ paśur na śiśvā vibhur dūrebhāḥ RV rayir na citrā sūro na saṃdṛg āyur na prāṇo nityo na sūnuḥ RV takvā na bhūrṇir vanā siṣakti payo na dhenuḥ śucir vibhāvā RV dādhāra kṣemam oko na raṇvo yavo na pakvo jetā janānām RV ṛṣir na stubhvā vikṣu praśasto vājī na prīto vayo dadhāti RV durokaśociḥ kratur na nityo jāyeva yonāv araṃ viśvasmai RV citro yad abhrāṭ chveto na vikṣu ratho na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu RV seneva sṛṣṭāmaṃ dadhāty astur na didyut tveṣapratīkā RV yamo ha jāto yamo janitvaṃ jāraḥ kanīnām patir janīnām RV taṃ vaś carāthā vayaṃ vasatyāstaṃ na gāvo nakṣanta iddham RV sindhur na kṣodaḥ pra nīcīr ainon navanta gāvaḥ svar dṛśīke RV vaneṣu jāyur marteṣu mitro vṛṇīte śruṣṭiṃ rājevājuryam RV kṣemo na sādhuḥ kratur na bhadro bhuvat svādhīr hotā havyavāṭ RV haste dadhāno nṛmṇā viśvāny ame devān dhād guhā niṣīdan RV vidantīm atra naro dhiyandhā hṛdā yat taṣṭān mantrāṃ aśaṃsan RV ajo na kṣāṃ dādhāra pṛthivīṃ tastambha dyām mantrebhiḥ satyaiḥ RV priyā padāni paśvo ni pāhi viśvāyur agne guhā guhaṃ gāḥ RV ya īṃ ciketa guhā bhavantam ā yaḥ sasāda dhārām ṛtasya RV vi ye cṛtanty ṛtā sapanta ād id vasūni pra vavācāsmai RV vi yo vīrutsu rodhan mahitvota prajā uta prasūṣv antaḥ RV cittir apāṃ dame viśvāyuḥ sadmeva dhīrāḥ sammāya cakruḥ RV śrīṇann upa sthād divam bhuraṇyu sthātuś caratham aktūn vy ūrṇot RV pari yad eṣām eko viśveṣām bhuvad devo devānām mahitvā RV ād it te viśve kratuṃ juṣanta śuṣkād yad deva jīvo janiṣṭhāḥ RV bhajanta viśve devatvaṃ nāma ṛtaṃ sapanto amṛtam evaiḥ RV ṛtasya preṣā ṛtasya dhītir viśvāyur viśve apāṃsi cakruḥ RV yas tubhyaṃ dāśād yo vā te śikṣāt tasmai cikitvān rayiṃ dayasva RV hotā niṣatto manor apatye sa cin nv āsām patī rayīṇām RV icchanta reto mithas tanūṣu saṃ jānata svair dakṣair amūrāḥ RV pitur na putrāḥ kratuṃ juṣanta śroṣan ye asya śāsaṃ turāsaḥ RV vi rāya aurṇod duraḥ purukṣuḥ pipeśa nākaṃ stṛbhir damūnāḥ RV śukraḥ śuśukvāṃ uṣo na jāraḥ paprā samīcī divo na jyotiḥ RV pari prajātaḥ kratvā babhūtha bhuvo devānām pitā putraḥ san RV vedhā adṛpto agnir vijānann ūdhar na gonāṃ svādmā pitūnām RV jane na śeva āhūryaḥ san madhye niṣatto raṇvo duroṇe RV putro na jāto raṇvo duroṇe vājī na prīto viśo vi tārīt RV viśo yad ahve nṛbhiḥ sanīḷā agnir devatvā viśvāny aśyāḥ RV nakiṣ ṭa etā vratā minanti nṛbhyo yad ebhyaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakartha RV tat tu te daṃso yad ahan samānair nṛbhir yad yukto vive rapāṃsi RV uṣo na jāro vibhāvosraḥ saṃjñātarūpaś ciketad asmai RV tmanā vahanto duro vy ṛṇvan navanta viśve svar dṛśīke RV vanema pūrvīr aryo manīṣā agniḥ suśoko viśvāny aśyāḥ RV ā daivyāni vratā cikitvān ā mānuṣasya janasya janma RV garbho yo apāṃ garbho vanānāṃ garbhaś ca sthātāṃ garbhaś carathām RV adrau cid asmā antar duroṇe viśāṃ na viśvo amṛtaḥ svādhīḥ RV sa hi kṣapāvāṃ agnī rayīṇāṃ dāśad yo asmā araṃ sūktaiḥ RV etā cikitvo bhūmā ni pāhi devānāṃ janma martāṃś ca vidvān RV vardhān yam pūrvīḥ kṣapo virūpā sthātuś ca ratham ṛtapravītam RV arādhi hotā svar niṣattaḥ kṛṇvan viśvāny apāṃsi satyā RV goṣu praśastiṃ vaneṣu dhiṣe bharanta viśve baliṃ svar ṇaḥ RV vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan pitur na jivrer vi vedo bharanta RV sādhur na gṛdhnur asteva śūro yāteva bhīmas tveṣaḥ samatsu RVa upa pra jinvann uśatīr uśantam patiṃ na nityaṃ janayaḥ sanīḷāḥ RVc svasāraḥ śyāvīm aruṣīm ajuṣrañ citram ucchantīm uṣasaṃ na gāvaḥ RVa vīḷu cid dṛḷhā pitaro na ukthair adriṃ rujann aṅgiraso raveṇa RVc cakrur divo bṛhato gātum asme ahaḥ svar vividuḥ ketum usrāḥ RVa dadhann ṛtaṃ dhanayann asya dhītim ād id aryo didhiṣvo vibhṛtrāḥ RVc atṛṣyantīr apaso yanty acchā devāñ janma prayasā vardhayantīḥ RVa mathīd yad īṃ vibhṛto mātariśvā gṛhegṛhe śyeto jenyo bhūt RVc ād īṃ rājñe na sahīyase sacā sann ā dūtyam bhṛgavāṇo vivāya RVa mahe yat pitra īṃ rasaṃ dive kar ava tsarat pṛśanyaś cikitvān RVc sṛjad astā dhṛṣatā didyum asmai svāyāṃ devo duhitari tviṣiṃ dhāt RVa sva ā yas tubhyaṃ dama ā vibhāti namo vā dāśād uśato anu dyūn RVc vardho agne vayo asya dvibarhā yāsad rāyā sarathaṃ yaṃ junāsi RVa agniṃ viśvā abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante samudraṃ na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ RVc na jāmibhir vi cikite vayo no vidā deveṣu pramatiṃ cikitvān RVa ā yad iṣe nṛpatiṃ teja ānaṭ chuci reto niṣiktaṃ dyaur abhīke RVc agniḥ śardham anavadyaṃ yuvānaṃ svādhyaṃ janayat sūdayac ca RVa mano na yo dhvanaḥ sadya ety ekaḥ satrā sūro vasva īśe RVc rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī goṣu priyam amṛtaṃ rakṣamāṇā RVa mā no agne sakhyā pitryāṇi pra marṣiṣṭhā abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san RVc nabho na rūpaṃ jarimā mināti purā tasyā abhiśaster adhīhi RVa ni kāvyā vedhasaḥ śaśvatas kar haste dadhāno naryā purūṇi RVc agnir bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇāṃ satrā cakrāṇo amṛtāni viśvā RVa asme vatsam pari ṣantaṃ na vindann icchanto viśve amṛtā amūrāḥ RVc śramayuvaḥ padavyo dhiyandhās tasthuḥ pade parame cārv agneḥ RVa tisro yad agne śaradas tvām ic chuciṃ ghṛtena śucayaḥ saparyān RVc nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāny asūdayanta tanvaḥ sujātāḥ RVa ā rodasī bṛhatī vevidānāḥ pra rudriyā jabhrire yajñiyāsaḥ RVc vidan marto nemadhitā cikitvān agnim pade parame tasthivāṃsam RVa saṃjānānā upa sīdann abhijñu patnīvanto namasyaṃ namasyan RVc ririkvāṃsas tanvaḥ kṛṇvata svāḥ sakhā sakhyur nimiṣi rakṣamāṇāḥ RVa triḥ sapta yad guhyāni tve it padāvidan nihitā yajñiyāsaḥ RVc tebhī rakṣante amṛtaṃ sajoṣāḥ paśūñ ca sthātṝñ carathaṃ ca pāhi RVa vidvāṃ agne vayunāni kṣitīnāṃ vy ānuṣak churudho jīvase dhāḥ RVc antarvidvāṃ adhvano devayānān atandro dūto abhavo havirvāṭ RVa svādhyo diva ā sapta yahvī rāyo duro vy ṛtajñā ajānan RVc vidad gavyaṃ saramā dṛḷham ūrvaṃ yenā nu kam mānuṣī bhojate viṭ RVa ā ye viśvā svapatyāni tasthuḥ kṛṇvānāso amṛtatvāya gātum RVc mahnā mahadbhiḥ pṛthivī vi tasthe mātā putrair aditir dhāyase veḥ RVa adhi śriyaṃ ni dadhuś cārum asmin divo yad akṣī amṛtā akṛṇvan RVc adha kṣaranti sindhavo na sṛṣṭāḥ pra nīcīr agne aruṣīr ajānan RVa rayir na yaḥ pitṛvitto vayodhāḥ supraṇītiś cikituṣo na śāsuḥ RVc syonaśīr atithir na prīṇāno hoteva sadma vidhato vi tārīt RVa devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā kratvā nipāti vṛjanāni viśvā RVc purupraśasto amatir na satya ātmeva śevo didhiṣāyyo bhūt RVa devo na yaḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyā upakṣeti hitamitro na rājā RVc puraḥsadaḥ śarmasado na vīrā anavadyā patijuṣṭeva nārī RVa taṃ tvā naro dama ā nityam iddham agne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu RVc adhi dyumnaṃ ni dadhur bhūry asmin bhavā viśvāyur dharuṇo rayīṇām RVa vi pṛkṣo agne maghavāno aśyur vi sūrayo dadato viśvam āyuḥ RVc sanema vājaṃ samitheṣv aryo bhāgaṃ deveṣu śravase dadhānāḥ RVa ṛtasya hi dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ smadūdhnīḥ pīpayanta dyubhaktāḥ RVc parāvataḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇā vi sindhavaḥ samayā sasrur adrim RVa tve agne sumatim bhikṣamāṇā divi śravo dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ RVc naktā ca cakrur uṣasā virūpe kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇam aruṇaṃ ca saṃ dhuḥ RVa yān rāye martān suṣūdo agne te syāma maghavāno vayaṃ ca RVc chāyeva viśvam bhuvanaṃ sisakṣy āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam RVa arvadbhir agne arvato nṛbhir nṝn vīrair vīrān vanuyāmā tvotāḥ RVc īśānāsaḥ pitṛvittasya rāyo vi sūrayaḥ śatahimā no aśyuḥ RVa etā te agna ucathāni vedho juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca RVc śakema rāyaḥ sudhuro yamaṃ te dhi
