indro arhati pītim asya RVa adhvaryavo yo dṛbhīkaṃ jaghāna yo gā udājad apa hi valaṃ vaḥ RVc tasmā etam antarikṣe na vātam indraṃ somair orṇuta jūr na vastraiḥ RVa adhvaryavo ya uraṇaṃ jaghāna nava cakhvāṃsaṃ navatiṃ ca bāhūn RVc yo arbudam ava nīcā babādhe tam indraṃ somasya bhṛthe hinota RVa adhvaryavo yaḥ sv aśnaṃ jaghāna yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ yo vyaṃsam RVc yaḥ pipruṃ namuciṃ yo rudhikrāṃ tasmā indrāyāndhaso juhota RVa adhvaryavo yaḥ śataṃ śambarasya puro bibhedāśmaneva pūrvīḥ RVc yo varcinaḥ śatam indraḥ sahasram apāvapad bharatā somam asmai RVa adhvaryavo yaḥ śatam ā sahasram bhūmyā upasthe vapaj jaghanvān RVc kutsasyāyor atithigvasya vīrān ny āvṛṇag bharatā somam asmai RVa adhvaryavo yan naraḥ kāmayādhve śruṣṭī vahanto naśathā tad indre RVc gabhastipūtam bharata śrutāyendrāya somaṃ yajyavo juhota RVa adhvaryavaḥ kartanā śruṣṭim asmai vane nipūtaṃ vana un nayadhvam RVc juṣāṇo hastyam abhi vāvaśe va indrāya somam madiraṃ juhota RVa adhvaryavaḥ payasodhar yathā goḥ somebhir īm pṛṇatā bhojam indram RVc vedāham asya nibhṛtam ma etad ditsantam bhūyo yajataś ciketa RVa adhvaryavo yo divyasya vasvo yaḥ pārthivasya kṣamyasya rājā RVc tam ūrdaraṃ na pṛṇatā yavenendraṃ somebhis tad apo vo astu RVa asmabhyaṃ tad vaso dānāya rādhaḥ sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam RVc indra yac citraṃ śravasyā anu dyūn bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa pra ghā nv asya mahato mahāni satyā satyasya karaṇāni vocam RVc trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasyāsya made ahim indro jaghāna RVa avaṃśe dyām astabhāyad bṛhantam ā rodasī apṛṇad antarikṣam RVc sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathac ca somasya tā mada indraś cakāra RVa sadmeva prāco vi mimāya mānair vajreṇa khāny atṛṇan nadīnām RVc vṛthāsṛjat pathibhir dīrghayāthaiḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra RVa sa pravoḷhṝn parigatyā dabhīter viśvam adhāg āyudham iddhe agnau RVc saṃ gobhir aśvair asṛjad rathebhiḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra RVa sa īm mahīṃ dhunim etor aramṇāt so asnātṝn apārayat svasti RVc ta utsnāya rayim abhi pra tasthuḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra RVa sodañcaṃ sindhum ariṇān mahitvā vajreṇāna uṣasaḥ sam pipeṣa RVc ajavaso javinībhir vivṛścan somasya tā mada indraś cakāra RVa sa vidvāṃ apagohaṃ kanīnām āvir bhavann ud atiṣṭhat parāvṛk RVc prati śroṇa sthād vy anag acaṣṭa somasya tā mada indraś cakāra RVa bhinad valam aṅgirobhir gṛṇāno vi parvatasya dṛṃhitāny airat RVc riṇag rodhāṃsi kṛtrimāṇy eṣāṃ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra RVa svapnenābhyupyā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca jaghantha dasyum pra dabhītim āvaḥ RVc rambhī cid atra vivide hiraṇyaṃ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra RVa nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī RVc śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa pra vaḥ satāṃ jyeṣṭhatamāya suṣṭutim agnāv iva samidhāne havir bhare RVc indram ajuryaṃ jarayantam ukṣitaṃ sanād yuvānam avase havāmahe RVa yasmād indrād bṛhataḥ kiṃ canem ṛte viśvāny asmin sambhṛtādhi vīryā RVc jaṭhare somaṃ tanvī saho maho haste vajram bharati śīrṣaṇi kratum RVa na kṣoṇībhyām paribhve ta indriyaṃ na samudraiḥ parvatair indra te rathaḥ RVc na te vajram anv aśnoti kaś cana yad āśubhiḥ patasi yojanā puru RVa viśve hy asmai yajatāya dhṛṣṇave kratum bharanti vṛṣabhāya saścate RVc vṛṣā yajasva haviṣā viduṣṭaraḥ pibendra somaṃ vṛṣabheṇa bhānunā RVa vṛṣṇaḥ kośaḥ pavate madhva ūrmir vṛṣabhānnāya vṛṣabhāya pātave RVc vṛṣaṇādhvaryū vṛṣabhāso adrayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somaṃ vṛṣabhāya suṣvati RVa vṛṣā te vajra uta te vṛṣā ratho vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣabhāṇy āyudhā RVc vṛṣṇo madasya vṛṣabha tvam īśiṣa indra somasya vṛṣabhasya tṛpṇuhi RVa pra te nāvaṃ na samane vacasyuvam brahmaṇā yāmi savaneṣu dādhṛṣiḥ RVc kuvin no asya vacaso nibodhiṣad indram utsaṃ na vasunaḥ sicāmahe RVa purā sambādhād abhy ā vavṛtsva no dhenur na vatsaṃ yavasasya pipyuṣī RVc sakṛt su te sumatibhiḥ śatakrato sam patnībhir na vṛṣaṇo nasīmahi RVa nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī RVc śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa tad asmai navyam aṅgirasvad arcata śuṣmā yad asya pratnathodīrate RVc viśvā yad gotrā sahasā parīvṛtā made somasya dṛṃhitāny airayat RVa sa bhūtu yo ha prathamāya dhāyasa ojo mimāno mahimānam ātirat RVc śūro yo yutsu tanvam parivyata śīrṣaṇi dyām mahinā praty amuñcata RVa adhākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ vīryam mahad yad asyāgre brahmaṇā śuṣmam airayaḥ RVc ratheṣṭhena haryaśvena vicyutāḥ pra jīrayaḥ sisrate sadhryak pṛthak RVa adhā yo viśvā bhuvanābhi majmaneśānakṛt pravayā abhy avardhata RVc ād rodasī jyotiṣā vahnir ātanot sīvyan tamāṃsi dudhitā sam avyayat RVa sa prācīnān parvatān dṛṃhad ojasādharācīnam akṛṇod apām apaḥ RVc adhārayat pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyasam astabhnān māyayā dyām avasrasaḥ RVa sāsmā aram bāhubhyāṃ yam pitākṛṇod viśvasmād ā januṣo vedasas pari RVc yenā pṛthivyāṃ ni kriviṃ śayadhyai vajreṇa hatvy avṛṇak tuviṣvaṇiḥ RVa amājūr iva pitroḥ sacā satī samānād ā sadasas tvām iye bhagam RVc kṛdhi praketam upa māsy ā bhara daddhi bhāgaṃ tanvo yena māmahaḥ RVa bhojaṃ tvām indra vayaṃ huvema dadiṣ ṭvam indrāpāṃsi vājān RVc aviḍḍhīndra citrayā na ūtī kṛdhi vṛṣann indra vasyaso naḥ RVa nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī RVc śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa prātā ratho navo yoji sasniś caturyugas trikaśaḥ saptaraśmiḥ RVc daśāritro manuṣyaḥ svarṣāḥ sa iṣṭibhir matibhī raṃhyo bhūt RVa sāsmā aram prathamaṃ sa dvitīyam uto tṛtīyam manuṣaḥ sa hotā RVc anyasyā garbham anya ū jananta so anyebhiḥ sacate jenyo vṛṣā RVa harī nu kaṃ ratha indrasya yojam āyai sūktena vacasā navena RVc mo ṣu tvām atra bahavo hi viprā ni rīraman yajamānāso anye RVa ā dvābhyāṃ haribhyām indra yāhy ā caturbhir ā ṣaḍbhir hūyamānaḥ RVc āṣṭābhir daśabhiḥ somapeyam ayaṃ sutaḥ sumakha mā mṛdhas kaḥ RVa ā viṃśatyā triṃśatā yāhy arvāṅ ā catvāriṃśatā haribhir yujānaḥ RVc ā pañcāśatā surathebhir indrā ṣaṣṭyā saptatyā somapeyam RVa āśītyā navatyā yāhy arvāṅ ā śatena haribhir uhyamānaḥ RVc ayaṃ hi te śunahotreṣu soma indra tvāyā pariṣikto madāya RVa mama brahmendra yāhy acchā viśvā harī dhuri dhiṣvā rathasya RVc purutrā hi vihavyo babhūthāsmiñ chūra savane mādayasva RVa na ma indreṇa sakhyaṃ vi yoṣad asmabhyam asya dakṣiṇā duhīta RVc upa jyeṣṭhe varūthe gabhastau prāyeprāye jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma RVa nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī RVc śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa apāyy asyāndhaso madāya manīṣiṇaḥ suvānasya prayasaḥ RVc yasminn indraḥ pradivi vāvṛdhāna oko dadhe brahmaṇyantaś ca naraḥ RVa asya mandāno madhvo vajrahasto him indro arṇovṛtaṃ vi vṛścat RVc pra yad vayo na svasarāṇy acchā prayāṃsi ca nadīnāṃ cakramanta RVa sa māhina indro arṇo apām prairayad ahihācchā samudram RVc ajanayat sūryaṃ vidad gā aktunāhnāṃ vayunāni sādhat RVa so apratīni manave purūṇīndro dāśad dāśuṣe hanti vṛtram RVc sadyo yo nṛbhyo atasāyyo bhūt paspṛdhānebhyaḥ sūryasya sātau RVa sa sunvata indraḥ sūryam ā devo riṇaṅ martyāya stavān RVc ā yad rayiṃ guhadavadyam asmai bharad aṃśaṃ naitaśo daśasyan RVa sa randhayat sadivaḥ sārathaye śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ kuyavaṃ kutsāya RVc divodāsāya navatiṃ ca navendraḥ puro vy airac chambarasya RVa evā ta indrocatham ahema śravasyā na tmanā vājayantaḥ RVc aśyāma tat sāptam āśuṣāṇā nanamo vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ RVa evā te gṛtsamadāḥ śūra manmāvasyavo na vayunāni takṣuḥ RVc brahmaṇyanta indra te navīya iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ sumnam aśyuḥ RVa nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī RVc śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa vayaṃ te vaya indra viddhi ṣu ṇaḥ pra bharāmahe vājayur na ratham RVc vipanyavo dīdhyato manīṣā sumnam iyakṣantas tvāvato nṝn RVa tvaṃ na indra tvābhir ūtī tvāyato abhiṣṭipāsi janān RVc tvam ino dāśuṣo varūtetthādhīr abhi yo nakṣati tvā RVa sa no yuvendro johūtraḥ sakhā śivo narām astu pātā RVc yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī pacantaṃ ca stuvantaṃ ca praṇeṣat RVa tam u stuṣa indraṃ taṃ gṛṇīṣe yasmin purā vāvṛdhuḥ śāśaduś ca RVc sa vasvaḥ kāmam pīparad iyāno brahmaṇyato nūtanasyāyoḥ RVa so aṅgirasām ucathā jujuṣvān brahmā tūtod indro gātum iṣṇan RVc muṣṇann uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa stavān aśnasya cic chiśnathat pūrvyāṇi RVa sa ha śruta indro nāma deva ūrdhvo bhuvan manuṣe dasmatamaḥ RVc ava priyam arśasānasya sāhvāñ chiro bharad dāsasya svadhāvān RVa sa vṛtrahendraḥ kṛṣṇayonīḥ purandaro dāsīr airayad vi RVc ajanayan manave kṣām apaś ca satrā śaṃsaṃ yajamānasya tūtot RVa tasmai tavasyam anu dāyi satrendrāya devebhir arṇasātau RVc prati yad asya vajram bāhvor dhur hatvī dasyūn pura āyasīr ni tārīt RVa nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī RVc śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa viśvajite dhanajite svarjite satrājite nṛjita urvarājite RVc aśvajite gojite abjite bharendrāya somaṃ yajatāya haryatam RVa abhibhuve bhibhaṅgāya vanvate ṣāḷhāya sahamānāya vedhase RVc tuvigraye vahnaye duṣṭarītave satrāsāhe nama indrāya vocata RVa satrāsāho janabhakṣo janaṃsahaś cyavano yudhmo anu joṣam ukṣitaḥ RVc vṛtañcayaḥ sahurir vikṣv ārita indrasya vocam pra kṛtāni vīryā RVa anānudo vṛṣabho dodhato vadho gambhīra ṛṣvo asamaṣṭakāvyaḥ RVc radhracodaḥ śnathano vīḷitas pṛthur indraḥ suyajña uṣasaḥ svar janat RVa yajñena gātum apturo vividrire dhiyo hinvānā uśijo manīṣiṇaḥ RVc abhisvarā niṣadā gā avasyava indre hinvānā draviṇāny āśata RVa indra śreṣṭhāni draviṇāni dhehi cittiṃ dakṣasya subhagatvam asme RVc poṣaṃ rayīṇām ariṣṭiṃ tanūnāṃ svādmānaṃ vācaḥ sudinatvam ahnām RVa trikadrukeṣu mahiṣo yavāśiraṃ tuviśuṣmas tṛpat somam apibad viṣṇunā sutaṃ yathāvaśat RVe sa īm mamāda mahi karma kartave mahām uruṃ sainaṃ saścad devo devaṃ satyam indraṃ satya induḥ RVa adha tviṣīmāṃ abhy ojasā kriviṃ yudhābhavad ā rodasī apṛṇad asya majmanā pra vāvṛdhe RVe adhattānyaṃ jaṭhare prem aricyata sainaṃ saścad devo devaṃ satyam indraṃ satya induḥ RVa sākaṃ jātaḥ kratunā sākam ojasā vavakṣitha sākaṃ vṛddho vīryaiḥ sāsahir mṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ RVe dātā rādha stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sainaṃ saścad devo devaṃ satyam indraṃ satya induḥ RVa tava tyan naryaṃ nṛto pa indra prathamam pūrvyaṃ divi pravācyaṃ kṛtam RVc yad devasya śavasā prāriṇā asuṃ riṇann apaḥ RVe bhuvad viśvam abhy ādevam ojasā vidād ūrjaṃ śatakratur vidād iṣam RVa gaṇānāṃ tvā gaṇapatiṃ havāmahe kaviṃ kavīnām upamaśravastamam RVc jyeṣṭharājam brahmaṇām brahmaṇas pata ā naḥ śṛṇvann ūtibhiḥ sīda sādanam RVa devāś cit te asurya pracetaso bṛhaspate yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśuḥ RVc usrā iva sūryo jyotiṣā maho viśveṣām ij janitā brahmaṇām asi RVa ā vibādhyā parirāpas tamāṃsi ca jyotiṣmantaṃ ratham ṛtasya tiṣṭhasi RVc bṛhaspate bhīmam amitradambhanaṃ rakṣohaṇaṃ gotrabhidaṃ svarvidam RVa sunītibhir nayasi trāyase janaṃ yas tubhyaṃ dāśān na tam aṃho aśnavat RVc brahmadviṣas tapano manyumīr asi bṛhaspate mahi tat te mahitvanam RVa na tam aṃho na duritaṃ kutaś cana nārātayas titirur na dvayāvinaḥ RVc viśvā id asmād dhvaraso vi bādhase yaṃ sugopā rakṣasi brahmaṇas pate RVa tvaṃ no gopāḥ pathikṛd vicakṣaṇas tava vratāya matibhir jarāmahe RVc bṛhaspate yo no abhi hvaro dadhe svā tam marmartu ducchunā harasvatī RVa uta vā yo no marcayād anāgaso rātīvā martaḥ sānuko vṛkaḥ RVc bṛhaspate apa taṃ vartayā pathaḥ sugaṃ no asyai devavītaye kṛdhi RVa trātāraṃ tvā tanūnāṃ havāmahe vaspartar adhivaktāram asmayum RVc bṛhaspate devanido ni barhaya mā durevā uttaraṃ sumnam un naśan RVa tvayā vayaṃ suvṛdhā brahmaṇas pate spārhā vasu manuṣyā dadīmahi RVc yā no dūre taḷito yā arātayo bhi santi jambhayā tā anapnasaḥ RVa tvayā vayam uttamaṃ dhīmahe vayo bṛhaspate papriṇā sasninā yujā RVc mā no duḥśaṃso abhidipsur īśata pra suśaṃsā matibhis tāriṣīmahi RVa anānudo vṛṣabho jagmir āhavaṃ niṣṭaptā śatrum pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ RVc asi satya ṛṇayā brahmaṇas pata ugrasya cid damitā vīḷuharṣiṇaḥ RVa adevena manasā yo riṣaṇyati śāsām ugro manyamāno jighāṃsati RVc bṛhaspate mā praṇak tasya no vadho ni karma manyuṃ durevasya śardhataḥ RVa bhareṣu havyo namasopasadyo gantā vājeṣu sanitā dhanaṃdhanam RVc viśvā id aryo abhidipsvo mṛdho bṛhaspatir vi vavarhā rathāṃ iva RVa tejiṣṭhayā tapanī rakṣasas tapa ye tvā nide dadhire dṛṣṭavīryam RVc āvis tat kṛṣva yad asat ta ukthyam bṛhaspate vi parirāpo ardaya RVa bṛhaspate ati yad aryo arhād dyumad vibhāti kratumaj janeṣu RVc yad dīdayac chavasa ṛtaprajāta tad asmāsu draviṇaṃ dhehi citram RVa mā na stenebhyo ye abhi druhas pade nirāmiṇo ripavo nneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ RVc ā devānām ohate vi vrayo hṛdi bṛhaspate na paraḥ sāmno viduḥ RVa viśvebhyo hi tvā bhuvanebhyas pari tvaṣṭājanat sāmnaḥsāmnaḥ kaviḥ RVc sa ṛṇacid ṛṇayā brahmaṇas patir druho hantā maha ṛtasya dhartari RVa tava śriye vy ajihīta parvato gavāṃ gotram udasṛjo yad aṅgiraḥ RVc indreṇa yujā tamasā parīvṛtam bṛhaspate nir apām aubjo arṇavam RVa brahmaṇas pate tvam asya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayaṃ ca jinva RVc viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa semām aviḍḍhi prabhṛtiṃ ya īśiṣe yā vidhema navayā mahā girā RVc yathā no mīḍhvān stavate sakhā tava bṛhaspate sīṣadhaḥ sota no matim RVa yo nantvāny anaman ny ojasotādardar manyunā śambarāṇi vi RVc prācyāvayad acyutā brahmaṇas patir ā cāviśad vasumantaṃ vi parvatam RVa tad devānāṃ devatamāya kartvam aśrathnan dṛḷhāvradanta vīḷitā RVc ud gā ājad abhinad brahmaṇā valam agūhat tamo vy acakṣayat svaḥ RVa aśmāsyam avatam brahmaṇas patir madhudhāram abhi yam ojasātṛṇat RVc tam eva viśve papire svardṛśo bahu sākaṃ sisicur utsam udriṇam RVa sanā tā kā cid bhuvanā bhavītvā mādbhiḥ śaradbhir duro varanta vaḥ RVc ayatantā carato anyadanyad id yā cakāra vayunā brahmaṇas patiḥ RVa abhinakṣanto abhi ye tam ānaśur nidhim paṇīnām paramaṃ guhā hitam RVc te vidvāṃsaḥ praticakṣyānṛtā punar yata u āyan tad ud īyur āviśam RVa ṛtāvānaḥ praticakṣyānṛtā punar āta ā tasthuḥ kavayo mahas pathaḥ RVc te bāhubhyāṃ dhamitam agnim aśmani nakiḥ ṣo asty araṇo jahur hi tam RVa ṛtajyena kṣipreṇa brahmaṇas patir yatra vaṣṭi pra tad aśnoti dhanvanā RVc tasya sādhvīr iṣavo yābhir asyati nṛcakṣaso dṛśaye karṇayonayaḥ RVa sa saṃnayaḥ sa vinayaḥ purohitaḥ sa suṣṭutaḥ sa yudhi brahmaṇas patiḥ RVc cākṣmo yad vājam bharate matī dhanād it sūryas tapati tapyatur vṛthā RVa vibhu prabhu prathamam mehanāvato bṛhaspateḥ suvidatrāṇi rādhyā RVc imā sātāni venyasya vājino yena janā ubhaye bhuñjate viśaḥ RVa yo vare vṛjane viśvathā vibhur mahām u raṇvaḥ śavasā vavakṣitha RVc sa devo devān prati paprathe pṛthu viśved u tā paribhūr brahmaṇas patiḥ RVa viśvaṃ satyam maghavānā yuvor id āpaś cana pra minanti vrataṃ vām RVc acchendrābrahmaṇaspatī havir no nnaṃ yujeva vājinā jigātam RVa utāśiṣṭhā anu śṛṇvanti vahnayaḥ sabheyo vipro bharate matī dhanā RVc vīḷudveṣā anu vaśa ṛṇam ādadiḥ sa ha vājī samithe brahmaṇas patiḥ RVa brahmaṇas pater abhavad yathāvaśaṃ satyo manyur mahi karmā kariṣyataḥ RVc yo gā udājat sa dive vi cābhajan mahīva rītiḥ śavasāsarat pṛthak RVa brahmaṇas pate suyamasya viśvahā rāyaḥ syāma rathyo vayasvataḥ RVc vīreṣu vīrāṃ upa pṛṅdhi nas tvaṃ yad īśāno brahmaṇā veṣi me havam RVa brahmaṇas pate tvam asya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayaṃ ca jinva RVc viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa indhāno agniṃ vanavad vanuṣyataḥ kṛtabrahmā śūśuvad rātahavya it RVc jātena jātam ati sa pra sarsṛte yaṃyaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ RVa vīrebhir vīrān vanavad vanuṣyato gobhī rayim paprathad bodhati tmanā RVc tokaṃ ca tasya tanayaṃ ca vardhate yaṃyaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ RVa sindhur na kṣodaḥ śimīvāṃ ṛghāyato vṛṣeva vadhrīṃr abhi vaṣṭy ojasā RVc agner iva prasitir nāha vartave yaṃyaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ RVa tasmā arṣanti divyā asaścataḥ sa satvabhiḥ prathamo goṣu gacchati RVc anibhṛṣṭataviṣir hanty ojasā yaṃyaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ RVa tasmā id viśve dhunayanta sindhavo cchidrā śarma dadhire purūṇi RVc devānāṃ sumne subhagaḥ sa edhate yaṃyaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ RVa ṛjur ic chaṃso vanavad vanuṣyato devayann id adevayantam abhy asat RVc suprāvīr id vanavat pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ yajved ayajyor vi bhajāti bhojanam RVa yajasva vīra pra vihi manāyato bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye RVc haviṣ kṛṇuṣva subhago yathāsasi brahmaṇas pater ava ā vṛṇīmahe RVa sa ij janena sa viśā sa janmanā sa putrair vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ RVc devānāṃ yaḥ pitaram āvivāsati śraddhāmanā haviṣā brahmaṇas patim RVa yo asmai havyair ghṛtavadbhir avidhat pra tam prācā nayati brahmaṇas patiḥ RVc uruṣyatīm aṃhaso rakṣatī riṣo ṃhoś cid asmā urucakrir adbhutaḥ RVa imā gira ādityebhyo ghṛtasnūḥ sanād rājabhyo juhvā juhomi RVc śṛṇotu mitro aryamā bhago nas tuvijāto varuṇo dakṣo aṃśaḥ RVa imaṃ stomaṃ sakratavo me adya mitro aryamā varuṇo juṣanta RVc ādityāsaḥ śucayo dhārapūtā avṛjinā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ RVa ta ādityāsa uravo gabhīrā adabdhāso dipsanto bhūryakṣāḥ RVc antaḥ paśyanti vṛjinota sādhu sarvaṃ rājabhyaḥ paramā cid anti RVa dhārayanta ādityāso jagat sthā devā viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ RVc dīrghādhiyo rakṣamāṇā asuryam ṛtāvānaś cayamānā ṛṇāni RVa vidyām ādityā avaso vo asya yad aryaman bhaya ā cin mayobhu RVc yuṣmākam mitrāvaruṇā praṇītau pari śvabhreva duritāni vṛjyām RVa sugo hi vo aryaman mitra panthā anṛkṣaro varuṇa sādhur asti RVc tenādityā adhi vocatā no yacchatā no duṣparihantu śarma RVa pipartu no aditī rājaputrāti dveṣāṃsy aryamā sugebhiḥ RVc bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya śarmopa syāma puruvīrā ariṣṭāḥ RVa tisro bhūmīr dhārayan trīṃr uta dyūn trīṇi vratā vidathe antar eṣām RVc ṛtenādityā mahi vo mahitvaṃ tad aryaman varuṇa mitra cāru RVa trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta hiraṇyayāḥ śucayo dhārapūtāḥ RVc asvapnajo animiṣā adabdhā uruśaṃsā ṛjave martyāya RVa tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsi rājā ye ca devā asura ye ca martāḥ RVc śataṃ no rāsva śarado vicakṣe śyāmāyūṃṣi sudhitāni pūrvā RVa na dakṣiṇā vi cikite na savyā na prācīnam ādityā nota paścā RVc pākyā cid vasavo dhīryā cid yuṣmānīto abhayaṃ jyotir aśyām RVa yo rājabhya ṛtanibhyo dadāśa yaṃ vardhayanti puṣṭayaś ca nityāḥ RVc sa revān yāti prathamo rathena vasudāvā vidatheṣu praśastaḥ RVa śucir apaḥ sūyavasā adabdha upa kṣeti vṛddhavayāḥ suvīraḥ RVc nakiṣ ṭaṃ ghnanty antito na dūrād ya ādityānām bhavati praṇītau RVa adite mitra varuṇota mṛḷa yad vo vayaṃ cakṛmā kac cid āgaḥ RVc urv aśyām abhayaṃ jyotir indra mā no dīrghā abhi naśan tamisrāḥ RVa ubhe asmai pīpayataḥ samīcī divo vṛṣṭiṃ subhago nāma puṣyan RVc ubhā kṣayāv ājayan yāti pṛtsūbhāv ardhau bhavataḥ sādhū asmai RVa yā vo māyā abhidruhe yajatrāḥ pāśā ādityā ripave vicṛttāḥ RVc aśvīva tāṃ ati yeṣaṃ rathenāriṣṭā urāv ā śarman syāma RVa māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ RVc mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa idaṃ kaver ādityasya svarājo viśvāni sānty abhy astu mahnā RVc ati yo mandro yajathāya devaḥ sukīrtim bhikṣe varuṇasya bhūreḥ RVa tava vrate subhagāsaḥ syāma svādhyo varuṇa tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ RVc upāyana uṣasāṃ gomatīnām agnayo na jaramāṇā anu dyūn RVa tava syāma puruvīrasya śarmann uruśaṃsasya varuṇa praṇetaḥ RVc yūyaṃ naḥ putrā aditer adabdhā abhi kṣamadhvaṃ yujyāya devāḥ RVa pra sīm ādityo asṛjad vidhartāṃ ṛtaṃ sindhavo varuṇasya yanti RVc na śrāmyanti na vi mucanty ete vayo na paptū raghuyā parijman RVa vi mac chrathāya raśanām ivāga ṛdhyāma te varuṇa khām ṛtasya RVc mā tantuś chedi vayato dhiyam me mā mātrā śāry apasaḥ pura ṛtoḥ RVa apo su myakṣa varuṇa bhiyasam mat samrāḷ ṛtāvo nu mā gṛbhāya RVc dāmeva vatsād vi mumugdhy aṃho nahi tvad āre nimiṣaś caneśe RVa mā no vadhair varuṇa ye ta iṣṭāv enaḥ kṛṇvantam asura bhrīṇanti RVc mā jyotiṣaḥ pravasathāni ganma vi ṣū mṛdhaḥ śiśratho jīvase naḥ RVa namaḥ purā te varuṇota nūnam utāparaṃ tuvijāta bravāma RVc tve hi kam parvate na śritāny apracyutāni dūḷabha vratāni RVa para ṛṇā sāvīr adha matkṛtāni māhaṃ rājann anyakṛtena bhojam RVc avyuṣṭā in nu bhūyasīr uṣāsa ā no jīvān varuṇa tāsu śādhi RVa yo me rājan yujyo vā sakhā vā svapne bhayam bhīrave mahyam āha RVc steno vā yo dipsati no vṛko vā tvaṃ tasmād varuṇa pāhy asmān RVa māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ RVc mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa dhṛtavratā ādityā iṣirā āre mat karta rahasūr ivāgaḥ RVc śṛṇvato vo varuṇa mitra devā bhadrasya vidvāṃ avase huve vaḥ RVa yūyaṃ devāḥ pramatir yūyam ojo yūyaṃ dveṣāṃsi sanutar yuyota RVc abhikṣattāro abhi ca kṣamadhvam adyā ca no mṛḷayatāparaṃ ca RVa kim ū nu vaḥ kṛṇavāmāpareṇa kiṃ sanena vasava āpyena RVc yūyaṃ no mitrāvaruṇādite ca svastim indrāmaruto dadhāta RVa haye devā yūyam id āpaya stha te mṛḷata nādhamānāya mahyam RVc mā vo ratho madhyamavāḷ ṛte bhūn mā yuṣmāvatsv āpiṣu śramiṣma RVa pra va eko mimaya bhūry āgo yan mā piteva kitavaṃ śaśāsa RVc āre pāśā āre aghāni devā mā mādhi putre vim iva grabhīṣṭa RVa arvāñco adyā bhavatā yajatrā ā vo hārdi bhayamāno vyayeyam RVc trādhvaṃ no devā nijuro vṛkasya trādhvaṃ kartād avapado yajatrāḥ RVa māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ RVc mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa ṛtaṃ devāya kṛṇvate savitra indrāyāhighne na ramanta āpaḥ RVc aharahar yāty aktur apāṃ kiyāty ā prathamaḥ sarga āsām RVa yo vṛtrāya sinam atrābhariṣyat pra taṃ janitrī viduṣa uvāca RVc patho radantīr anu joṣam asmai divedive dhunayo yanty artham RVa ūrdhvo hy asthād adhy antarikṣe dhā vṛtrāya pra vadhaṃ jabhāra RVc mihaṃ vasāna upa hīm adudrot tigmāyudho ajayac chatrum indraḥ RVa bṛhaspate tapuṣāśneva vidhya vṛkadvaraso asurasya vīrān RVc yathā jaghantha dhṛṣatā purā cid evā jahi śatrum asmākam indra RVa ava kṣipa divo aśmānam uccā yena śatrum mandasāno nijūrvāḥ RVc tokasya sātau tanayasya bhūrer asmāṃ ardhaṃ kṛṇutād indra gonām RVa pra hi kratuṃ vṛhatho yaṃ vanutho radhrasya stho yajamānasya codau RVc indrāsomā yuvam asmāṃ aviṣṭam asmin bhayasthe kṛṇutam u lokam RVa na mā taman na śraman nota tandran na vocāma mā sunoteti somam RVc yo me pṛṇād yo dadad yo nibodhād yo mā sunvantam upa gobhir āyat RVa sarasvati tvam asmāṃ aviḍḍhi marutvatī dhṛṣatī jeṣi śatrūn RVc tyaṃ cic chardhantaṃ taviṣīyamāṇam indro hanti vṛṣabhaṃ śaṇḍikānām RVa yo naḥ sanutya uta vā jighatnur abhikhyāya taṃ tigitena vidhya RVc bṛhaspata āyudhair jeṣi śatrūn druhe rīṣantam pari dhehi rājan RVa asmākebhiḥ satvabhiḥ śūra śūrair vīryā kṛdhi yāni te kartvāni RVc jyog abhūvann anudhūpitāso hatvī teṣām ā bharā no vasūni RVa taṃ vaḥ śardham mārutaṃ sumnayur giropa bruve namasā daivyaṃ janam RVc yathā rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ naśāmahā apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ divedive RVa asmākam mitrāvaruṇāvataṃ ratham ādityai rudrair vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā RVc pra yad vayo na paptan vasmanas pari śravasyavo hṛṣīvanto vanarṣadaḥ RVa adha smā na ud avatā sajoṣaso rathaṃ devāso abhi vikṣu vājayum RVc yad āśavaḥ padyābhis titrato rajaḥ pṛthivyāḥ sānau jaṅghananta pāṇibhiḥ RVa uta sya na indro viśvacarṣaṇir divaḥ śardhena mārutena sukratuḥ RVc anu nu sthāty avṛkābhir ūtibhī ratham mahe sanaye vājasātaye RVa uta sya devo bhuvanasya sakṣaṇis tvaṣṭā gnābhiḥ sajoṣā jūjuvad ratham RVc iḷā bhago bṛhaddivota rodasī pūṣā purandhir aśvināv adhā patī RVa uta tye devī subhage mithūdṛśoṣāsānaktā jagatām apījuvā RVc stuṣe yad vām pṛthivi navyasā vaca sthātuś ca vayas trivayā upastire RVa uta vaḥ śaṃsam uśijām iva śmasy ahir budhnyo ja ekapād uta RVc trita ṛbhukṣāḥ savitā cano dadhe pāṃ napād āśuhemā dhiyā śami RVa etā vo vaśmy udyatā yajatrā atakṣann āyavo navyase sam RVc śravasyavo vājaṃ cakānāḥ saptir na rathyo aha dhītim aśyāḥ RVa asya me dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāyato bhūtam avitrī vacasaḥ siṣāsataḥ RVc yayor āyuḥ prataraṃ te idam pura upastute vasūyur vām maho dadhe RVa mā no guhyā ripa āyor ahan dabhan mā na ābhyo rīradho ducchunābhyaḥ RVc mā no vi yauḥ sakhyā viddhi tasya naḥ sumnāyatā manasā tat tvemahe RVa aheḷatā manasā śruṣṭim ā vaha duhānāṃ dhenum pipyuṣīm asaścatam RVc padyābhir āśuṃ vacasā ca vājinaṃ tvāṃ hinomi puruhūta viśvahā RVa rākām ahaṃ suhavāṃ suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā RVc sīvyatv apaḥ sūcyācchidyamānayā dadātu vīraṃ śatadāyam ukthyam RVa yās te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśaso yābhir dadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni RVc tābhir no adya sumanā upāgahi sahasrapoṣaṃ subhage rarāṇā RVa sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā RVc juṣasva havyam āhutam prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ RVa yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ suṣūmā bahusūvarī RVc tasyai viśpatnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana RVa yā guṅgūr yā sinīvālī yā rākā yā sarasvatī RVc indrāṇīm ahva ūtaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye RVa ā te pitar marutāṃ sumnam etu mā naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśo yuyothāḥ RVc abhi no vīro arvati kṣameta pra jāyemahi rudra prajābhiḥ RVa tvādattebhī rudra śantamebhiḥ śataṃ himā aśīya bheṣajebhiḥ RVc vy asmad dveṣo vitaraṃ vy aṃho vy amīvāś cātayasvā viṣūcīḥ RVa śreṣṭho jātasya rudra śriyāsi tavastamas tavasāṃ vajrabāho RVc parṣi ṇaḥ pāram aṃhasaḥ svasti viśvā abhītī rapaso yuyodhi RVa mā tvā rudra cukrudhāmā namobhir mā duṣṭutī vṛṣabha mā sahūtī RVc un no vīrāṃ arpaya bheṣajebhir bhiṣaktamaṃ tvā bhiṣajāṃ śṛṇomi RVa havīmabhir havate yo havirbhir ava stomebhī rudraṃ diṣīya RVc ṛdūdaraḥ suhavo mā no asyai babhruḥ suśipro rīradhan manāyai RVa un mā mamanda vṛṣabho marutvān tvakṣīyasā vayasā nādhamānam RVc ghṛṇīva cchāyām arapā aśīyā vivāseyaṃ rudrasya sumnam RVa kva sya te rudra mṛḷayākur hasto yo asti bheṣajo jalāṣaḥ RVc apabhartā rapaso daivyasyābhī nu mā vṛṣabha cakṣamīthāḥ RVa pra babhrave vṛṣabhāya śvitīce maho mahīṃ suṣṭutim īrayāmi RVc namasyā kalmalīkinaṃ namobhir gṛṇīmasi tveṣaṃ rudrasya nāma RVa sthirebhir aṅgaiḥ pururūpa ugro babhruḥ śukrebhiḥ pipiśe hiraṇyaiḥ RVc īśānād asya bhuvanasya bhūrer na vā u yoṣad rudrād asuryam RVa arhan bibharṣi sāyakāni dhanvārhan niṣkaṃ yajataṃ viśvarūpam RVc arhann idaṃ dayase viśvam abhvaṃ na vā ojīyo rudra tvad asti RVa stuhi śrutaṃ gartasadaṃ yuvānam mṛgaṃ na bhīmam upahatnum ugram RVc mṛḷā jaritre rudra stavāno nyaṃ te asman ni vapantu senāḥ RVa kumāraś cit pitaraṃ vandamānam prati nānāma rudropayantam RVc bhūrer dātāraṃ satpatiṃ gṛṇīṣe stutas tvam bheṣajā rāsy asme RVa yā vo bheṣajā marutaḥ śucīni yā śantamā vṛṣaṇo yā mayobhu RVc yāni manur avṛṇītā pitā nas tā śaṃ ca yoś ca rudrasya vaśmi RVa pari ṇo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ pari tveṣasya durmatir mahī gāt RVc ava sthirā maghavadbhyas tanuṣva mīḍhvas tokāya tanayāya mṛḷa RVa evā babhro vṛṣabha cekitāna yathā deva na hṛṇīṣe na haṃsi RVc havanaśrun no rudreha bodhi bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa dhārāvarā maruto dhṛṣṇvojaso mṛgā na bhīmās taviṣībhir arcinaḥ RVc agnayo na śuśucānā ṛjīṣiṇo bhṛmiṃ dhamanto apa gā avṛṇvata RVa dyāvo na stṛbhiś citayanta khādino vy abhriyā na dyutayanta vṛṣṭayaḥ RVc rudro yad vo maruto rukmavakṣaso vṛṣājani pṛśnyāḥ śukra ūdhani RVa ukṣante aśvāṃ atyāṃ ivājiṣu nadasya karṇais turayanta āśubhiḥ RVc hiraṇyaśiprā maruto davidhvataḥ pṛkṣaṃ yātha pṛṣatībhiḥ samanyavaḥ RVa pṛkṣe tā viśvā bhuvanā vavakṣire mitrāya vā sadam ā jīradānavaḥ RVc pṛṣadaśvāso anavabhrarādhasa ṛjipyāso na vayuneṣu dhūrṣadaḥ RVa indhanvabhir dhenubhī rapśadūdhabhir adhvasmabhiḥ pathibhir bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ RVc ā haṃsāso na svasarāṇi gantana madhor madāya marutaḥ samanyavaḥ RVa ā no brahmāṇi marutaḥ samanyavo narāṃ na śaṃsaḥ savanāni gantana RVc aśvām iva pipyata dhenum ūdhani kartā dhiyaṃ jaritre vājapeśasam RVa taṃ no dāta maruto vājinaṃ ratha āpānam brahma citayad divedive RVc iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo vṛjaneṣu kārave sanim medhām ariṣṭaṃ duṣṭaraṃ sahaḥ RVa yad yuñjate maruto rukmavakṣaso śvān ratheṣu bhaga ā sudānavaḥ RVc dhenur na śiśve svasareṣu pinvate janāya rātahaviṣe mahīm iṣam RVa yo no maruto vṛkatāti martyo ripur dadhe vasavo rakṣatā riṣaḥ RVc vartayata tapuṣā cakriyābhi tam ava rudrā aśaso hantanā vadhaḥ RVa citraṃ tad vo maruto yāma cekite pṛśnyā yad ūdhar apy āpayo duhuḥ RVc yad vā nide navamānasya rudriyās tritaṃ jarāya juratām adābhyāḥ RVa tān vo maho maruta evayāvno viṣṇor eṣasya prabhṛthe havāmahe RVc hiraṇyavarṇān kakuhān yatasruco brahmaṇyantaḥ śaṃsyaṃ rādha īmahe RVa te daśagvāḥ prathamā yajñam ūhire te no hinvantūṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu RVc uṣā na rāmīr aruṇair aporṇute maho jyotiṣā śucatā goarṇasā RVa te kṣoṇībhir aruṇebhir nāñjibhī rudrā ṛtasya sadaneṣu vāvṛdhuḥ RVc nimeghamānā atyena pājasā suścandraṃ varṇaṃ dadhire supeśasam RVa tāṃ iyāno mahi varūtham ūtaya upa ghed enā namasā gṛṇīmasi RVc trito na yān pañca hotṝn abhiṣṭaya āvavartad avarāñ cakriyāvase RVa yayā radhram pārayathāty aṃho yayā nido muñcatha vanditāram RVc arvācī sā maruto yā va ūtir o ṣu vāśreva sumatir jigātu RVa upem asṛkṣi vājayur vacasyāṃ cano dadhīta nādyo giro me RVc apāṃ napād āśuhemā kuvit sa supeśasas karati joṣiṣad dhi RVa imaṃ sv asmai hṛda ā sutaṣṭam mantraṃ vocema kuvid asya vedat RVc apāṃ napād asuryasya mahnā viśvāny aryo bhuvanā jajāna RVa sam anyā yanty upa yanty anyāḥ samānam ūrvaṃ nadyaḥ pṛṇanti RVc tam ū śuciṃ śucayo dīdivāṃsam apāṃ napātam pari tasthur āpaḥ RVa tam asmerā yuvatayo yuvānam marmṛjyamānāḥ pari yanty āpaḥ RVc sa śukrebhiḥ śikvabhī revad asme dīdāyānidhmo ghṛtanirṇig apsu RVa asmai tisro avyathyāya nārīr devāya devīr didhiṣanty annam RVc kṛtā ivopa hi prasarsre apsu sa pīyūṣaṃ dhayati pūrvasūnām RVa aśvasyātra janimāsya ca svar druho riṣaḥ sampṛcaḥ pāhi sūrīn RVc āmāsu pūrṣu paro apramṛṣyaṃ nārātayo vi naśan nānṛtāni RVa sva ā dame sudughā yasya dhenuḥ svadhām pīpāya subhv annam atti RVc so apāṃ napād ūrjayann apsv antar vasudeyāya vidhate vi bhāti RVa yo apsv ā śucinā daivyena ṛtāvājasra urviyā vibhāti RVc vayā id anyā bhuvanāny asya pra jāyante vīrudhaś ca prajābhiḥ RVa apāṃ napād ā hy asthād upasthaṃ jihmānām ūrdhvo vidyutaṃ vasānaḥ RVc tasya jyeṣṭham mahimānaṃ vahantīr hiraṇyavarṇāḥ pari yanti yahvīḥ RVa hiraṇyarūpaḥ sa hiraṇyasaṃdṛg apāṃ napāt sed u hiraṇyavarṇaḥ RVc hiraṇyayāt pari yoner niṣadyā hiraṇyadā dadaty annam asmai RVa tad asyānīkam uta cāru nāmāpīcyaṃ vardhate naptur apām RVc yam indhate yuvatayaḥ sam itthā hiraṇyavarṇaṃ ghṛtam annam asya RVa asmai bahūnām avamāya sakhye yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ RVc saṃ sānu mārjmi didhiṣāmi bilmair dadhāmy annaiḥ pari vanda ṛgbhiḥ RVa sa īṃ vṛṣājanayat tāsu garbhaṃ sa īṃ śiśur dhayati taṃ rihanti RVc so apāṃ napād anabhimlātavarṇo nyasyeveha tanvā viveṣa RVa asmin pade parame tasthivāṃsam adhvasmabhir viśvahā dīdivāṃsam RVc āpo naptre ghṛtam annaṃ vahantīḥ svayam atkaiḥ pari dīyanti yahvīḥ RVa ayāṃsam agne sukṣitiṃ janāyāyāṃsam u maghavadbhyaḥ suvṛktim RVc viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa tubhyaṃ hinvāno vasiṣṭa gā apo dhukṣan sīm avibhir adribhir naraḥ RVc pibendra svāhā prahutaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ hotrād ā somam prathamo ya īśiṣe RVa yajñaiḥ sammiślāḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhir yāmañ chubhrāso añjiṣu priyā uta RVc āsadyā barhir bharatasya sūnavaḥ potrād ā somam pibatā divo naraḥ RVa ameva naḥ suhavā ā hi gantana ni barhiṣi sadatanā raṇiṣṭana RVc athā mandasva jujuṣāṇo andhasas tvaṣṭar devebhir janibhiḥ sumadgaṇaḥ RVa ā vakṣi devāṃ iha vipra yakṣi cośan hotar ni ṣadā yoniṣu triṣu RVc prati vīhi prasthitaṃ somyam madhu pibāgnīdhrāt tava bhāgasya tṛpṇuhi RVa eṣa sya te tanvo nṛmṇavardhanaḥ saha ojaḥ pradivi bāhvor hitaḥ RVc tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyam ābhṛtas tvam asya brāhmaṇād ā tṛpat piba RVa juṣethāṃ yajñam bodhataṃ havasya me satto hotā nividaḥ pūrvyā anu RVc acchā rājānā nama ety āvṛtam praśāstrād ā pibataṃ somyam madhu RVa mandasva hotrād anu joṣam andhaso dhvaryavaḥ sa pūrṇāṃ vaṣṭy āsicam RVc tasmā etam bharata tadvaśo dadir hotrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ RVa yam u pūrvam ahuve tam idaṃ huve sed u havyo dadir yo nāma patyate RVc adhvaryubhiḥ prasthitaṃ somyam madhu potrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ RVa medyantu te vahnayo yebhir īyase riṣaṇyan vīḷayasvā vanaspate RVc āyūyā dhṛṣṇo abhigūryā tvaṃ neṣṭrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ RVa apād dhotrād uta potrād amattota neṣṭrād ajuṣata prayo hitam RVc turīyam pātram amṛktam amartyaṃ draviṇodāḥ pibatu drāviṇodasaḥ RVa arvāñcam adya yayyaṃ nṛvāhaṇaṃ rathaṃ yuñjāthām iha vāṃ vimocanam RVc pṛṅktaṃ havīṃṣi madhunā hi kaṃ gatam athā somam pibataṃ vājinīvasū RVa joṣy agne samidhaṃ joṣy āhutiṃ joṣi brahma janyaṃ joṣi suṣṭutim RVc viśvebhir viśvāṃ ṛtunā vaso maha uśan devāṃ uśataḥ pāyayā haviḥ RVa ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā savāya śaśvattamaṃ tadapā vahnir asthāt RVc nūnaṃ devebhyo vi hi dhāti ratnam athābhajad vītihotraṃ svastau RVa viśvasya hi śruṣṭaye deva ūrdhvaḥ pra bāhavā pṛthupāṇiḥ sisarti RVc āpaś cid asya vrata ā nimṛgrā ayaṃ cid vāto ramate parijman RVa āśubhiś cid yān vi mucāti nūnam arīramad atamānaṃ cid etoḥ RVc ahyarṣūṇāṃ cin ny ayāṃ aviṣyām anu vrataṃ savitur moky āgāt RVa punaḥ sam avyad vitataṃ vayantī madhyā kartor ny adhāc chakma dhīraḥ RVc ut saṃhāyāsthād vy ṛtūṃr adardhar aramatiḥ savitā deva āgāt RVa nānaukāṃsi duryo viśvam āyur vi tiṣṭhate prabhavaḥ śoko agneḥ RVc jyeṣṭham mātā sūnave bhāgam ādhād anv asya ketam iṣitaṃ savitrā RVa samāvavarti viṣṭhito jigīṣur viśveṣāṃ kāmaś caratām amābhūt RVc śaśvāṃ apo vikṛtaṃ hitvy āgād anu vrataṃ savitur daivyasya RVa tvayā hitam apyam apsu bhāgaṃ dhanvānv ā mṛgayaso vi tasthuḥ RVc vanāni vibhyo nakir asya tāni vratā devasya savitur minanti RVa yādrādhyaṃ varuṇo yonim apyam aniśitaṃ nimiṣi jarbhurāṇaḥ RVc viśvo mārtāṇḍo vrajam ā paśur gāt sthaśo janmāni savitā vy ākaḥ RVa na yasyendro varuṇo na mitro vratam aryamā na minanti rudraḥ RVc nārātayas tam idaṃ svasti huve devaṃ savitāraṃ namobhiḥ RVa bhagaṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantaḥ purandhiṃ narāśaṃso gnāspatir no avyāḥ RVc āye vāmasya saṃgathe rayīṇām priyā devasya savituḥ syāma RVa asmabhyaṃ tad divo adbhyaḥ pṛthivyās tvayā dattaṃ kāmyaṃ rādha ā gāt RVc śaṃ yat stotṛbhya āpaye bhavāty uruśaṃsāya savitar jaritre RVa grāvāṇeva tad id arthaṃ jarethe gṛdhreva vṛkṣaṃ nidhimantam accha RVc brahmāṇeva vidatha ukthaśāsā dūteva havyā janyā purutrā RVa prātaryāvāṇā rathyeva vīrājeva yamā varam ā sacethe RVc mene iva tanvā śumbhamāne dampatīva kratuvidā janeṣu RVa śṛṅgeva naḥ prathamā gantam arvāk chaphāv iva jarbhurāṇā tarobhiḥ RVc cakravākeva prati vastor usrārvāñcā yātaṃ rathyeva śakrā RVa nāveva naḥ pārayataṃ yugeva nabhyeva na upadhīva pradhīva RVc śvāneva no ariṣaṇyā tanūnāṃ khṛgaleva visrasaḥ pātam asmān RVa vātevājuryā nadyeva rītir akṣī iva cakṣuṣā yātam arvāk RVc hastāv iva tanve śambhaviṣṭhā pādeva no nayataṃ vasyo accha RVa oṣṭhāv iva madhv āsne vadantā stanāv iva pipyataṃ jīvase naḥ RVc nāseva nas tanvo rakṣitārā karṇāv iva suśrutā bhūtam asme RVa hasteva śaktim abhi saṃdadī naḥ kṣāmeva naḥ sam ajataṃ rajāṃsi RVc imā giro aśvinā yuṣmayantīḥ kṣṇotreṇeva svadhitiṃ saṃ śiśītam RVa etāni vām aśvinā vardhanāni brahma stomaṃ gṛtsamadāso akran RVc tāni narā jujuṣāṇopa yātam bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa somāpūṣaṇā jananā rayīṇāṃ jananā divo jananā pṛthivyāḥ RVc jātau viśvasya bhuvanasya gopau devā akṛṇvann amṛtasya nābhim RVa imau devau jāyamānau juṣantemau tamāṃsi gūhatām ajuṣṭā RVc ābhyām indraḥ pakvam āmāsv antaḥ somāpūṣabhyāṃ janad usriyāsu RVa somāpūṣaṇā rajaso vimānaṃ saptacakraṃ ratham aviśvaminvam RVc viṣūvṛtam manasā yujyamānaṃ taṃ jinvatho vṛṣaṇā pañcaraśmim RVa divy anyaḥ sadanaṃ cakra uccā pṛthivyām anyo adhy antarikṣe RVc tāv asmabhyam puruvāram purukṣuṃ rāyas poṣaṃ vi ṣyatāṃ nābhim asme RVa viśvāny anyo bhuvanā jajāna viśvam anyo abhicakṣāṇa eti RVc somāpūṣaṇāv avataṃ dhiyam me yuvābhyāṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayema RVa dhiyam pūṣā jinvatu viśvaminvo rayiṃ somo rayipatir dadhātu RVc avatu devy aditir anarvā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa vāyo ye te sahasriṇo rathāsas tebhir ā gahi RVc niyutvān somapītaye RVa niyutvān vāyav ā gahy ayaṃ śukro ayāmi te RVc gantāsi sunvato gṛham RVa śukrasyādya gavāśira indravāyū niyutvataḥ RVc ā yātam pibataṃ narā RVa ayaṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā RVc mamed iha śrutaṃ havam RVa rājānāv anabhidruhā dhruve sadasy uttame RVc sahasrasthūṇa āsāte RVa tā samrājā ghṛtāsutī ādityā dānunas patī RVc sacete anavahvaram RVa gomad ū ṣu nāsatyāśvāvad yātam aśvinā RVc vartī rudrā nṛpāyyam RVa na yat paro nāntara ādadharṣad vṛṣaṇvasū RVc duḥśaṃso martyo ripuḥ RVa tā na ā voḷham aśvinā rayim piśaṅgasaṃdṛśam RVc dhiṣṇyā varivovidam RVa indro aṅga mahad bhayam abhī ṣad apa cucyavat RVc sa hi sthiro vicarṣaṇiḥ RVa indraś ca mṛḷayāti no na naḥ paścād aghaṃ naśat RVc bhadram bhavāti naḥ puraḥ RVa indra āśābhyas pari sarvābhyo abhayaṃ karat RVc jetā śatrūn vicarṣaṇiḥ RVa viśve devāsa ā gata śṛṇutā ma imaṃ havam RVc edam barhir ni ṣīdata RVa tīvro vo madhumāṃ ayaṃ śunahotreṣu matsaraḥ RVc etam pibata kāmyam RVa indrajyeṣṭhā marudgaṇā devāsaḥ pūṣarātayaḥ RVc viśve mama śrutā havam RVa ambitame nadītame devitame sarasvati RVc apraśastā iva smasi praśastim amba nas kṛdhi RVa tve viśvā sarasvati śritāyūṃṣi devyām RVc śunahotreṣu matsva prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ RVa imā brahma sarasvati juṣasva vājinīvati RVc yā te manma gṛtsamadā ṛtāvari priyā deveṣu juhvati RVa pretāṃ yajñasya śambhuvā yuvām id ā vṛṇīmahe RVc agniṃ ca havyavāhanam RVa dyāvā naḥ pṛthivī imaṃ sidhram adya divispṛśam RVc yajñaṃ deveṣu yacchatām RVa ā vām upastham adruhā devāḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ RVc ihādya somapītaye RVa kanikradaj januṣam prabruvāṇa iyarti vācam ariteva nāvam RVc sumaṅgalaś ca śakune bhavāsi mā tvā kā cid abhibhā viśvyā vidat RVa mā tvā śyena ud vadhīn mā suparṇo mā tvā vidad iṣumān vīro astā RVc pitryām anu pradiśaṃ kanikradat sumaṅgalo bhadravādī vadeha RVa ava kranda dakṣiṇato gṛhāṇāṃ sumaṅgalo bhadravādī śakunte RVc mā na stena īśata māghaśaṃso bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa pradakṣiṇid abhi gṛṇanti kāravo vayo vadanta ṛtuthā śakuntayaḥ RVc ubhe vācau vadati sāmagā iva gāyatraṃ ca traiṣṭubhaṃ cānu rājati RVa udgāteva śakune sāma gāyasi brahmaputra iva savaneṣu śaṃsasi RVc vṛṣeva vājī śiśumatīr apītyā sarvato naḥ śakune bhadram ā vada viśvato naḥ śakune puṇyam ā vada RVa āvadaṃs tvaṃ śakune bhadram ā vada tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ sumatiṃ cikiddhi naḥ RVc yad utpatan vadasi karkarir yathā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ gveda RVa somasya mā tavasaṃ vakṣy agne vahniṃ cakartha vidathe yajadhyai RVc devāṃ acchā dīdyad yuñje adriṃ śamāye agne tanvaṃ juṣasva RVa prāñcaṃ yajñaṃ cakṛma vardhatāṃ gīḥ samidbhir agniṃ namasā duvasyan RVc divaḥ śaśāsur vidathā kavīnāṃ gṛtsāya cit tavase gātum īṣuḥ RVa mayo dadhe medhiraḥ pūtadakṣo divaḥ subandhur januṣā pṛthivyāḥ RVc avindann u darśatam apsv antar devāso agnim apasi svasṝṇām RVa avardhayan subhagaṃ sapta yahvīḥ śvetaṃ jajñānam aruṣam mahitvā RVc śiśuṃ na jātam abhy ārur aśvā devāso agniṃ janiman vapuṣyan RVa śukrebhir aṅgai raja ātatanvān kratum punānaḥ kavibhiḥ pavitraiḥ RVc śocir vasānaḥ pary āyur apāṃ śriyo mimīte bṛhatīr anūnāḥ RVa vavrājā sīm anadatīr adabdhā divo yahvīr avasānā anagnāḥ RVc sanā atra yuvatayaḥ sayonīr ekaṃ garbhaṃ dadhire sapta vāṇīḥ RVa stīrṇā asya saṃhato viśvarūpā ghṛtasya yonau sravathe madhūnām RVc asthur atra dhenavaḥ pinvamānā mahī dasmasya mātarā samīcī RVa babhrāṇaḥ sūno sahaso vy adyaud dadhānaḥ śukrā rabhasā vapūṃṣi RVc ścotanti dhārā madhuno ghṛtasya vṛṣā yatra vāvṛdhe kāvyena RVa pituś cid ūdhar januṣā viveda vy asya dhārā asṛjad vi dhenāḥ RVc guhā carantaṃ sakhibhiḥ śivebhir divo yahvībhir na guhā babhūva RVa pituś ca garbhaṃ janituś ca babhre pūrvīr eko adhayat pīpyānāḥ RVc vṛṣṇe sapatnī śucaye sabandhū ubhe asmai manuṣye ni pāhi RVa urau mahāṃ anibādhe vavardhāpo agniṃ yaśasaḥ saṃ hi pūrvīḥ RVc ṛtasya yonāv aśayad damūnā jāmīnām agnir apasi svasṝṇām RVa akro na babhriḥ samithe mahīnāṃ didṛkṣeyaḥ sūnave bhāṛjīkaḥ RVc ud usriyā janitā yo jajānāpāṃ garbho nṛtamo yahvo agniḥ RVa apāṃ garbhaṃ darśatam oṣadhīnāṃ vanā jajāna subhagā virūpam RVc devāsaś cin manasā saṃ hi jagmuḥ paniṣṭhaṃ jātaṃ tavasaṃ duvasyan RVa bṛhanta id bhānavo bhāṛjīkam agniṃ sacanta vidyuto na śukrāḥ RVc guheva vṛddhaṃ sadasi sve antar apāra ūrve amṛtaṃ duhānāḥ RVa īḷe ca tvā yajamāno havirbhir īḷe sakhitvaṃ sumatiṃ nikāmaḥ RVc devair avo mimīhi saṃ jaritre rakṣā ca no damyebhir anīkaiḥ RVa upakṣetāras tava supraṇīte gne viśvāni dhanyā dadhānāḥ RVc suretasā śravasā tuñjamānā abhi ṣyāma pṛtanāyūṃr adevān RVa ā devānām abhavaḥ ketur agne mandro viśvāni kāvyāni vidvān RVc prati martāṃ avāsayo damūnā anu devān rathiro yāsi sādhan RVa ni duroṇe amṛto martyānāṃ rājā sasāda vidathāni sādhan RVc ghṛtapratīka urviyā vy adyaud agnir viśvāni kāvyāni vidvān RVa ā no gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhir mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan RVc asme rayim bahulaṃ saṃtarutraṃ suvācam bhāgaṃ yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ RVa etā te agne janimā sanāni pra pūrvyāya nūtanāni vocam RVc mahānti vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtemā janmañjanman nihito jātavedāḥ RVa janmañjanman nihito jātavedā viśvāmitrebhir idhyate ajasraḥ RVc tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma RVa imaṃ yajñaṃ sahasāvan tvaṃ no devatrā dhehi sukrato rarāṇaḥ RVc pra yaṃsi hotar bṛhatīr iṣo no gne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva RVa iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha RVc syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme RVa vaiśvānarāya dhiṣaṇām ṛtāvṛdhe ghṛtaṃ na pūtam agnaye janāmasi RVc dvitā hotāram manuṣaś ca vāghato dhiyā rathaṃ na kuliśaḥ sam ṛṇvati RVa sa rocayaj januṣā rodasī ubhe sa mātror abhavat putra īḍyaḥ RVc havyavāḷ agnir ajaraś canohito dūḷabho viśām atithir vibhāvasuḥ RVa kratvā dakṣasya taruṣo vidharmaṇi devāso agniṃ janayanta cittibhiḥ RVc rurucānam bhānunā jyotiṣā mahām atyaṃ na vājaṃ saniṣyann upa bruve RVa ā mandrasya saniṣyanto vareṇyaṃ vṛṇīmahe ahrayaṃ vājam ṛgmiyam RVc rātim bhṛgūṇām uśijaṃ kavikratum agniṃ rājantaṃ divyena śociṣā RVa agniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janā vājaśravasam iha vṛktabarhiṣaḥ RVc yatasrucaḥ surucaṃ viśvadevyaṃ rudraṃ yajñānāṃ sādhadiṣṭim apasām RVa pāvakaśoce tava hi kṣayam pari hotar yajñeṣu vṛktabarhiṣo naraḥ RVc agne duva icchamānāsa āpyam upāsate draviṇaṃ dhehi tebhyaḥ RVa ā rodasī apṛṇad ā svar mahaj jātaṃ yad enam apaso adhārayan RVc so adhvarāya pari ṇīyate kavir atyo na vājasātaye canohitaḥ RVa namasyata havyadātiṃ svadhvaraṃ duvasyata damyaṃ jātavedasam RVc rathīr ṛtasya bṛhato vicarṣaṇir agnir devānām abhavat purohitaḥ RVa tisro yahvasya samidhaḥ parijmano gner apunann uśijo amṛtyavaḥ RVc tāsām ekām adadhur martye bhujam u lokam u dve upa jāmim īyatuḥ RVa viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatim mānuṣīr iṣaḥ saṃ sīm akṛṇvan svadhitiṃ na tejase RVc sa udvato nivato yāti veviṣat sa garbham eṣu bhuvaneṣu dīdharat RVa sa jinvate jaṭhareṣu prajajñivān vṛṣā citreṣu nānadan na siṃhaḥ RVc vaiśvānaraḥ pṛthupājā amartyo vasu ratnā dayamāno vi dāśuṣe RVa vaiśvānaraḥ pratnathā nākam āruhad divas pṛṣṭham bhandamānaḥ sumanmabhiḥ RVc sa pūrvavaj janayañ jantave dhanaṃ samānam ajmam pary eti jāgṛviḥ RVa ṛtāvānaṃ yajñiyaṃ vipram ukthyam ā yaṃ dadhe mātariśvā divi kṣayam RVc taṃ citrayāmaṃ harikeśam īmahe sudītim agniṃ suvitāya navyase RVa śuciṃ na yāmann iṣiraṃ svardṛśaṃ ketuṃ divo rocanasthām uṣarbudham RVc agnim mūrdhānaṃ divo apratiṣkutaṃ tam īmahe namasā vājinam bṛhat RVa mandraṃ hotāraṃ śucim advayāvinaṃ damūnasam ukthyaṃ viśvacarṣaṇim RVc rathaṃ na citraṃ vapuṣāya darśatam manurhitaṃ sadam id rāya īmahe RVa vaiśvānarāya pṛthupājase vipo ratnā vidhanta dharuṇeṣu gātave RVc agnir hi devāṃ amṛto duvasyaty athā dharmāṇi sanatā na dūduṣat RVa antar dūto rodasī dasma īyate hotā niṣatto manuṣaḥ purohitaḥ RVc kṣayam bṛhantam pari bhūṣati dyubhir devebhir agnir iṣito dhiyāvasuḥ RVa ketuṃ yajñānāṃ vidathasya sādhanaṃ viprāso agnim mahayanta cittibhiḥ RVc apāṃsi yasminn adhi saṃdadhur giras tasmin sumnāni yajamāna ā cake RVa pitā yajñānām asuro vipaścitāṃ vimānam agnir vayunaṃ ca vāghatām RVc ā viveśa rodasī bhūrivarpasā purupriyo bhandate dhāmabhiḥ kaviḥ RVa candram agniṃ candrarathaṃ harivrataṃ vaiśvānaram apsuṣadaṃ svarvidam RVc vigāhaṃ tūrṇiṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtam bhūrṇiṃ devāsa iha suśriyaṃ dadhuḥ RVa agnir devebhir manuṣaś ca jantubhis tanvāno yajñam purupeśasaṃ dhiyā RVc rathīr antar īyate sādhadiṣṭibhir jīro damūnā abhiśasticātanaḥ RVa agne jarasva svapatya āyuny ūrjā pinvasva sam iṣo didīhi naḥ RVc vayāṃsi jinva bṛhataś ca jāgṛva uśig devānām asi sukratur vipām RVa viśpatiṃ yahvam atithiṃ naraḥ sadā yantāraṃ dhīnām uśijaṃ ca vāghatām RVc adhvarāṇāṃ cetanaṃ jātavedasam pra śaṃsanti namasā jūtibhir vṛdhe RVa vibhāvā devaḥ suraṇaḥ pari kṣitīr agnir babhūva śavasā sumadrathaḥ RVc tasya vratāni bhūripoṣiṇo vayam upa bhūṣema dama ā suvṛktibhiḥ RVa vaiśvānara tava dhāmāny ā cake yebhiḥ svarvid abhavo vicakṣaṇa RVc jāta āpṛṇo bhuvanāni rodasī agne tā viśvā paribhūr asi tmanā RVa vaiśvānarasya daṃsanābhyo bṛhad ariṇād ekaḥ svapasyayā kaviḥ RVc ubhā pitarā mahayann ajāyatāgnir dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā RVa samitsamit sumanā bodhy asme śucāśucā sumatiṃ rāsi vasvaḥ RVc ā deva devān yajathāya vakṣi sakhā sakhīn sumanā yakṣy agne RVa yaṃ devāsas trir ahann āyajante divedive varuṇo mitro agniḥ RVc semaṃ yajñam madhumantaṃ kṛdhī nas tanūnapād ghṛtayoniṃ vidhantam RVa pra dīdhitir viśvavārā jigāti hotāram iḷaḥ prathamaṃ yajadhyai RVc acchā namobhir vṛṣabhaṃ vandadhyai sa devān yakṣad iṣito yajīyān RVa ūrdhvo vāṃ gātur adhvare akāry ūrdhvā śocīṃṣi prasthitā rajāṃsi RVc divo vā nābhā ny asādi hotā stṛṇīmahi devavyacā vi barhiḥ RVa sapta hotrāṇi manasā vṛṇānā invanto viśvam prati yann ṛtena RVc nṛpeśaso vidatheṣu pra jātā abhīmaṃ yajñaṃ vi caranta pūrvīḥ RVa ā bhandamāne uṣasā upāke uta smayete tanvā virūpe RVc yathā no mitro varuṇo jujoṣad indro marutvāṃ uta vā mahobhiḥ RVa daivyā hotārā prathamā ny ṛñje sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti RVc ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛtam it ta āhur anu vrataṃ vratapā dīdhyānāḥ RVa ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣā iḷā devair manuṣyebhir agniḥ RVc sarasvatī sārasvatebhir arvāk tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantu RVa tan nas turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva RVc yato vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ sudakṣo yuktagrāvā jāyate devakāmaḥ RVa vanaspate va sṛjopa devān agnir haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti RVc sed u hotā satyataro yajāti yathā devānāṃ janimāni veda RVa ā yāhy agne samidhāno arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ turebhiḥ RVc barhir na āstām aditiḥ suputrā svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām RVa praty agnir uṣasaś cekitāno bodhi vipraḥ padavīḥ kavīnām RVc pṛthupājā devayadbhiḥ samiddho pa dvārā tamaso vahnir āvaḥ RVa pred v agnir vāvṛdhe stomebhir gīrbhi stotṝṇāṃ namasya ukthaiḥ RVc pūrvīr ṛtasya saṃdṛśaś cakānaḥ saṃ dūto adyaud uṣaso viroke RVa adhāyy agnir mānuṣīṣu vikṣv apāṃ garbho mitra ṛtena sādhan RVc ā haryato yajataḥ sānv asthād abhūd u vipro havyo matīnām RVa mitro agnir bhavati yat samiddho mitro hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ RVc mitro adhvaryur iṣiro damūnā mitraḥ sindhūnām uta parvatānām RVa pāti priyaṃ ripo agram padaṃ veḥ pāti yahvaś caraṇaṃ sūryasya RVc pāti nābhā saptaśīrṣāṇam agniḥ pāti devānām upamādam ṛṣvaḥ RVa ṛbhuś cakra īḍyaṃ cāru nāma viśvāni devo vayunāni vidvān RVc sasasya carma ghṛtavat padaṃ ves tad id agnī rakṣaty aprayucchan RVa ā yonim agnir ghṛtavantam asthāt pṛthupragāṇam uśantam uśānaḥ RVc dīdyānaḥ śucir ṛṣvaḥ pāvakaḥ punaḥpunar mātarā navyasī kaḥ RVa sadyo jāta oṣadhībhir vavakṣe yadī vardhanti prasvo ghṛtena RVc āpa iva pravatā śumbhamānā uruṣyad agniḥ pitror upasthe RVa ud u ṣṭutaḥ samidhā yahvo adyaud varṣman divo adhi nābhā pṛthivyāḥ RVc mitro agnir īḍyo mātariśvā dūto vakṣad yajathāya devān RVa ud astambhīt samidhā nākam ṛṣvo gnir bhavann uttamo rocanānām RVc yadī bhṛgubhyaḥ pari mātariśvā guhā santaṃ havyavāhaṃ samīdhe RVa iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha RVc syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme RVa pra kāravo mananā vacyamānā devadrīcīṃ nayata devayantaḥ RVc dakṣiṇāvāḍ vājinī prācy eti havir bharanty agnaye ghṛtācī RVa ā rodasī apṛṇā jāyamāna uta pra rikthā adha nu prayajyo RVc divaś cid agne mahinā pṛthivyā vacyantāṃ te vahnayaḥ saptajihvāḥ RVa dyauś ca tvā pṛthivī yajñiyāso ni hotāraṃ sādayante damāya RVc yadī viśo mānuṣīr devayantīḥ prayasvatīr īḷate śukram arciḥ RVa mahān sadhasthe dhruva ā niṣatto ntar dyāvā māhine haryamāṇaḥ RVc āskre sapatnī ajare amṛkte sabardughe urugāyasya dhenū RVa vratā te agne mahato mahāni tava kratvā rodasī ā tatantha RVc tvaṃ dūto abhavo jāyamānas tvaṃ netā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām RVa ṛtasya vā keśinā yogyābhir ghṛtasnuvā rohitā dhuri dhiṣva RVc athā vaha devān deva viśvān svadhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ RVa divaś cid ā te rucayanta rokā uṣo vibhātīr anu bhāsi pūrvīḥ RVc apo yad agna uśadhag vaneṣu hotur mandrasya panayanta devāḥ RVa urau vā ye antarikṣe madanti divo vā ye rocane santi devāḥ RVc ūmā vā ye suhavāso yajatrā āyemire rathyo agne aśvāḥ RVa aibhir agne sarathaṃ yāhy arvāṅ nānārathaṃ vā vibhavo hy aśvāḥ RVc patnīvatas triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva RVa sa hotā yasya rodasī cid urvī yajñaṃyajñam abhi vṛdhe gṛṇītaḥ RVc prācī adhvareva tasthatuḥ sumeke ṛtāvarī ṛtajātasya satye RVa iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha RVc syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme RVa pra ya āruḥ śitipṛṣṭhasya dhāser ā mātarā viviśuḥ sapta vāṇīḥ RVc parikṣitā pitarā saṃ carete pra sarsrāte dīrgham āyuḥ prayakṣe RVa divakṣaso dhenavo vṛṣṇo aśvā devīr ā tasthau madhumad vahantīḥ RVc ṛtasya tvā sadasi kṣemayantam pary ekā carati vartaniṃ gauḥ RVa ā sīm arohat suyamā bhavantīḥ patiś cikitvān rayivid rayīṇām RVc pra nīlapṛṣṭho atasasya dhāses tā avāsayat purudhapratīkaḥ RVa mahi tvāṣṭram ūrjayantīr ajuryaṃ stabhūyamānaṃ vahato vahanti RVc vy aṅgebhir didyutānaḥ sadhastha ekām iva rodasī ā viveśa RVa jānanti vṛṣṇo aruṣasya śevam uta bradhnasya śāsane raṇanti RVc divorucaḥ suruco rocamānā iḷā yeṣāṃ gaṇyā māhinā gīḥ RVa uto pitṛbhyām pravidānu ghoṣam maho mahadbhyām anayanta śūṣam RVc ukṣā ha yatra pari dhānam aktor anu svaṃ dhāma jaritur vavakṣa RVa adhvaryubhiḥ pañcabhiḥ suvācaḥ suketava uṣaso revad ūṣuḥ RVc uto cid agne mahinā pṛthivyāḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ sam mahe daśasya RVa iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha RVc syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne brahma vanvāno ajaraṃ suvīram RVc āre asmad amatim bādhamāna uc chrayasva mahate saubhagāya RVa uc chrayasva vanaspate varṣman pṛthivyā adhi RVc sumitī mīyamāno varco dhā yajñavāhase RVa yuvā suvāsāḥ parivīta āgāt sa u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ RVc taṃ dhīrāsaḥ kavaya un nayanti svādhyo manasā devayantaḥ RVa jāto jāyate sudinatve ahnāṃ samarya ā vidathe vardhamānaḥ RVc punanti dhīrā apaso manīṣā devayā vipra ud iyarti vācam RVa yān vo naro devayanto nimimyur vanaspate svadhitir vā tatakṣa RVc te devāsaḥ svaravas tasthivāṃsaḥ prajāvad asme didhiṣantu ratnam RVa ye vṛkṇāso adhi kṣami nimitāso yatasrucaḥ RVc te no vyantu vāryaṃ devatrā kṣetrasādhasaḥ RVa ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sunīthā dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī antarikṣam RVc sajoṣaso yajñam avantu devā ūrdhvaṃ kṛṇvantv adhvarasya ketum RVa haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatānāḥ śukrā vasānāḥ svaravo na āguḥ RVc unnīyamānāḥ kavibhiḥ purastād devā devānām api yanti pāthaḥ RVa śṛṅgāṇīvec chṛṅgiṇāṃ saṃ dadṛśre caṣālavantaḥ svaravaḥ pṛthivyām RVc vāghadbhir vā vihave śroṣamāṇā asmāṃ avantu pṛtanājyeṣu RVa vanaspate śatavalśo vi roha sahasravalśā vi vayaṃ ruhema RVc yaṃ tvām ayaṃ svadhitis tejamānaḥ praṇināya mahate saubhagāya RVa sakhāyas tvā vavṛmahe devam martāsa ūtaye RVc apāṃ napātaṃ subhagaṃ sudīditiṃ supratūrtim anehasam RVa kāyamāno vanā tvaṃ yan mātṝr ajagann apaḥ RVc na tat te agne pramṛṣe nivartanaṃ yad dūre sann ihābhavaḥ RVa ati tṛṣṭaṃ vavakṣithāthaiva sumanā asi RVc praprānye yanti pary anya āsate yeṣāṃ sakhye asi śritaḥ RVa īyivāṃsam ati sridhaḥ śaśvatīr ati saścataḥ RVc anv īm avindan nicirāso adruho psu siṃham iva śritam RVa yaviṣṭhya RVa tad bhadraṃ tava daṃsanā pākāya cic chadayati RVc tvāṃ yad agne paśavaḥ samāsate samiddham apiśarvare RVa ā juhotā svadhvaraṃ śīram pāvakaśociṣam RVc āśuṃ dūtam ajiram pratnam īḍyaṃ śruṣṭī devaṃ saparyata RVa trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇy agniṃ triṃśac ca devā nava cāsaparyan RVc aukṣan ghṛtair astṛṇan barhir asmā ād id dhotāraṃ ny asādayanta RVa tvām agne manīṣiṇaḥ samrājaṃ
