jāro na yoṣitam RVa eṣa sya madyo raso va caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ RVc ya indur vāram āviśat RVa eṣa sya pītaye suto harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ RVc krandan yonim abhi priyam RVa āśur arṣa bṛhanmate pari priyeṇa dhāmnā RVc yatra devā iti bravan RVa pariṣkṛṇvann aniṣkṛtaṃ janāya yātayann iṣaḥ RVc vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pari srava RVa suta eti pavitra ā tviṣiṃ dadhāna ojasā RVc vicakṣāṇo virocayan RVa ayaṃ sa yo divas pari raghuyāmā pavitra ā RVc sindhor ūrmā vy akṣarat RVa āvivāsan parāvato atho arvāvataḥ sutaḥ RVc indrāya sicyate madhu RVa samīcīnā anūṣata hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ RVc yonāv ṛtasya sīdata RVa punāno akramīd abhi viśvā mṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ RVc śumbhanti vipraṃ dhītibhiḥ RVa ā yonim aruṇo ruhad gamad indraṃ vṛṣā sutaḥ RVc dhruve sadasi sīdati RVa nū no rayim mahām indo smabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ RVc ā pavasva sahasriṇam RVa viśvā soma pavamāna dyumnānīndav ā bhara RVc vidāḥ sahasriṇīr iṣaḥ RVa sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ stotre suvīryam RVc jaritur vardhayā giraḥ RVa punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim RVc vṛṣann indo na ukthyam RVa pra ye gāvo na bhūrṇayas tveṣā ayāso akramuḥ RVc ghnantaḥ kṛṣṇām apa tvacam RVa suvitasya manāmahe ti setuṃ durāvyam RVc sāhvāṃso dasyum avratam RVa sūryo na raśmibhiḥ RVa pari ṇaḥ śarmayantyā dhārayā soma viśvataḥ RVc sarā raseva viṣṭapam RVa janayan rocanā divo janayann apsu sūryam RVc vasāno gā apo hariḥ RVa eṣa pratnena manmanā devo devebhyas pari RVc dhārayā pavate sutaḥ RVa vāvṛdhānāya tūrvaye pavante vājasātaye RVc somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ RVa duhānaḥ pratnam it payaḥ pavitre pari ṣicyate RVc krandan devāṃ ajījanat RVa abhi viśvāni vāryābhi devāṃ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ RVc somaḥ punāno arṣati RVa goman naḥ soma vīravad aśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ RVc pavasva bṛhatīr iṣaḥ RVa yo atya iva mṛjyate gobhir madāya haryataḥ RVc taṃ gīrbhir vāsayāmasi RVa taṃ no viśvā avasyuvo giraḥ śumbhanti pūrvathā RVc indum indrāya pītaye RVa punāno yāti haryataḥ somo gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ RVc viprasya medhyātitheḥ RVa pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṃ soma suśriyam RVc indo sahasravarcasam RVa indur atyo na vājasṛt kanikranti pavitra ā RVc yad akṣār ati devayuḥ RVa pavasva vājasātaye viprasya gṛṇato vṛdhe RVc soma rāsva suvīryam RVa pra ṇa indo mahe tana ūrmiṃ na bibhrad arṣasi RVc abhi devāṃ ayāsyaḥ RVa matī juṣṭo dhiyā hitaḥ somo hinve parāvati RVc viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ RVa ayaṃ deveṣu jāgṛviḥ suta eti pavitra ā RVc somo yāti vicarṣaṇiḥ RVa sa naḥ pavasva vājayuś cakrāṇaś cārum adhvaram RVc barhiṣmāṃ ā vivāsati RVa sa no bhagāya vāyave vipravīraḥ sadāvṛdhaḥ RVc somo deveṣv ā yamat RVa sa no adya vasuttaye kratuvid gātuvittamaḥ RVc vājaṃ jeṣi śravo bṛhat RVa sa pavasva madāya kaṃ nṛcakṣā devavītaye RVc indav indrāya pītaye RVa sa no arṣābhi dūtyaṃ tvam indrāya tośase RVc devān sakhibhya ā varam RVa uta tvām aruṇaṃ vayaṃ gobhir añjmo madāya kam RVc vi no rāye duro vṛdhi RVa aty ū pavitram akramīd vājī dhuraṃ na yāmani RVc indur deveṣu patyate RVa sam ī sakhāyo asvaran vane krīḷantam atyavim RVc induṃ nāvā anūṣata RVa tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā pīto vicakṣase RVc indo stotre suvīryam RVa asṛgran devavītaye tyāsaḥ kṛtvyā iva RVc kṣarantaḥ parvatāvṛdhaḥ RVa pariṣkṛtāsa indavo yoṣeva pitryāvatī RVc vāyuṃ somā asṛkṣata RVa ete somāsa indavaḥ prayasvantaś camū sutāḥ RVc indraṃ vardhanti karmabhiḥ RVa ā dhāvatā suhastyaḥ śukrā gṛbhṇīta manthinā RVc gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram RVa sa pavasva dhanañjaya prayantā rādhaso mahaḥ RVc asmabhyaṃ soma gātuvit RVa etam mṛjanti marjyam pavamānaṃ daśa kṣipaḥ RVc indrāya matsaram madam RVa ayā somaḥ sukṛtyayā mahaś cid abhy avardhata RVc mandāna ud vṛṣāyate RVa kṛtānīd asya kartvā cetante dasyutarhaṇā RVc ṛṇā ca dhṛṣṇuś cayate RVa āt soma indriyo raso vajraḥ sahasrasā bhuvat RVc ukthaṃ yad asya jāyate RVa svayaṃ kavir vidhartari viprāya ratnam icchati RVc yadī marmṛjyate dhiyaḥ RVa siṣāsatū rayīṇāṃ vājeṣv arvatām iva RVc bhareṣu jigyuṣām asi RVa taṃ tvā nṛmṇāni bibhrataṃ sadhastheṣu maho divaḥ RVc cāruṃ sukṛtyayemahe RVa saṃvṛktadhṛṣṇum ukthyam mahāmahivratam madam RVc śatam puro rurukṣaṇim RVa atas tvā rayim abhi rājānaṃ sukrato divaḥ RVc suparṇo avyathir bharat RVa viśvasmā it svar dṛśe sādhāraṇaṃ rajasturam RVc gopām ṛtasya vir bharat RVa adhā hinvāna indriyaṃ jyāyo mahitvam ānaśe RVc abhiṣṭikṛd vicarṣaṇiḥ RVa pavasva vṛṣṭim ā su no pām ūrmiṃ divas pari RVc ayakṣmā bṛhatīr iṣaḥ RVa tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā gāva ihāgaman RVc janyāsa upa no gṛham RVa ghṛtam pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu devavītamaḥ RVc asmabhyaṃ vṛṣṭim ā pava RVa sa na ūrje vy avyayam pavitraṃ dhāva dhārayā RVc devāsaḥ śṛṇavan hi kam RVa pavamāno asiṣyadad rakṣāṃsy apajaṅghanat RVc pratnavad rocayan rucaḥ RVa ut te śuṣmāsa īrate sindhor ūrmer iva svanaḥ RVc vāṇasya codayā pavim RVa prasave ta ud īrate tisro vāco makhasyuvaḥ RVc yad avya eṣi sānavi RVa avyo vāre pari priyaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ RVc pavamānam madhuścutam RVa ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave RVc arkasya yonim āsadam RVa sa pavasva madintama gobhir añjāno aktubhiḥ RVc indav indrāya pītaye RVa adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutaṃ somam pavitra ā sṛja RVc punīhīndrāya pātave RVa divaḥ pīyūṣam uttamaṃ somam indrāya vajriṇe RVc sunotā madhumattamam RVa tava tya indo andhaso devā madhor vy aśnate RVc pavamānasya marutaḥ RVa tvaṃ hi soma vardhayan suto madāya bhūrṇaye RVc vṛṣan stotāram ūtaye RVa abhy arṣa vicakṣaṇa pavitraṃ dhārayā sutaḥ RVc abhi vājam uta śravaḥ RVa pari dyukṣaḥ sanadrayir bharad vājaṃ no andhasā RVc suvāno arṣa pavitra ā RVa tava pratnebhir adhvabhir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ RVc sahasradhāro yāt tanā RVa carur na yas tam īṅkhayendo na dānam īṅkhaya RVc vadhair vadhasnav īṅkhaya RVa ni śuṣmam indav eṣām puruhūta janānām RVc yo asmāṃ ādideśati RVa śataṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sahasraṃ vā śucīnām RVc pavasva maṃhayadrayiḥ RVa ut te śuṣmāso asthū rakṣo bhindanto adrivaḥ RVc nudasva yāḥ parispṛdhaḥ RVa ayā nijaghnir ojasā rathasaṃge dhane hite RVc stavā abibhyuṣā hṛdā RVa asya vratāni nādhṛṣe pavamānasya dūḍhyā RVc ruja yas tvā pṛtanyati RVa taṃ hinvanti madacyutaṃ hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam RVc indum indrāya matsaram RVa asya pratnām anu dyutaṃ śukraṃ duduhre ahrayaḥ RVc payaḥ sahasrasām ṛṣim RVa ayaṃ sūrya ivopadṛg ayaṃ sarāṃsi dhāvati RVc sapta pravata ā divam RVa ayaṃ viśvāni tiṣṭhati punāno bhuvanopari RVc somo devo na sūryaḥ RVa pari ṇo devavītaye vājāṃ arṣasi gomataḥ RVc punāna indav indrayuḥ RVa yavaṃyavaṃ no andhasā puṣṭampuṣṭam pari srava RVc soma viśvā ca saubhagā RVa indo yathā tava stavo yathā te jātam andhasaḥ RVc ni barhiṣi priye sadaḥ RVa uta no govid aśvavit pavasva somāndhasā RVc makṣūtamebhir ahabhiḥ RVa yo jināti na jīyate hanti śatrum abhītya RVc sa pavasva sahasrajit RVa pari soma ṛtam bṛhad āśuḥ pavitre arṣati RVc vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ RVa yat somo vājam arṣati śataṃ dhārā apasyuvaḥ RVc indrasya sakhyam āviśan RVa abhi tvā yoṣaṇo daśa jāraṃ na kanyānūṣata RVc mṛjyase soma sātaye RVa tvam indrāya viṣṇave svādur indo pari srava RVc nṝn stotṝn pāhy aṃhasaḥ RVa pra te dhārā asaścato divo na yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ RVc acchā vājaṃ sahasriṇam RVa abhi priyāṇi kāvyā viśvā cakṣāṇo arṣati RVc haris tuñjāna āyudhā RVa sa marmṛjāna āyubhir ibho rājeva suvrataḥ RVc śyeno na vaṃsu ṣīdati RVa sa no viśvā divo vasūto pṛthivyā adhi RVc punāna indav ā bhara RVa tarat sa mandī dhāvati dhārā sutasyāndhasaḥ RVc tarat sa mandī dhāvati RVa usrā veda vasūnām martasya devy avasaḥ RVc tarat sa mandī dhāvati RVa dhvasrayoḥ puruṣantyor ā sahasrāṇi dadmahe RVc tarat sa mandī dhāvati RVa ā yayos triṃśataṃ tanā sahasrāṇi ca dadmahe RVc tarat sa mandī dhāvati RVa pavasva gojid aśvajid viśvajit soma raṇyajit RVc prajāvad ratnam ā bhara RVa pavasvādbhyo adābhyaḥ pavasvauṣadhībhyaḥ RVc pavasva dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ RVa tvaṃ soma pavamāno viśvāni duritā tara RVc kaviḥ sīda ni barhiṣi RVa pavamāna svar vido jāyamāno bhavo mahān RVc indo viśvāṃ abhīd asi RVa pra gāyatreṇa gāyata pavamānaṃ vicarṣaṇim RVc induṃ sahasracakṣasam RVa taṃ tvā sahasracakṣasam atho sahasrabharṇasam RVc ati vāram apāviṣuḥ RVa ati vārān pavamāno asiṣyadat kalaśāṃ abhi dhāvati RVc indrasya hārdy āviśan RVa indrasya soma rādhase śam pavasva vicarṣaṇe RVc prajāvad reta ā bhara RVa ayā vītī pari srava yas ta indo madeṣv ā RVc avāhan navatīr nava RVa puraḥ sadya itthādhiye divodāsāya śambaram RVc adha tyaṃ turvaśaṃ yadum RVa pari ṇo aśvam aśvavid gomad indo hiraṇyavat RVc kṣarā sahasriṇīr iṣaḥ RVa pavamānasya te vayam pavitram abhyundataḥ RVc sakhitvam ā vṛṇīmahe RVa ye te pavitram ūrmayo bhikṣaranti dhārayā RVc tebhir naḥ soma mṛḷaya RVa sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ vīravatīm iṣam RVc īśānaḥ soma viśvataḥ RVa etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sindhumātaram RVc sam ādityebhir akhyata RVa sam indreṇota vāyunā suta eti pavitra ā RVc saṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ RVa sa no bhagāya vāyave pūṣṇe pavasva madhumān RVc cārur mitre varuṇe ca RVa uccā te jātam andhaso divi ṣad bhūmy ā dade RVc ugraṃ śarma mahi śravaḥ RVa enā viśvāny arya ā dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām RVc siṣāsanto vanāmahe RVa sa na indrāya yajyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ RVc varivovit pari srava RVa upo ṣu jātam apturaṃ gobhir bhaṅgam pariṣkṛtam RVc induṃ devā ayāsiṣuḥ RVa tam id vardhantu no giro vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva RVc ya indrasya hṛdaṃsaniḥ RVa arṣā ṇaḥ soma śaṃ gave dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam RVc vardhā samudram ukthyam RVa pavamāno ajījanad divaś citraṃ na tanyatum RVc jyotir vaiśvānaram bṛhat RVa pavamānasya te raso mado rājann aducchunaḥ RVc vi vāram avyam arṣati RVa pavamāna rasas tava dakṣo vi rājati dyumān RVc jyotir viśvaṃ svar dṛśe RVa yas te mado vareṇyas tenā pavasvāndhasā RVc devāvīr aghaśaṃsahā RVa jaghnir vṛtram amitriyaṃ sasnir vājaṃ divedive RVc goṣā u aśvasā asi RVa sammiślo aruṣo bhava sūpasthābhir na dhenubhiḥ RVc sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā RVa sa pavasva ya āvithendraṃ vṛtrāya hantave RVc vavrivāṃsam mahīr apaḥ RVa suvīrāso vayaṃ dhanā jayema soma mīḍhvaḥ RVc punāno vardha no giraḥ RVa tvotāsas tavāvasā syāma vanvanta āmuraḥ RVc soma vrateṣu jāgṛhi RVa apaghnan pavate mṛdho pa somo arāvṇaḥ RVc gacchann indrasya niṣkṛtam RVa maho no rāya ā bhara pavamāna jahī mṛdhaḥ RVc rāsvendo vīravad yaśaḥ RVa na tvā śataṃ cana hruto rādho ditsantam ā minan RVc yat punāno makhasyase RVa pavasvendo vṛṣā sutaḥ kṛdhī no yaśaso jane RVc viśvā apa dviṣo jahi RVa asya te sakhye vayaṃ tavendo dyumna uttame RVc sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ RVa yā te bhīmāny āyudhā tigmāni santi dhūrvaṇe RVc rakṣā samasya no nidaḥ RVa ete asṛgram indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ RVc viśvāny abhi saubhagā RVa vighnanto duritā puru sugā tokāya vājinaḥ RVc tanā kṛṇvanto arvate RVa kṛṇvanto varivo gave bhy arṣanti suṣṭutim RVc iḷām asmabhyaṃ saṃyatam RVa asāvy aṃśur madāyāpsu dakṣo giriṣṭhāḥ RVc śyeno na yonim āsadat RVa śubhram andho devavātam apsu dhūto nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ RVc svadanti gāvaḥ payobhiḥ RVa ād īm aśvaṃ na hetāro śūśubhann amṛtāya RVc madhvo rasaṃ sadhamāde RVa yās te dhārā madhuścuto sṛgram inda ūtaye RVc tābhiḥ pavitram āsadaḥ RVa so arṣendrāya pītaye tiro romāṇy avyayā RVc sīdan yonā vaneṣv ā RVa tvam indo pari srava svādiṣṭho aṅgirobhyaḥ RVc varivovid ghṛtam payaḥ RVa ayaṃ vicarṣaṇir hitaḥ pavamānaḥ sa cetati RVc hinvāna āpyam bṛhat RVa eṣa vṛṣā vṛṣavrataḥ pavamāno aśastihā RVc karad vasūni dāśuṣe RVa ā pavasva sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam RVc puruścandram puruspṛham RVa eṣa sya pari ṣicyate marmṛjyamāna āyubhiḥ RVc urugāyaḥ kavikratuḥ RVa sahasrotiḥ śatāmagho vimāno rajasaḥ kaviḥ RVc indrāya pavate madaḥ RVa girā jāta iha stuta indur indrāya dhīyate RVc vir yonā vasatāv iva RVa pavamānaḥ suto nṛbhiḥ somo vājam ivāsarat RVc camūṣu śakmanāsadam RVa taṃ tripṛṣṭhe trivandhure rathe yuñjanti yātave RVc ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta dhītibhiḥ RVa taṃ sotāro dhanaspṛtam āśuṃ vājāya yātave RVc hariṃ hinota vājinam RVa āviśan kalaśaṃ suto viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ RVc śūro na goṣu tiṣṭhati RVa ā ta indo madāya kam payo duhanty āyavaḥ RVc devā devebhyo madhu RVa ā naḥ somam pavitra ā sṛjatā madhumattamam RVc devebhyo devaśruttamam RVa ete somā asṛkṣata gṛṇānāḥ śravase mahe RVc madintamasya dhārayā RVa abhi gavyāni vītaye nṛmṇā punāno arṣasi RVc sanadvājaḥ pari srava RVa uta no gomatīr iṣo viśvā arṣa pariṣṭubhaḥ RVc gṛṇāno jamadagninā RVa pavasva vāco agriyaḥ soma citrābhir ūtibhiḥ RVc abhi viśvāni kāvyā RVa tvaṃ samudriyā apo griyo vāca īrayan RVc pavasva viśvamejaya RVa tubhyemā bhuvanā kave mahimne soma tasthire RVc tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ RVa pra te divo na vṛṣṭayo dhārā yanty asaścataḥ RVc abhi śukrām upastiram RVa indrāyendum punītanograṃ dakṣāya sādhanam RVc īśānaṃ vītirādhasam RVa pavamāna ṛtaḥ kaviḥ somaḥ pavitram āsadat RVc dadhat stotre suvīryam RVa ā pavasva sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ soma suvīryam RVc asme śravāṃsi dhāraya RVa iṣam ūrjaṃ ca pinvasa indrāya matsarintamaḥ RVc camūṣv ā ni ṣīdasi RVa suta indrāya viṣṇave somaḥ kalaśe akṣarat RVc madhumāṃ astu vāyave RVa ete asṛgram āśavo ti hvarāṃsi babhravaḥ RVc somā ṛtasya dhārayā RVa indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvanto viśvam āryam RVc apaghnanto arāvṇaḥ RVa sutā anu svam ā rajo bhy arṣanti babhravaḥ RVc indraṃ gacchanta indavaḥ RVa ayā pavasva dhārayā yayā sūryam arocayaḥ RVc hinvāno mānuṣīr apaḥ RVa ayukta sūra etaśam pavamāno manāv adhi RVc antarikṣeṇa yātave RVa uta tyā harito daśa sūro ayukta yātave RVc indur indra iti bruvan RVa parīto vāyave sutaṃ gira indrāya matsaram RVc avyo vāreṣu siñcata RVa pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṃ soma duṣṭaram RVc yo dūṇāśo vanuṣyatā RVa abhy arṣa sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam RVc abhi vājam uta śravaḥ RVa somo devo na sūryo dribhiḥ pavate sutaḥ RVc dadhānaḥ kalaśe rasam RVa ete dhāmāny āryā śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā RVc vājaṃ gomantam akṣaran RVa sutā indrāya vajriṇe somāso dadhyāśiraḥ RVc pavitram aty akṣaran RVa pra soma madhumattamo rāye arṣa pavitra ā RVc mado yo devavītamaḥ RVa tam ī mṛjanty āyavo hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam RVc indum indrāya matsaram RVa ā pavasva hiraṇyavad aśvāvat soma vīravat RVc vājaṃ gomantam ā bhara RVa pari vāje na vājayum avyo vāreṣu siñcata RVc indrāya madhumattamam RVa kavim mṛjanti marjyaṃ dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ RVc vṛṣā kanikrad arṣati RVa vṛṣaṇaṃ dhībhir apturaṃ somam ṛtasya dhārayā RVc matī viprāḥ sam asvaran RVa pavasva devāyuṣag indraṃ gacchatu te madaḥ RVc vāyum ā roha dharmaṇā RVa pavamāna ni tośase rayiṃ soma śravāyyam RVc priyaḥ samudram ā viśa RVa apaghnan pavase mṛdhaḥ kratuvit soma matsaraḥ RVc nudasvādevayuṃ janam RVa pavamānā asṛkṣata somāḥ śukrāsa indavaḥ RVc abhi viśvāni kāvyā RVa pavamānāsa āśavaḥ śubhrā asṛgram indavaḥ RVc ghnanto viśvā apa dviṣaḥ RVa pavamānā divas pary antarikṣād asṛkṣata RVc pṛthivyā adhi sānavi RVa punānaḥ soma dhārayendo viśvā apa sridhaḥ RVc jahi rakṣāṃsi sukrato RVa apaghnan soma rakṣaso bhy arṣa kanikradat RVc dyumantaṃ śuṣmam uttamam RVa asme vasūni dhāraya soma divyāni pārthivā RVc indo viśvāni vāryā RVa vṛṣā soma dyumāṃ asi vṛṣā deva vṛṣavrataḥ RVc vṛṣā dharmāṇi dadhiṣe RVa vṛṣṇas te vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo vṛṣā vanaṃ vṛṣā madaḥ RVc satyaṃ vṛṣan vṛṣed asi RVa aśvo na cakrado vṛṣā saṃ gā indo sam arvataḥ RVc vi no rāye duro vṛdhi RVa asṛkṣata pra vājino gavyā somāso aśvayā RVc śukrāso vīrayāśavaḥ RVa śumbhamānā ṛtāyubhir mṛjyamānā gabhastyoḥ RVc pavante vāre avyaye RVa te viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somā divyāni pārthivā RVc pavantām āntarikṣyā RVa pavamānasya viśvavit pra te sargā asṛkṣata RVc sūryasyeva na raśmayaḥ RVa ketuṃ kṛṇvan divas pari viśvā rūpābhy arṣasi RVc samudraḥ soma pinvase RVa hinvāno vācam iṣyasi pavamāna vidharmaṇi RVc akrān devo na sūryaḥ RVa induḥ paviṣṭa cetanaḥ priyaḥ kavīnām matī RVc sṛjad aśvaṃ rathīr iva RVa ūrmir yas te pavitra ā devāvīḥ paryakṣarat RVc sīdann ṛtasya yonim ā RVa sa no arṣa pavitra ā mado yo devavītamaḥ RVc indav indrāya pītaye RVa iṣe pavasva dhārayā mṛjyamāno manīṣibhiḥ RVc indo rucābhi gā ihi RVa punāno varivas kṛdhy ūrjaṃ janāya girvaṇaḥ RVc hare sṛjāna āśiram RVa punāno devavītaya indrasya yāhi niṣkṛtam RVc dyutāno vājibhir yataḥ RVa pra hinvānāsa indavo cchā samudram āśavaḥ RVc dhiyā jūtā asṛkṣata RVa marmṛjānāsa āyavo vṛthā samudram indavaḥ RVc agmann ṛtasya yonim ā RVa pari ṇo yāhy asmayur viśvā vasūny ojasā RVc pāhi naḥ śarma vīravat RVa mimāti vahnir etaśaḥ padaṃ yujāna ṛkvabhiḥ RVc pra yat samudra āhitaḥ RVa ā yad yoniṃ hiraṇyayam āśur ṛtasya sīdati RVc jahāty apracetasaḥ RVa abhi venā anūṣateyakṣanti pracetasaḥ RVc majjanty avicetasaḥ RVa indrāyendo marutvate pavasva madhumattamaḥ RVc ṛtasya yonim āsadam RVa taṃ tvā viprā vacovidaḥ pari ṣkṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ RVc saṃ tvā mṛjanty āyavaḥ RVa rasaṃ te mitro aryamā pibanti varuṇaḥ kave RVc pavamānasya marutaḥ RVa tvaṃ soma vipaścitam punāno vācam iṣyasi RVc indo sahasrabharṇasam RVa uto sahasrabharṇasaṃ vācaṃ soma makhasyuvam RVc punāna indav ā bhara RVa punāna indav eṣām puruhūta janānām RVc priyaḥ samudram ā viśa RVa davidyutatyā rucā pariṣṭobhantyā kṛpā RVc somāḥ śukrā gavāśiraḥ RVa hinvāno hetṛbhir yata ā vājaṃ vājy akramīt RVc sīdanto vanuṣo yathā RVa ṛdhak soma svastaye saṃjagmāno divaḥ kaviḥ RVc pavasva sūryo dṛśe RVa hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ svasāro jāmayas patim RVc mahām indum mahīyuvaḥ RVa pavamāna rucārucā devo devebhyas pari RVc viśvā vasūny ā viśa RVa ā pavamāna suṣṭutiṃ vṛṣṭiṃ devebhyo duvaḥ RVc iṣe pavasva saṃyatam RVa vṛṣā hy asi bhānunā dyumantaṃ tvā havāmahe RVc pavamāna svādhyaḥ RVa ā pavasva suvīryam mandamānaḥ svāyudha RVc iho ṣv indav ā gahi RVa yad adbhiḥ pariṣicyase mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ RVc druṇā sadhastham aśnuṣe RVa pra somāya vyaśvavat pavamānāya gāyata RVc mahe sahasracakṣase RVa yasya varṇam madhuścutaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ RVc indum indrāya pītaye RVa tasya te vājino vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ RVc sakhitvam ā vṛṇīmahe RVa vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā marutvate ca matsaraḥ RVc viśvā dadhāna ojasā RVa taṃ tvā dhartāram oṇyoḥ pavamāna svardṛśam RVc hinve vājeṣu vājinam RVa ayā citto vipānayā hariḥ pavasva dhārayā RVc yujaṃ vājeṣu codaya RVa ā na indo mahīm iṣam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ RVc asmabhyaṃ soma gātuvit RVa ā kalaśā anūṣatendo dhārābhir ojasā RVc endrasya pītaye viśa RVa yasya te madyaṃ rasaṃ tīvraṃ duhanty adribhiḥ RVc sa pavasvābhimātihā RVa rājā medhābhir īyate pavamāno manāv adhi RVc antarikṣeṇa yātave RVa ā na indo śatagvinaṃ gavām poṣaṃ svaśvyam RVc vahā bhagattim ūtaye RVa ā naḥ soma saho juvo rūpaṃ na varcase bhara RVc suṣvāṇo devavītaye RVa arṣā soma dyumattamo bhi droṇāni roruvat RVc sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā RVa apsā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ RVc somo arṣati viṣṇave RVa iṣaṃ tokāya no dadhad asmabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ RVc ā pavasva sahasriṇam RVa ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire RVc ye vādaḥ śaryaṇāvati RVa ya ārjīkeṣu kṛtvasu ye madhye pastyānām RVc ye vā janeṣu pañcasu RVa te no vṛṣṭiṃ divas pari pavantām ā suvīryam RVc suvānā devāsa indavaḥ RVa pavate haryato harir gṛṇāno jamadagninā RVc hinvāno gor adhi tvaci RVa pra śukrāso vayojuvo hinvānāso na saptayaḥ RVc śrīṇānā apsu mṛñjata RVa taṃ tvā suteṣv ābhuvo hinvire devatātaye RVc sa pavasvānayā rucā RVa ā te dakṣam mayobhuvaṃ vahnim adyā vṛṇīmahe RVc pāntam ā puruspṛham RVa ā mandram ā vareṇyam ā vipram ā manīṣiṇam RVc pāntam ā puruspṛham RVa ā rayim ā sucetunam ā sukrato tanūṣv ā RVc pāntam ā puruspṛham RVa pavasva viśvacarṣaṇe bhi viśvāni kāvyā RVc sakhā sakhibhya īḍyaḥ RVa tābhyāṃ viśvasya rājasi ye pavamāna dhāmanī RVc pratīcī soma tasthatuḥ RVa pari dhāmāni yāni te tvaṃ somāsi viśvataḥ RVc pavamāna ṛtubhiḥ kave RVa pavasva janayann iṣo bhi viśvāni vāryā RVc sakhā sakhibhya ūtaye RVa tava śukrāso arcayo divas pṛṣṭhe vi tanvate RVc pavitraṃ soma dhāmabhiḥ RVa taveme sapta sindhavaḥ praśiṣaṃ soma sisrate RVc tubhyaṃ dhāvanti dhenavaḥ RVa pra soma yāhi dhārayā suta indrāya matsaraḥ RVc dadhāno akṣiti śravaḥ RVa sam u tvā dhībhir asvaran hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ RVc vipram ājā vivasvataḥ RVa mṛjanti tvā sam agruvo vye jīrāv adhi ṣvaṇi RVc rebho yad ajyase vane RVa pavamānasya te kave vājin sargā asṛkṣata RVc arvanto na śravasyavaḥ RVa acchā kośam madhuścutam asṛgraṃ vāre avyaye RVc avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ RVa acchā samudram indavo staṃ gāvo na dhenavaḥ RVc agmann ṛtasya yonim ā RVa pra ṇa indo mahe raṇa āpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ RVc yad gobhir vāsayiṣyase RVa asya te sakhye vayam iyakṣantas tvotayaḥ RVc indo sakhitvam uśmasi RVa ā pavasva gaviṣṭaye mahe soma nṛcakṣase RVc endrasya jaṭhare viśa RVa mahāṃ asi soma jyeṣṭha ugrāṇām inda ojiṣṭhaḥ RVc yudhvā sañ chaśvaj jigetha RVa ya ugrebhyaś cid ojīyāñ chūrebhyaś cic chūrataraḥ RVc bhūridābhyaś cin maṃhīyān RVa tvaṃ soma sūra eṣas tokasya sātā tanūnām RVc vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya vṛṇīmahe yujyāya RVa agna āyūṃṣi pavasa ā suvorjam iṣaṃ ca naḥ RVc āre bādhasva ducchunām RVa agnir ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ RVc tam īmahe mahāgayam RVa agne pavasva svapā asme varcaḥ suvīryam RVc dadhad rayim mayi poṣam RVa pavamāno ati sridho bhy arṣati suṣṭutim RVc sūro na viśvadarśataḥ RVa sa marmṛjāna āyubhiḥ prayasvān prayase hitaḥ RVc indur atyo vicakṣaṇaḥ RVa pavamāna ṛtam bṛhac chukraṃ jyotir ajījanat RVc kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi jaṅghanat RVa pavamānasya jaṅghnato hareś candrā asṛkṣata RVc jīrā ajiraśociṣaḥ RVa pavamāno rathītamaḥ śubhrebhiḥ śubhraśastamaḥ RVc hariścandro marudgaṇaḥ RVa pavamāno vy aśnavad raśmibhir vājasātamaḥ RVc dadhat stotre suvīryam RVa pra suvāna indur akṣāḥ pavitram aty avyayam RVc punāna indur indram ā RVa eṣa somo adhi tvaci gavāṃ krīḷaty adribhiḥ RVc indram madāya johuvat RVa yasya te dyumnavat payaḥ pavamānābhṛtaṃ divaḥ RVc tena no mṛḷa jīvase RVa tvaṃ somāsi dhārayur mandra ojiṣṭho adhvare RVc pavasva maṃhayadrayiḥ RVa tvaṃ suto nṛmādano dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ RVc indrāya sūrir andhasā RVa tvaṃ suṣvāṇo adribhir abhy arṣa kanikradat RVc dyumantaṃ śuṣmam uttamam RVa indur hinvāno arṣati tiro vārāṇy avyayā RVc harir vājam acikradat RVa indo vy avyam arṣasi vi śravāṃsi vi saubhagā RVc vi vājān soma gomataḥ RVa ā na indo śatagvinaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam RVc bharā soma sahasriṇam RVa pavamānāsa indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ RVc indraṃ yāmebhir āśata RVa kakuhaḥ somyo rasa indur indrāya pūrvyaḥ RVc āyuḥ pavata āyave RVa hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ pavamānam madhuścutam RVc abhi girā sam asvaran RVa avitā no ajāśvaḥ pūṣā yāmaniyāmani RVc ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ RVa ayaṃ somaḥ kapardine ghṛtaṃ na pavate madhu RVc ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ RVa ayaṃ ta āghṛṇe suto ghṛtaṃ na pavate śuci RVc ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ RVa vāco jantuḥ kavīnām pavasva soma dhārayā RVc deveṣu ratnadhā asi RVa ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati śyeno varma vi gāhate RVc abhi droṇā kanikradat RVa pari pra soma te raso sarji kalaśe sutaḥ RVc śyeno na takto arṣati RVa pavasva soma mandayann indrāya madhumattamaḥ RVa asṛgran devavītaye vājayanto rathā iva RVa te sutāso madintamāḥ śukrā vāyum asṛkṣata RVa grāvṇā tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitraṃ soma gacchasi RVc dadhat stotre suvīryam RVa eṣa tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram ati gāhate RVc rakṣohā vāram avyayam RVa yad anti yac ca dūrake bhayaṃ vindati mām iha RVc pavamāna vi taj jahi RVa pavamānaḥ so adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ RVc yaḥ potā sa punātu naḥ RVa yat te pavitram arciṣy agne vitatam antar ā RVc brahma tena punīhi naḥ RVa yat te pavitram arcivad agne tena punīhi naḥ RVc brahmasavaiḥ punīhi naḥ RVa ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca RVc mām punīhi viśvataḥ RVa tribhiṣ ṭvaṃ deva savitar varṣiṣṭhaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ RVc agne dakṣaiḥ punīhi naḥ RVa punantu māṃ devajanāḥ punantu vasavo dhiyā RVc viśve devāḥ punīta mā jātavedaḥ punīhi mā RVa pra pyāyasva pra syandasva soma viśvebhir aṃśubhiḥ RVc devebhya uttamaṃ haviḥ RVa upa priyam panipnataṃ yuvānam āhutīvṛdham RVc aganma bibhrato namaḥ RVa alāyyasya paraśur nanāśa tam ā pavasva deva soma RVc ākhuṃ cid eva deva soma RVa yaḥ pāvamānīr adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam RVc sarvaṃ sa pūtam aśnāti svaditam mātariśvanā RVa pāvamānīr yo adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam RVc tasmai sarasvatī duhe kṣīraṃ sarpir madhūdakam RVa pra devam acchā madhumanta indavo siṣyadanta gāva ā na dhenavaḥ RVc barhiṣado vacanāvanta ūdhabhiḥ parisrutam usriyā nirṇijaṃ dhire RVa sa roruvad abhi pūrvā acikradad upāruhaḥ śrathayan svādate hariḥ RVc tiraḥ pavitram pariyann uru jrayo ni śaryāṇi dadhate deva ā varam RVa vi yo mame yamyā saṃyatī madaḥ sākaṃvṛdhā payasā pinvad akṣitā RVc mahī apāre rajasī vivevidad abhivrajann akṣitam pāja ā dade RVa sa mātarā vicaran vājayann apaḥ pra medhiraḥ svadhayā pinvate padam RVc aṃśur yavena pipiśe yato nṛbhiḥ saṃ jāmibhir nasate rakṣate śiraḥ RVa saṃ dakṣeṇa manasā jāyate kavir ṛtasya garbho nihito yamā aṃśum pariyantam ṛgmiyam RVa tvām mṛjanti daśa yoṣaṇaḥ sutaṃ soma ṛṣibhir matibhir dhītibhir hitam RVc avyo vārebhir uta devahūtibhir nṛbhir yato vājam ā darṣi sātaye RVa pariprayantaṃ vayyaṃ mṛjyate adribhiḥ sutaḥ punāna indur varivo vidat priyam RVa evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāno vayo dadhac citratamam pavasva RVc adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayim asme suvīram RVa iṣur na dhanvan prati dhīyate matir vatso na mātur upa sarjy ūdhani RVc urudhāreva duhe agra āyaty asya vrateṣv api soma iṣyate RVa upo matiḥ pṛcyate sicyate madhu mandrājanī codate antar āsani RVc pavamānaḥ saṃtaniḥ praghnatām iva madhumān drapsaḥ pari vāram arṣati RVa avye vadhūyuḥ pavate pari tvaci śrathnīte naptīr aditer ṛtaṃ yate RVc harir akrān yajataḥ saṃyato mado nṛmṇā śiśāno mahiṣo na śobhate RVa ukṣā mimāti prati yanti dhenavo devasya devīr upa yanti niṣkṛtam RVc aty akramīd arjunaṃ vāram avyayam atkaṃ na niktam pari somo avyata RVa amṛktena ruśatā vāsasā harir amartyo nirṇijānaḥ pari vyata RVc divas pṛṣṭham barhaṇā nirṇije kṛtopastaraṇaṃ camvor nabhasmayam RVa sūryasyeva raśmayo drāvayitnavo matsarāsaḥ prasupaḥ sākam īrate RVc tantuṃ tatam pari sargāsa āśavo nendrād ṛte pavate dhāma kiṃ cana RVa sindhor iva pravaṇe nimna āśavo vṛṣacyutā madāso gātum āśata RVc śaṃ no niveśe dvipade catuṣpade sme vājāḥ soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ RVa ā naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad aśvāvad gomad yavamat suvīryam RVc yūyaṃ hi soma pitaro mama sthana divo mūrdhānaḥ prasthitā vayaskṛtaḥ RVa ete somāḥ pavamānāsa indraṃ rathā iva pra yayuḥ sātim accha RVc sutāḥ pavitram ati yanty avyaṃ hitvī vavriṃ harito vṛṣṭim accha RVa indav indrāya bṛhate pavasva sumṛḷīko anavadyo riśādāḥ RVc bharā candrāṇi gṛṇate vasūni devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ RVa trir asmai sapta dhenavo duduhre satyām āśiram pūrvye vyomani RVc catvāry anyā bhuvanāni nirṇije cārūṇi cakre yad ṛtair avardhata RVa sa bhikṣamāṇo amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe dyāvā kāvyenā vi śaśrathe RVc tejiṣṭhā apo maṃhanā pari vyata yadī devasya śravasā sado viduḥ RVa te asya santu ketavo mṛtyavo dābhyāso januṣī ubhe anu RVc yebhir nṛmṇā ca devyā ca punata ād id rājānam mananā agṛbhṇata RVa sa mṛjyamāno daśabhiḥ sukarmabhiḥ pra madhyamāsu mātṛṣu prame sacā RVc vratāni pāno amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe nṛcakṣā anu paśyate viśau RVa sa marmṛjāna indriyāya dhāyasa obhe antā rodasī harṣate hitaḥ RVc vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa bādhate vi durmatīr ādediśānaḥ śaryaheva śurudhaḥ RVa sa mātarā na dadṛśāna usriyo nānadad eti marutām iva svanaḥ RVc jānann ṛtam prathamaṃ yat svarṇaram praśastaye kam avṛṇīta sukratuḥ RVa ruvati bhīmo vṛṣabhas taviṣyayā śṛṅge śiśāno hariṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ RVc ā yoniṃ somaḥ sukṛtaṃ ni ṣīdati gavyayī tvag bhavati nirṇig avyayī RVa śuciḥ punānas tanvam arepasam avye harir ny adhāviṣṭa sānavi RVc juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave tridhātu madhu kriyate sukarmabhiḥ RVa pavasva soma devavītaye vṛṣendrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa RVc purā no bādhād duritāti pāraya kṣetravid dhi diśa āhā vipṛcchate RVa hito na saptir abhi vājam arṣendrasyendo jaṭharam ā pavasva RVc nāvā na sindhum ati parṣi vidvāñ chūro na yudhyann ava no nida spaḥ RVa ā dakṣiṇā sṛjyate śuṣmy āsadaṃ veti druho rakṣasaḥ pāti jāgṛviḥ RVc harir opaśaṃ kṛṇute nabhas paya upastire camvor brahma nirṇije RVa pra kṛṣṭiheva śūṣa eti roruvad asuryaṃ varṇaṃ ni riṇīte asya tam RVc jahāti vavrim pitur eti niṣkṛtam upaprutaṃ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ tanā RVa adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavate gabhastyor vṛṣāyate nabhasā vepate matī RVc sa modate nasate sādhate girā nenikte apsu yajate parīmaṇi RVa pari dyukṣaṃ sahasaḥ parvatāvṛdham madhvaḥ siñcanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim RVc ā yasmin gāvaḥ suhutāda ūdhani mūrdhañ chrīṇanty agriyaṃ varīmabhiḥ RVa sam ī rathaṃ na bhurijor aheṣata daśa svasāro aditer upastha ā RVc jigād upa jrayati gor apīcyam padaṃ yad asya matuthā ajījanan RVa śyeno na yoniṃ sadanaṃ dhiyā kṛtaṃ hiraṇyayam āsadaṃ deva eṣati RVc e riṇanti barhiṣi priyaṃ girāśvo na devāṃ apy eti yajñiyaḥ RVa parā vyakto aruṣo divaḥ kavir vṛṣā tripṛṣṭho anaviṣṭa gā abhi RVc sahasraṇītir yatiḥ parāyatī rebho na pūrvīr uṣaso vi rājati RVa tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute varṇo asya sa yatrāśayat samṛtā sedhati sridhaḥ RVc apsā yāti svadhayā daivyaṃ janaṃ saṃ suṣṭutī nasate saṃ goagrayā RVa ukṣeva yūthā pariyann arāvīd adhi tviṣīr adhita sūryasya RVc divyaḥ suparṇo va cakṣata kṣāṃ somaḥ pari kratunā paśyate jāḥ RVa harim mṛjanty aruṣo na yujyate saṃ dhenubhiḥ kalaśe somo ajyate RVc ud vācam īrayati hinvate matī puruṣṭutasya kati cit paripriyaḥ RVa sākaṃ vadanti bahavo manīṣiṇa indrasya somaṃ jaṭhare yad āduhuḥ RVc yadī mṛjanti sugabhastayo naraḥ sanīḷābhir daśabhiḥ kāmyam madhu RVa aramamāṇo aty eti gā abhi sūryasya priyaṃ duhitus tiro ravam RVc anv asmai joṣam abharad vinaṅgṛsaḥ saṃ dvayībhiḥ svasṛbhiḥ kṣeti jāmibhiḥ RVa nṛdhūto adriṣuto barhiṣi priyaḥ patir gavām pradiva indur ṛtviyaḥ RVc purandhivān manuṣo yajñasādhanaḥ śucir dhiyā pavate soma indra te RVa nṛbāhubhyāṃ codito dhārayā suto nuṣvadham pavate soma indra te RVc āprāḥ kratūn sam ajair adhvare matīr ver na druṣac camvor āsadad dhariḥ RVa aṃśuṃ duhanti stanayantam akṣitaṃ kaviṃ kavayo paso manīṣiṇaḥ RVc sam ī gāvo matayo yanti saṃyata ṛtasya yonā sadane punarbhuvaḥ RVa nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divo pām ūrmau sindhuṣv antar ukṣitaḥ RVc indrasya vajro vṛṣabho vibhūvasuḥ somo hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ RVa sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ raja stotre śikṣann ādhūnvate ca sukrato RVc mā no nir bhāg vasunaḥ sādanaspṛśo rayim piśaṅgam bahulaṃ vasīmahi RVa ā tū na indo śatadātv aśvyaṃ sahasradātu paśumad dhiraṇyavat RVc upa māsva bṛhatī revatīr iṣo dhi stotrasya pavamāna no gahi RVa srakve drapsasya dhamataḥ sam asvarann ṛtasya yonā sam aranta nābhayaḥ RVc trīn sa mūrdhno asuraś cakra ārabhe satyasya nāvaḥ sukṛtam apīparan RVa samyak samyañco mahiṣā aheṣata sindhor ūrmāv adhi venā avīvipan RVc madhor dhārābhir janayanto arkam it priyām indrasya tanvam avīvṛdhan RVa pavitravantaḥ pari vācam āsate pitaiṣām pratno abhi rakṣati vratam RVc mahaḥ samudraṃ varuṇas tiro dadhe dhīrā ic chekur dharuṇeṣv ārabham RVa sahasradhāre va te sam asvaran divo nāke madhujihvā asaścataḥ RVc asya spaśo na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ padepade pāśinaḥ santi setavaḥ RVa pitur mātur adhy ā ye samasvarann ṛcā śocantaḥ saṃdahanto avratān RVc indradviṣṭām apa dhamanti māyayā tvacam asiknīm bhūmano divas pari RVa pratnān mānād adhy ā ye samasvarañ chlokayantrāso rabhasasya mantavaḥ RVc apānakṣāso badhirā ahāsata ṛtasya panthāṃ na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ RVa sahasradhāre vitate pavitra ā vācam punanti kavayo manīṣiṇaḥ RVc rudrāsa eṣām iṣirāso adruha spaśaḥ svañcaḥ sudṛśo nṛcakṣasaḥ RVa ṛtasya gopā na dabhāya sukratus trī ṣa pavitrā hṛdy antar ā dadhe RVc vidvān sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paśyaty avājuṣṭān vidhyati karte avratān RVa ṛtasya tantur vitataḥ pavitra ā jihvāyā agre varuṇasya māyayā RVc dhīrāś cit tat saminakṣanta āśatātrā kartam ava padāty aprabhuḥ RVa śiśur na jāto va cakradad vane svar yad vājy aruṣaḥ siṣāsati RVc divo retasā sacate payovṛdhā tam īmahe sumatī śarma saprathaḥ RVa divo ya skambho dharuṇaḥ svātata āpūrṇo aṃśuḥ paryeti viśvataḥ RVc seme mahī rodasī yakṣad āvṛtā samīcīne dādhāra sam iṣaḥ kaviḥ RVa mahi psaraḥ sukṛtaṃ somyam madhūrvī gavyūtir aditer ṛtaṃ yate RVc īśe yo vṛṣṭer ita usriyo vṛṣāpāṃ netā ya itaūtir ṛgmiyaḥ RVa ātmanvan nabho duhyate ghṛtam paya ṛtasya nābhir amṛtaṃ vi jāyate RVc samīcīnāḥ sudānavaḥ prīṇanti taṃ naro hitam ava mehanti peravaḥ RVa arāvīd aṃśuḥ sacamāna ūrmiṇā devāvyam manuṣe pinvati tvacam RVc dadhāti garbham aditer upastha ā yena tokaṃ ca tanayaṃ ca dhāmahe RVa sahasradhāre va tā asaścatas tṛtīye santu rajasi prajāvatīḥ RVc catasro nābho nihitā avo divo havir bharanty amṛtaṃ ghṛtaścutaḥ RVa śvetaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute yat siṣāsati somo mīḍhvāṃ asuro veda bhūmanaḥ RVc dhiyā śamī sacate sem abhi pravad divas kavandham ava darṣad udriṇam RVa adha śvetaṃ kalaśaṃ gobhir aktaṃ kārṣmann ā vājy akramīt sasavān RVc ā hinvire manasā devayantaḥ kakṣīvate śatahimāya gonām RVa adbhiḥ soma papṛcānasya te raso vyo vāraṃ vi pavamāna dhāvati RVc sa mṛjyamānaḥ kavibhir madintama svadasvendrāya pavamāna pītaye RVa abhi priyāṇi pavate canohito nāmāni yahvo adhi yeṣu vardhate RVc ā sūryasya bṛhato bṛhann adhi rathaṃ viṣvañcam aruhad vicakṣaṇaḥ RVa ṛtasya jihvā pavate madhu priyaṃ vaktā patir dhiyo asyā adābhyaḥ RVc dadhāti putraḥ pitror apīcyaṃ nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ RVa ava dyutānaḥ kalaśāṃ acikradan nṛbhir yemānaḥ kośa ā hiraṇyaye RVc abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣatādhi tripṛṣṭha uṣaso vi rājati RVa adribhiḥ suto matibhiś canohitaḥ prarocayan rodasī mātarā śuciḥ RVc romāṇy avyā samayā vi dhāvati madhor dhārā pinvamānā divedive RVa pari soma pra dhanvā svastaye nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vāsayāśiram RVc ye te madā āhanaso vihāyasas tebhir indraṃ codaya dātave magham RVa dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso dakṣo devānām anumādyo nṛbhiḥ RVc hariḥ sṛjāno atyo na satvabhir vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣv ā RVa śūro na dhatta āyudhā gabhastyoḥ svaḥ siṣāsan rathiro gaviṣṭiṣu RVc indrasya śuṣmam īrayann apasyubhir indur hinvāno ajyate manīṣibhiḥ RVa indrasya soma pavamāna ūrmiṇā taviṣyamāṇo jaṭhareṣv ā viśa RVc pra ṇaḥ pinva vidyud abhreva rodasī dhiyā na vājāṃ upa māsi śaśvataḥ RVa viśvasya rājā pavate svardṛśa ṛtasya dhītim ṛṣiṣāḷ avīvaśat RVc yaḥ sūryasyāsireṇa mṛjyate pitā matīnām asamaṣṭakāvyaḥ RVa vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośam arṣasy apām upasthe vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat RVc sa indrāya pavase matsarintamo yathā jeṣāma samithe tvotayaḥ RVa eṣa pra kośe madhumāṃ acikradad indrasya vajro vapuṣo vapuṣṭaraḥ RVc abhīm ṛtasya sudughā ghṛtaścuto vāśrā arṣanti payaseva dhenavaḥ RVa sa pūrvyaḥ pavate yaṃ divas pari śyeno mathāyad iṣitas tiro rajaḥ RVc sa madhva ā yuvate vevijāna it kṛśānor astur manasāha bibhyuṣā RVa te naḥ pūrvāsa uparāsa indavo mahe vājāya dhanvantu gomate RVc īkṣeṇyāso ahyo na cāravo brahmabrahma ye jujuṣur havirhaviḥ RVa ayaṃ no vidvān vanavad vanuṣyata induḥ satrācā manasā puruṣṭutaḥ RVc inasya yaḥ sadane garbham ādadhe gavām urubjam abhy arṣati vrajam RVa cakrir divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso mahāṃ adabdho varuṇo hurug yate RVc asāvi mitro vṛjaneṣu yajñiyo tyo na yūthe vṛṣayuḥ kanikradat RVa pra rājā vācaṃ janayann asiṣyadad apo vasāno abhi gā iyakṣati RVc gṛbhṇāti ripram avir asya tānvā śuddho devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam RVa indrāya soma pari ṣicyase nṛbhir nṛcakṣā ūrmiḥ kavir ajyase vane RVc pūrvīr hi te srutayaḥ santi yātave sahasram aśvā harayaś camūṣadaḥ RVa samudriyā apsaraso manīṣiṇam āsīnā antar abhi somam akṣaran RVc tā īṃ hinvanti harmyasya sakṣaṇiṃ yācante sumnam pavamānam akṣitam RVa gojin naḥ somo rathajid dhiraṇyajit svarjid abjit pavate sahasrajit RVc yaṃ devāsaś cakrire pītaye madaṃ svādiṣṭhaṃ drapsam aruṇam mayobhuvam RVa etāni soma pavamāno asmayuḥ satyāni kṛṇvan draviṇāny arṣasi RVc jahi śatrum antike dūrake ca ya urvīṃ gavyūtim abhayaṃ ca nas kṛdhi RVa acodaso no dhanvantv indavaḥ pra suvānāso bṛhaddiveṣu harayaḥ RVc vi ca naśan na iṣo arātayo ryo naśanta saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ RVa pra ṇo dhanvantv indavo madacyuto dhanā vā yebhir arvato junīmasi RVc tiro martasya kasya cit parihvṛtiṃ vayaṃ dhanāni viśvadhā bharemahi RVa uta svasyā arātyā arir hi ṣa utānyasyā arātyā vṛko hi ṣaḥ RVc dhanvan na tṛṣṇā sam arīta tāṃ abhi soma jahi pavamāna durādhyaḥ RVa divi te nābhā paramo ya ādade pṛthivyās te ruruhuḥ sānavi kṣipaḥ RVc adrayas tvā bapsati gor adhi tvacy apsu tvā hastair duduhur manīṣiṇaḥ RVa evā ta indo subhvaṃ supeśasaṃ rasaṃ tuñjanti prathamā abhiśriyaḥ RVc nidaṃnidam pavamāna ni tāriṣa āvis te śuṣmo bhavatu priyo madaḥ RVa somasya dhārā pavate nṛcakṣasa ṛtena devān havate divas pari RVc bṛhaspate ravathenā vi didyute samudrāso na savanāni vivyacuḥ RVa yaṃ tvā vājinn aghnyā abhy anūṣatāyohataṃ yonim ā rohasi dyumān RVc maghonām āyuḥ pratiran mahi śrava indrāya soma pavase vṛṣā madaḥ RVa endrasya kukṣā pavate madintama ūrjaṃ vasānaḥ śravase sumaṅgalaḥ RVc pratyaṅ sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paprathe krīḷan harir atyaḥ syandate vṛṣā RVa taṃ tvā devebhyo madhumattamaṃ naraḥ sahasradhāraṃ duhate daśa kṣipaḥ RVc nṛbhiḥ soma pracyuto grāvabhiḥ suto viśvān devāṃ ā pavasvā sahasrajit RVa taṃ tvā hastino madhumantam adribhir duhanty apsu vṛṣabhaṃ daśa kṣipaḥ RVc indraṃ soma mādayan daivyaṃ janaṃ sindhor ivormiḥ pavamāno arṣasi RVa pra somasya pavamānasyormaya indrasya yanti jaṭharaṃ supeśasaḥ RVc dadhnā yad īm unnītā yaśasā gavāṃ dānāya śūram udamandiṣuḥ sutāḥ RVa acchā hi somaḥ kalaśāṃ asiṣyadad atyo na voḷhā raghuvartanir vṛṣā RVc athā devānām ubhayasya janmano vidvāṃ aśnoty amuta itaś ca yat RVa ā naḥ soma pavamānaḥ kirā vasv indo bhava maghavā rādhaso mahaḥ RVc śikṣā vayodho vasave su cetunā mā no gayam āre asmat parā sicaḥ RVa ā naḥ pūṣā pavamānaḥ surātayo mitro gacchantu varuṇaḥ sajoṣasaḥ RVc bṛhaspatir maruto vāyur aśvinā tvaṣṭā savitā suyamā sarasvatī RVa ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminve aryamā devo aditir vidhātā RVc bhago nṛśaṃsa urv antarikṣaṃ viśve devāḥ pavamānaṃ juṣanta RVa asāvi somo aruṣo vṛṣā harī rājeva dasmo abhi gā acikradat RVc punāno vāram pary ety avyayaṃ śyeno na yoniṃ ghṛtavantam āsadam RVa kavir vedhasyā pary eṣi māhinam atyo na mṛṣṭo abhi vājam arṣasi RVc apasedhan duritā soma mṛḷaya ghṛtaṃ vasānaḥ pari yāsi nirṇijam RVa parjanyaḥ pitā mahiṣasya parṇino nābhā pṛthivyā giriṣu kṣayaṃ dadhe RVc svasāra āpo abhi gā utāsaran saṃ grāvabhir nasate vīte adhvare RVa jāyeva patyāv adhi śeva maṃhase pajrāyā garbha śṛṇuhi bravīmi te RVc antar vāṇīṣu pra carā su jīvase nindyo vṛjane soma jāgṛhi RVa yathā pūrvebhyaḥ śatasā amṛdhraḥ sahasrasāḥ paryayā vājam indo RVc evā pavasva suvitāya navyase tava vratam anv āpaḥ sacante RVa pavitraṃ te vitatam brahmaṇas pate prabhur gātrāṇi pary eṣi viśvataḥ RVc ataptatanūr na tad āmo aśnute śṛtāsa id vahantas tat sam āśata RVa tapoṣ pavitraṃ vitataṃ divas pade śocanto asya tantavo vy asthiran RVc avanty asya pavītāram āśavo divas pṛṣṭham adhi tiṣṭhanti cetasā RVa arūrucad uṣasaḥ pṛśnir agriya ukṣā bibharti bhuvanāni vājayuḥ RVc māyāvino mamire asya māyayā nṛcakṣasaḥ pitaro garbham ā dadhuḥ RVa gandharva itthā padam asya rakṣati pāti devānāṃ janimāny adbhutaḥ RVc gṛbhṇāti ripuṃ nidhayā nidhāpatiḥ sukṛttamā madhuno bhakṣam āśata RVa havir haviṣmo mahi sadma daivyaṃ nabho vasānaḥ pari yāsy adhvaram RVc rājā pavitraratho vājam āruhaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭir jayasi śravo bṛhat RVa pavasva devamādano vicarṣaṇir apsā indrāya varuṇāya vāyave RVc kṛdhī no adya varivaḥ svastimad urukṣitau gṛṇīhi daivyaṃ janam RVa ā yas tasthau bhuvanāny amartyo viśvāni somaḥ pari tāny arṣati RVc kṛṇvan saṃcṛtaṃ vicṛtam abhiṣṭaya induḥ siṣakty uṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ RVa ā yo gobhiḥ sṛjyata oṣadhīṣv ā devānāṃ sumna iṣayann upāvasuḥ RVc ā vidyutā pavate dhārayā suta indraṃ somo mādayan daivyaṃ janam RVa eṣa sya somaḥ pavate sahasrajid dhinvāno vācam iṣirām uṣarbudham RVc induḥ samudram ud iyarti vāyubhir endrasya hārdi kalaśeṣu sīdati RVa abhi tyaṃ gāvaḥ payasā payovṛdhaṃ somaṃ śrīṇanti matibhiḥ svarvidam RVc dhanañjayaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso vipraḥ kaviḥ kāvyenā svarcanāḥ RVa indrāya soma suṣutaḥ pari sravāpāmīvā bhavatu rakṣasā saha RVc mā te rasasya matsata dvayāvino draviṇasvanta iha santv indavaḥ RVa asmān samarye pavamāna codaya dakṣo devānām asi hi priyo madaḥ RVc jahi śatrūṃr abhy ā bhandanāyataḥ pibendra somam ava no mṛdho jahi RVa adabdha indo pavase madintama ātmendrasya bhavasi dhāsir uttamaḥ RVc abhi svaranti bahavo manīṣiṇo rājānam asya bhuvanasya niṃsate RVa sahasraṇīthaḥ śatadhāro adbhuta indrāyenduḥ pavate kāmyam madhu RVc jayan kṣetram abhy arṣā jayann apa uruṃ no gātuṃ kṛṇu soma mīḍhvaḥ RVa kanikradat kalaśe gobhir ajyase vy avyayaṃ samayā vāram arṣasi RVc marmṛjyamāno atyo na sānasir indrasya soma jaṭhare sam akṣaraḥ RVa svāduḥ pavasva divyāya janmane svādur indrāya suhavītunāmne RVc svādur mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave bṛhaspataye madhumāṃ adābhyaḥ RVa atyam mṛjanti kalaśe daśa kṣipaḥ pra viprāṇām matayo vāca īrate RVc pavamānā abhy arṣanti suṣṭutim endraṃ viśanti madirāsa indavaḥ RVa pavamāno abhy arṣā suvīryam urvīṃ gavyūtim mahi śarma saprathaḥ RVc mākir no asya pariṣūtir īśatendo jayema tvayā dhanaṃdhanam RVa adhi dyām asthād vṛṣabho vicakṣaṇo rūrucad vi divo rocanā kaviḥ RVc rājā pavitram aty eti roruvad divaḥ pīyūṣaṃ duhate nṛcakṣasaḥ RVa divo nāke madhujihvā asaścato venā duhanty ukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām RVc apsu drapsaṃ vāvṛdhānaṃ samudra ā sindhor ūrmā madhumantam pavitra ā RVa nāke suparṇam upapaptivāṃsaṃ giro venānām akṛpanta pūrvīḥ RVc śiśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ hiraṇyayaṃ śakunaṃ kṣāmaṇi sthām RVa ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthād viśvā rūpā praticakṣāṇo asya RVc bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā vy adyaut prārūrucad rodasī mātarā śuciḥ RVa pra ta āśavaḥ pavamāna dhījavo madā arṣanti raghujā iva tmanā RVc divyāḥ suparṇā madhumanta indavo madintamāsaḥ pari kośam āsate RVa pra te madāso madirāsa āśavo sṛkṣata rathyāso yathā pṛthak RVc dhenur na vatsam payasābhi vajriṇam indram indavo madhumanta ūrmayaḥ RVa atyo na hiyāno abhi vājam arṣa svarvit kośaṃ divo adrimātaram RVc vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avyaye somaḥ punāna indriyāya dhāyase RVa pra ta āśvinīḥ pavamāna dhījuvo divyā asṛgran payasā dharīmaṇi RVc prāntar ṛṣaya sthāvirīr asṛkṣata ye tvā mṛjanty ṛṣiṣāṇa vedhasaḥ RVa viśvā dhāmāni viśvacakṣa ṛbhvasaḥ prabhos te sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ RVc vyānaśiḥ pavase soma dharmabhiḥ patir viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi RVa ubhayataḥ pavamānasya raśmayo dhruvasya sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ RVc yadī pavitre adhi mṛjyate hariḥ sattā ni yonā kalaśeṣu sīdati RVa yajñasya ketuḥ pavate svadhvaraḥ somo devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam RVc sahasradhāraḥ pari kośam arṣati vṛṣā pavitram aty eti roruvat RVa rājā samudraṃ nadyo vi gāhate pām ūrmiṃ sacate sindhuṣu śritaḥ RVc adhy asthāt sānu pavamāno avyayaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divaḥ RVa divo na sānu stanayann acikradad dyauś ca yasya pṛthivī ca dharmabhiḥ RVc indrasya sakhyam pavate vivevidat somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati RVa jyotir yajñasya pavate madhu priyam pitā devānāṃ janitā vibhūvasuḥ RVc dadhāti ratnaṃ svadhayor apīcyam madintamo matsara indriyo rasaḥ RVa abhikrandan kalaśaṃ vājy arṣati patir divaḥ śatadhāro vicakṣaṇaḥ RVc harir mitrasya sadaneṣu sīdati marmṛjāno vibhiḥ sindhubhir vṛṣā RVa agre sindhūnām pavamāno arṣaty agre vāco agriyo goṣu gacchati RVc agre vājasya bhajate mahādhanaṃ svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyate vṛṣā RVa ayam matavāñ chakuno yathā hito vye sasāra pavamāna ūrmiṇā RVc tava kratvā rodasī antarā kave śucir dhiyā pavate soma indra te RVa drāpiṃ vasāno yajato divispṛśam antarikṣaprā bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ RVc svar jajñāno nabhasābhy akramīt pratnam asya pitaram ā vivāsati RVa so asya viśe mahi śarma yacchati yo asya dhāma prathamaṃ vyānaśe RVc padaṃ yad asya parame vyomany ato viśvā abhi saṃ yāti saṃyataḥ RVa pro ayāsīd indur indrasya niṣkṛtaṃ sakhā sakhyur na pra mināti saṃgiram RVc marya iva yuvatibhiḥ sam arṣati somaḥ kalaśe śatayāmnā pathā RVa pra vo dhiyo mandrayuvo vipanyuvaḥ panasyuvaḥ saṃvasaneṣv akramuḥ RVc somam manīṣā abhy anūṣata stubho bhi dhenavaḥ payasem aśiśrayuḥ RVa ā naḥ soma saṃyatam pipyuṣīm iṣam indo pavasva pavamāno asridham RVc yā no dohate trir ahann asaścuṣī kṣumad vājavan madhumat suvīryam RVa vṛṣā matīnām pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ somo ahnaḥ pratarītoṣaso divaḥ RVc krāṇā sindhūnāṃ kalaśāṃ avīvaśad indrasya hārdy āviśan manīṣibhiḥ RVa manīṣibhiḥ pavate pūrvyaḥ kavir nṛbhir yataḥ pari kośāṃ acikradat RVc tritasya nāma janayan madhu kṣarad indrasya vāyoḥ sakhyāya kartave RVa ayam punāna uṣaso vi rocayad ayaṃ sindhubhyo abhavad u lokakṛt RVc ayaṃ triḥ sapta duduhāna āśiraṃ somo hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ RVa pavasva soma divyeṣu dhāmasu sṛjāna indo kalaśe pavitra ā RVc sīdann indrasya jaṭhare kanikradan nṛbhir yataḥ sūryam ārohayo divi RVa adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavase pavitra āṃ indav indrasya jaṭhareṣv āviśan RVc tvaṃ nṛcakṣā abhavo vicakṣaṇa soma gotram aṅgirobhyo vṛṇor apa RVa tvāṃ soma pavamānaṃ svādhyo nu viprāso amadann avasyavaḥ RVc tvāṃ suparṇa ābharad divas parīndo viśvābhir matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtam RVa avye punānam pari vāra ūrmiṇā hariṃ navante abhi sapta dhenavaḥ RVc apām upasthe adhy āyavaḥ kavim ṛtasya yonā mahiṣā aheṣata RVa induḥ punāno ati gāhate mṛdho viśvāni kṛṇvan supathāni yajyave RVc gāḥ kṛṇvāno nirṇijaṃ haryataḥ kavir atyo na krīḷan pari vāram arṣati RVa asaścataḥ śatadhārā abhiśriyo hariṃ navante va tā udanyuvaḥ RVc kṣipo mṛjanti pari gobhir āvṛtaṃ tṛtīye pṛṣṭhe adhi rocane divaḥ RVa tavemāḥ prajā divyasya retasas tvaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi RVc athedaṃ viśvam pavamāna te vaśe tvam indo prathamo dhāmadhā asi RVa tvaṃ samudro asi viśvavit kave tavemāḥ pañca pradiśo vidharmaṇi RVc tvaṃ dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe tava jyotīṃṣi pavamāna sūryaḥ RVa tvam pavitre rajaso vidharmaṇi devebhyaḥ soma pavamāna pūyase RVc tvām uśijaḥ prathamā agṛbhṇata tubhyemā viśvā bhuvanāni yemire RVa pra rebha ety ati vāram avyayaṃ vṛṣā vaneṣv ava cakradad dhariḥ RVc saṃ dhītayo vāvaśānā anūṣata śiśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam RVa sa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ pari vyata tantuṃ tanvānas trivṛtaṃ yathā vide RVc nayann ṛtasya praśiṣo navīyasīḥ patir janīnām upa yāti niṣkṛtam RVa rājā sindhūnām pavate patir diva ṛtasya yāti pathibhiḥ kanikradat RVc sahasradhāraḥ pari ṣicyate hariḥ punāno vācaṃ janayann upāvasuḥ RVa pavamāna mahy arṇo vi dhāvasi sūro na citro avyayāni pavyayā RVc gabhastipūto nṛbhir adribhiḥ suto mahe vājāya dhanyāya dhanvasi RVa iṣam ūrjam pavamānābhy arṣasi śyeno na vaṃsu kalaśeṣu sīdasi RVc indrāya madvā madyo madaḥ suto divo viṣṭambha upamo vicakṣaṇaḥ RVa sapta svasāro abhi mātaraḥ śiśuṃ navaṃ jajñānaṃ jenyaṃ vipaścitam RVc apāṃ gandharvaṃ divyaṃ nṛcakṣasaṃ somaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājase RVa īśāna imā bhuvanāni vīyase yujāna indo haritaḥ suparṇyaḥ RVc tās te kṣarantu madhumad ghṛtam payas tava vrate soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ RVa tvaṃ nṛcakṣā asi soma viśvataḥ pavamāna vṛṣabha tā vi dhāvasi RVc sa naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad vayaṃ syāma bhuvaneṣu jīvase RVa govit pavasva vasuvid dhiraṇyavid retodhā indo bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ RVc tvaṃ suvīro asi soma viśvavit taṃ tvā viprā upa girema āsate RVa un madhva ūrmir vananā atiṣṭhipad apo vasāno mahiṣo vi gāhate RVc rājā pavitraratho vājam āruhat sahasrabhṛṣṭir jayati śravo bṛhat RVa sa bhandanā ud iyarti prajāvatīr viśvāyur viśvāḥ subharā ahardivi RVc brahma prajāvad rayim aśvapastyam pīta indav indram asmabhyaṃ yācatāt RVa so agre ahnāṃ harir haryato madaḥ pra cetasā cetayate anu dyubhiḥ RVc dvā janā yātayann antar īyate narā ca śaṃsaṃ daivyaṃ ca dhartari RVa añjate vy añjate sam añjate kratuṃ rihanti madhunābhy añjate RVc sindhor ucchvāse patayantam ukṣaṇaṃ hiraṇyapāvāḥ paśum āsu gṛbhṇate RVa vipaścite pavamānāya gāyata mahī na dhārāty andho arṣati RVc ahir na jūrṇām ati sarpati tvacam atyo na krīḷann asarad vṛṣā hariḥ RVa agrego rājāpyas taviṣyate vimāno ahnām bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ RVc harir ghṛtasnuḥ sudṛśīko arṇavo jyotīrathaḥ pavate rāya okyaḥ RVa asarji skambho diva udyato madaḥ pari tridhātur bhuvanāny arṣati RVc aṃśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ girā yadi nirṇijam ṛgmiṇo yayuḥ RVa pra te dhārā aty aṇvāni meṣyaḥ punānasya saṃyato yanti raṃhayaḥ RVc yad gobhir indo camvoḥ samajyasa ā suvānaḥ soma kalaśeṣu sīdasi RVa pavasva soma kratuvin na ukthyo vyo vāre pari dhāva madhu priyam RVc jahi viśvān rakṣasa indo atriṇo bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ RVa pra tu drava pari kośaṃ ni ṣīda nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vājam arṣa RVc aśvaṃ na tvā vājinam marjayanto cchā barhī raśanābhir nayanti RVa svāyudhaḥ pavate deva indur aśastihā vṛjanaṃ rakṣamāṇaḥ RVc pitā devānāṃ janitā sudakṣo viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ RVa ṛṣir vipraḥ puraetā janānām ṛbhur dhīra uśanā kāvyena RVc sa cid viveda nihitaṃ yad āsām apīcyaṃ guhyaṃ nāma gonām RVa eṣa sya te madhumāṃ indra somo vṛṣā vṛṣṇe pari pavitre akṣāḥ RVc sahasrasāḥ śatasā bhūridāvā śaśvattamam barhir ā vājy asthāt RVa ete somā abhi gavyā sahasrā mahe vājāyāmṛtāya śravāṃsi RVc pavitrebhiḥ pavamānā asṛgrañ chravasyavo na pṛtanājo atyāḥ RVa pari hi ṣmā puruhūto janānāṃ viśvāsarad bhojanā pūyamānaḥ RVc athā bhara śyenabhṛta prayāṃsi rayiṃ tuñjāno abhi vājam arṣa RVa eṣa suvānaḥ pari somaḥ pavitre sargo na sṛṣṭo adadhāvad arvā RVc tigme śiśāno mahiṣo na śṛṅge gā gavyann abhi śūro na satvā RVa eṣā yayau paramād antar adreḥ kūcit satīr ūrve gā viveda RVc divo na vidyut stanayanty abhraiḥ somasya te pavata indra dhārā RVa uta sma rāśim pari yāsi gonām indreṇa soma saratham punānaḥ RVc pūrvīr iṣo bṛhatīr jīradāno śikṣā śacīvas tava tā upaṣṭut RVa ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunve tubhyam pavate tvam asya pāhi RVc tvaṃ ha yaṃ cakṛṣe tvaṃ vavṛṣa indum madāya yujyāya somam RVa sa īṃ ratho na bhuriṣāḷ ayoji mahaḥ purūṇi sātaye vasūni RVc ād īṃ viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā svarṣātā vana ūrdhvā navanta RVa vāyur na yo niyutvāṃ iṣṭayāmā nāsatyeva hava ā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ RVc viśvavāro draviṇodā iva tman pūṣeva dhījavano si soma RVa indro na yo mahā karmāṇi cakrir hantā vṛtrāṇām asi soma pūrbhit RVc paidvo na hi tvam ahināmnāṃ hantā viśvasyāsi soma dasyoḥ RVa agnir na yo vana ā sṛjyamāno vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣu RVc jano na yudhvā mahata upabdir iyarti somaḥ pavamāna ūrmim RVa ete somā ati vārāṇy avyā divyā na kośāso abhravarṣāḥ RVc vṛthā samudraṃ sindhavo na nīcīḥ sutāso abhi kalaśāṃ asṛgran RVa śuṣmī śardho na mārutam pavasvānabhiśastā divyā yathā viṭ RVc āpo na makṣū sumatir bhavā naḥ sahasrāpsāḥ pṛtanāṣāṇ na yajñaḥ RVa rājño nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhad gabhīraṃ tava soma dhāma RVc śuciṣ ṭvam asi priyo na mitro dakṣāyyo aryamevāsi soma RVa pro sya vahniḥ pathyābhir asyān divo na vṛṣṭiḥ pavamāno akṣāḥ RVc sahasradhāro asadan ny asme mātur upasthe vana ā ca somaḥ RVa rājā sindhūnām avasiṣṭa vāsa ṛtasya nāvam āruhad rajiṣṭhām RVc apsu drapso vāvṛdhe śyenajūto duha īm pitā duha īm pitur jām RVa siṃhaṃ nasanta madhvo ayāsaṃ harim aruṣaṃ divo asya patim RVc śūro yutsu prathamaḥ pṛcchate gā asya cakṣasā pari pāty ukṣā RVa madhupṛṣṭhaṃ ghoram ayāsam aśvaṃ rathe yuñjanty urucakra ṛṣvam RVc svasāra īṃ jāmayo marjayanti sanābhayo vājinam ūrjayanti RVa catasra īṃ ghṛtaduhaḥ sacante samāne antar dharuṇe niṣattāḥ RVc tā īm arṣanti namasā punānās tā īṃ viśvataḥ pari ṣanti pūrvīḥ RVa viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyā viśvā uta kṣitayo haste asya RVc asat ta utso gṛṇate niyutvān madhvo aṃśuḥ pavata indriyāya RVa vanvann avāto abhi devavītim indrāya soma vṛtrahā pavasva RVc śagdhi mahaḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma RVa pra hinvāno janitā rodasyo ratho na vājaṃ saniṣyann ayāsīt RVc indraṃ gacchann āyudhā saṃśiśāno viśvā vasu hastayor ādadhānaḥ RVa abhi tripṛṣṭhaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vayodhām āṅgūṣāṇām avāvaśanta vāṇīḥ RVc vanā vasāno varuṇo na sindhūn vi ratnadhā dayate vāryāṇi RVa śūragrāmaḥ sarvavīraḥ sahāvāñ jetā pavasva sanitā dhanāni RVc tigmāyudhaḥ kṣipradhanvā samatsv aṣāḷhaḥ sāhvān pṛtanāsu śatrūn RVa urugavyūtir abhayāni kṛṇvan samīcīne ā pavasvā purandhī RVc apaḥ siṣāsann uṣasaḥ svar gāḥ saṃ cikrado maho asmabhyaṃ vājān RVa matsi soma varuṇam matsi mitram matsīndram indo pavamāna viṣṇum RVc matsi śardho mārutam matsi devān matsi mahām indram indo madāya RVa evā rājeva kratumāṃ amena viśvā ghanighnad duritā pavasva RVc indo sūktāya vacase vayo dhā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ RVa asarji vakvā rathye yathājau dhiyā manotā prathamo manīṣī RVc daśa svasāro adhi sāno avye janti vahniṃ sadanāny accha RVa vītī janasya divyasya kavyair adhi suvāno nahuṣyebhir induḥ RVc pra yo nṛbhir amṛto martyebhir marmṛjāno vibhir gobhir adbhiḥ RVa vṛṣā vṛṣṇe roruvad aṃśur asmai pavamāno ruśad īrte payo goḥ RVc sahasram ṛkvā pathibhir vacovid adhvasmabhiḥ sūro aṇvaṃ vi yāti RVa rujā dṛḷhā cid rakṣasaḥ sadāṃsi punāna inda ūrṇuhi vi vājān RVc vṛścopariṣṭāt tujatā vadhena ye anti dūrād upanāyam eṣām RVa sa pratnavan navyase viśvavāra sūktāya pathaḥ kṛṇuhi prācaḥ RVc ye duḥṣahāso vanuṣā bṛhantas tāṃs te aśyāma purukṛt purukṣo RVa evā punāno apaḥ svar gā asmabhyaṃ tokā tanayāni bhūri RVc śaṃ naḥ kṣetram uru jyotīṃṣi soma jyoṅ naḥ sūryaṃ dṛśaye rirīhi RVa pari suvāno harir aṃśuḥ pavitre ratho na sarji sanaye hiyānaḥ RVc āpac chlokam indriyam pūyamānaḥ prati devāṃ ajuṣata prayobhiḥ RVa acchā nṛcakṣā asarat pavitre nāma dadhānaḥ kavir asya yonau RVc sīdan hoteva sadane camūṣūpem agmann ṛṣayaḥ sapta viprāḥ RVa pra sumedhā gātuvid viśvadevaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ sada eti nityam RVc bhuvad viśveṣu kāvyeṣu rantānu janān yatate pañca dhīraḥ RVa tava tye soma pavamāna niṇye viśve devās traya ekādaśāsaḥ RVc daśa svadhābhir adhi sāno avye mṛjanti tvā nadyaḥ sapta yahvīḥ RVa tan nu satyam pavamānasyāstu yatra viśve kāravaḥ saṃnasanta RVc jyotir yad ahne akṛṇod u lokam prāvan manuṃ dasyave kar abhīkam RVa pari sadmeva paśumānti hotā rājā na satyaḥ samitīr iyānaḥ RVc somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśāṃ ayāsīt sīdan mṛgo na mahiṣo vaneṣu RVa sākamukṣo marjayanta svasāro daśa dhīrasya dhītayo dhanutrīḥ RVc hariḥ pary adravaj jāḥ sūryasya droṇaṃ nanakṣe atyo na vājī RVa sam mātṛbhir na śiśur vāvaśāno vṛṣā dadhanve puruvāro adbhiḥ RVc maryo na yoṣām abhi niṣkṛtaṃ yan saṃ gacchate kalaśa usriyābhiḥ RVa uta pra pipya ūdhar aghnyāyā indur dhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ RVc mūrdhānaṃ gāvaḥ payasā camūṣv abhi śrīṇanti vasubhir na niktaiḥ RVa sa no devebhiḥ pavamāna radendo rayim aśvinaṃ vāvaśānaḥ RVc rathirāyatām uśatī purandhir asmadryag ā dāvane vasūnām RVa nū no rayim upa māsva nṛvantam punāno vātāpyaṃ viśvaścandram RVc pra vanditur indo tāry āyuḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt RVa adhi yad asmin vājinīva śubha spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye na viśaḥ RVc apo vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan vrajaṃ na paśuvardhanāya manma RVa dvitā vyūrṇvann amṛtasya dhāma svarvide bhuvanāni prathanta RVc dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāva ṛtāyantīr abhi vāvaśra indum RVa pari yat kaviḥ kāvyā bharate śūro na ratho bhuvanāni viśvā RVc deveṣu yaśo martāya bhūṣan dakṣāya rāyaḥ purubhūṣu navyaḥ RVa śriye jātaḥ śriya ā nir iyāya śriyaṃ vayo jaritṛbhyo dadhāti RVc śriyaṃ vasānā amṛtatvam āyan bhavanti satyā samithā mitadrau RVa iṣam ūrjam abhy arṣāśvaṃ gām uru jyotiḥ kṛṇuhi matsi devān RVc viśvāni hi suṣahā tāni tubhyam pavamāna bādhase soma śatrūn RVa kanikranti harir ā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdan vanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ RVc nṛbhir yataḥ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ gā ato matīr janayata svadhābhiḥ RVa hariḥ sṛjānaḥ pathyām ṛtasyeyarti vācam ariteva nāvam RVc devo devānāṃ guhyāni nāmāviṣ kṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce RVa apām ived ūrmayas tarturāṇāḥ pra manīṣā īrate somam accha RVc namasyantīr upa ca yanti saṃ cā ca viśanty uśatīr uśantam RVa tam marmṛjānam mahiṣaṃ na sānāv aṃśuṃ duhanty ukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām RVc taṃ vāvaśānam matayaḥ sacante trito bibharti varuṇaṃ samudre RVa iṣyan vācam upavakteva hotuḥ punāna indo vi ṣyā manīṣām RVc indraś ca yat kṣayathaḥ saubhagāya suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma RVa pra senānīḥ śūro agre rathānāṃ gavyann eti harṣate asya senā RVc bhadrān kṛṇvann indrahavān sakhibhya ā somo vastrā rabhasāni datte RVa sam asya hariṃ harayo mṛjanty aśvahayair aniśitaṃ namobhiḥ RVc ā tiṣṭhati ratham indrasya sakhā vidvāṃ enā sumatiṃ yāty accha RVa sa no deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarasa indrapānaḥ RVc kṛṇvann apo varṣayan dyām utemām uror ā no varivasyā punānaḥ RVa ajītaye hataye pavasva svastaye sarvatātaye bṛhate RVc tad uśanti viśva ime sakhāyas tad ahaṃ vaśmi pavamāna soma RVa somaḥ pavate janitā matīnāṃ janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ RVc janitāgner janitā sūryasya janitendrasya janitota viṣṇoḥ RVa brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣir viprāṇām mahiṣo mṛgāṇām RVc śyeno gṛdhrāṇāṃ svadhitir vanānāṃ somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan RVa prāvīvipad vāca ūrmiṃ na sindhur giraḥ somaḥ pavamāno manīṣāḥ RVc antaḥ paśyan vṛjanemāvarāṇy ā tiṣṭhati vṛṣabho goṣu jānan RVa sa matsaraḥ pṛtsu vanvann avātaḥ sahasraretā abhi vājam arṣa RVc indrāyendo pavamāno manīṣy aṃśor ūrmim īraya gā iṣaṇyan RVa pari priyaḥ kalaśe devavāta indrāya somo raṇyo madāya RVc sahasradhāraḥ śatavāja indur vājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti RVa sa pūrvyo vasuvij jāyamāno mṛjāno apsu duduhāno adrau RVc abhiśastipā bhuvanasya rājā vidad gātum brahmaṇe pūyamānaḥ RVa tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ RVc vanvann avātaḥ paridhīṃr aporṇu vīrebhir aśvair maghavā bhavā naḥ RVa yathāpavathā manave vayodhā amitrahā varivovid dhaviṣmān RVc evā pavasva draviṇaṃ dadhāna indre saṃ tiṣṭha janayāyudhāni RVa pavasva soma madhumāṃ ṛtāvāpo vasāno adhi sāno avye RVc ava droṇāni ghṛtavānti sīda madintamo matsara indrapānaḥ RVa vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ śatadhāraḥ pavasva sahasrasā vājayur devavītau RVc saṃ sindhubhiḥ kalaśe vāvaśānaḥ sam usriyābhiḥ pratiran na āyuḥ RVa eṣa sya somo matibhiḥ punāno tyo na vājī taratīd arātīḥ RVc payo na dugdham aditer iṣiram urv iva gātuḥ suyamo na voḷhā RVa svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamāno bhy arṣa guhyaṃ cāru nāma RVc abhi vājaṃ saptir iva śravasyābhi vāyum abhi gā deva soma RVa śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ haryatam mṛjanti śumbhanti vahnim maruto gaṇena RVc kavir gīrbhiḥ kāvyenā kaviḥ san somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan RVa ṛṣimanā ya ṛṣikṛt svarṣāḥ sahasraṇīthaḥ padavīḥ kavīnām RVc tṛtīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣaḥ siṣāsan somo virājam anu rājati ṣṭup RVa camūṣac chyenaḥ śakuno vibhṛtvā govindur drapsa āyudhāni bibhrat RVc apām ūrmiṃ sacamānaḥ samudraṃ turīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣo vivakti RVa maryo na śubhras tanvam mṛjāno tyo na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām RVc vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośam arṣan kanikradac camvor ā viveśa RVa pavasvendo pavamāno mahobhiḥ kanikradat pari vārāṇy arṣa RVc krīḷañ camvor ā viśa pūyamāna indraṃ te raso madiro mamattu RVa prāsya dhārā bṛhatīr asṛgrann akto gobhiḥ kalaśāṃ ā viveśa RVc sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyo vipaścit krandann ety abhi sakhyur na jāmim RVa apaghnann eṣi pavamāna śatrūn priyāṃ na jāro abhigīta induḥ RVc sīdan vaneṣu śakuno na patvā somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sattā RVa ā te rucaḥ pavamānasya soma yoṣeva yanti sudughāḥ sudhārāḥ RVc harir ānītaḥ puruvāro apsv acikradat kalaśe devayūnām RVa asya preṣā hemanā pūyamāno devo devebhiḥ sam apṛkta rasam RVc sutaḥ pavitram pary eti rebhan miteva sadma paśumānti hotā RVa bhadrā vastrā samanyā vasāno mahān kavir nivacanāni śaṃsan RVc ā vacyasva camvoḥ pūyamāno vicakṣaṇo jāgṛvir devavītau RVa sam u priyo mṛjyate sāno avye yaśastaro yaśasāṃ kṣaito asme RVc abhi svara dhanvā pūyamāno yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ RVa pra gāyatābhy arcāma devān somaṃ hinota mahate dhanāya RVc svāduḥ pavāte ati vāram avyam ā sīdāti kalaśaṃ devayur naḥ RVa indur devānām upa sakhyam āyan sahasradhāraḥ pavate madāya RVc nṛbhi stavāno anu dhāma pūrvam agann indram mahate saubhagāya RVa stotre rāye harir arṣā punāna indram mado gacchatu te bharāya RVc devair yāhi sarathaṃ rādho acchā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ RVa pra kāvyam uśaneva bruvāṇo devo devānāṃ janimā vivakti RVc mahivrataḥ śucibandhuḥ pāvakaḥ padā varāho abhy eti rebhan RVa pra haṃsāsas tṛpalam manyum acchāmād astaṃ vṛṣagaṇā ayāsuḥ RVc āṅgūṣyam pavamānaṃ sakhāyo durmarṣaṃ sākam pra vadanti vāṇam RVa sa raṃhata urugāyasya jūtiṃ vṛthā krīḷantam mimate na gāvaḥ RVc parīṇasaṃ kṛṇute tigmaśṛṅgo divā harir dadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ RVa indur vājī pavate gonyoghā indre somaḥ saha invan madāya RVc hanti rakṣo bādhate pary arātīr varivaḥ kṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā RVa adha dhārayā madhvā pṛcānas tiro roma pavate adridugdhaḥ RVc indur indrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇo devo devasya matsaro madāya RVa abhi priyāṇi pavate punāno devo devān svena rasena pṛñcan RVc indur dharmāṇy ṛtuthā vasāno daśa kṣipo avyata sāno avye RVa vṛṣā śoṇo abhikanikradad gā nadayann eti pṛthivīm uta dyām RVc indrasyeva vagnur ā śṛṇva ājau pracetayann arṣati vācam emām RVa rasāyyaḥ payasā pinvamāna īrayann eṣi madhumantam aṃśum RVc pavamānaḥ saṃtanim eṣi kṛṇvann indrāya soma pariṣicyamānaḥ RVa evā pavasva madiro madāyodagrābhasya namayan vadhasnaiḥ RVc pari varṇam bharamāṇo ruśantaṃ gavyur no arṣa pari soma siktaḥ RVa juṣṭvī na indo supathā sugāny urau pavasva varivāṃsi kṛṇvan RVc ghaneva viṣvag duritāni vighnann adhi ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye RVa vṛṣṭiṃ no arṣa divyāṃ jigatnum iḷāvatīṃ śaṅgayīṃ jīradānum RVc stukeva vītā dhanvā vicinvan bandhūṃr imāṃ avarāṃ indo vāyūn RVa granthiṃ na vi ṣya grathitam punāna ṛjuṃ ca gātuṃ vṛjinaṃ ca soma RVc atyo na krado harir ā sṛjāno maryo deva dhanva pastyāvān RVa juṣṭo madāya devatāta indo pari ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye RVc sahasradhāraḥ surabhir adabdhaḥ pari srava vājasātau nṛṣahye RVa araśmāno ye rathā ayuktā atyāso na sasṛjānāsa ājau RVc ete śukrāso dhanvanti somā devāsas tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai RVa evā na indo abhi devavītim pari srava nabho arṇaś camūṣu RVc somo asmabhyaṃ kāmyam bṛhantaṃ rayiṃ dadātu vīravantam ugram RVa takṣad yadī manaso venato vāg jyeṣṭhasya vā dharmaṇi kṣor anīke RVc ād īm āyan varam ā vāvaśānā juṣṭam patiṃ kalaśe gāva indum RVa pra dānudo divyo dānupinva ṛtam ṛtāya pavate sumedhāḥ RVc dharmā bhuvad vṛjanyasya rājā pra raśmibhir daśabhir bhāri bhūma RVa pavitrebhiḥ pavamāno nṛcakṣā rājā devānām uta martyānām RVc dvitā bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām ṛtam bharat subhṛtaṃ cārv induḥ RVa arvāṃ iva śravase sātim acchendrasya vāyor abhi vītim arṣa RVc sa naḥ sahasrā bṛhatīr iṣo dā bhavā soma draviṇovit punānaḥ RVa devāvyo naḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ kṣayaṃ suvīraṃ dhanvantu somāḥ RVc āyajyavaḥ sumatiṃ viśvavārā hotāro na diviyajo mandratamāḥ RVa evā deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase devapānaḥ RVc mahaś cid dhi ṣmasi hitāḥ samarye kṛdhi suṣṭhāne rodasī punānaḥ RVa aśvo no krado vṛṣabhir yujānaḥ siṃho na bhīmo manaso javīyān RVc arvācīnaiḥ pathibhir ye rajiṣṭhā ā pavasva saumanasaṃ na indo RVa śataṃ dhārā devajātā asṛgran sahasram enāḥ kavayo mṛjanti RVc indo sanitraṃ diva ā pavasva puraetāsi mahato dhanasya RVa divo na sargā asasṛgram ahnāṃ rājā na mitram pra mināti dhīraḥ RVc pitur na putraḥ kratubhir yatāna ā pavasva viśe asyā ajītim RVa pra te dhārā madhumatīr asṛgran vārān yat pūto atyeṣy avyān RVc pavamāna pavase dhāma gonāṃ jajñānaḥ sūryam apinvo arkaiḥ RVa kanikradad anu panthām ṛtasya śukro vi bhāsy amṛtasya dhāma RVc sa indrāya pavase matsaravān hinvāno vācam matibhiḥ kavīnām RVa divyaḥ suparṇo va cakṣi soma pinvan dhārāḥ karmaṇā devavītau RVc endo viśa kalaśaṃ somadhānaṃ krandann ihi sūryasyopa raśmim RVa tisro vāca īrayati pra vahnir ṛtasya dhītim brahmaṇo manīṣām RVc gāvo yanti gopatim pṛcchamānāḥ somaṃ yanti matayo vāvaśānāḥ RVa somaṃ gāvo dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ somaṃ viprā matibhiḥ pṛcchamānāḥ RVc somaḥ sutaḥ pūyate ajyamānaḥ some arkās triṣṭubhaḥ saṃ navante RVa evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāna ā pavasva pūyamānaḥ svasti RVc indram ā viśa bṛhatā raveṇa vardhayā vācaṃ janayā purandhim RVa ā jāgṛvir vipra ṛtā matīnāṃ somaḥ punāno asadac camūṣu RVc sapanti yam mithunāso nikāmā adhvaryavo rathirāsaḥ suhastāḥ RVa sa punāna upa sūre na dhātobhe aprā rodasī vi ṣa āvaḥ RVc priyā cid yasya priyasāsa ūtī sa tū dhanaṃ kāriṇe na pra yaṃsat RVa sa vardhitā vardhanaḥ pūyamānaḥ somo mīḍhvāṃ abhi no jyotiṣāvīt RVc yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñāḥ svarvido abhi gā adrim uṣṇan RVa akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharmañ janayan prajā bhuvanasya rājā RVc vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhat somo vāvṛdhe suvāna induḥ RVa mahat tat somo mahiṣaś cakārāpāṃ yad garbho vṛṇīta devān RVc adadhād indre pavamāna ojo janayat sūrye jyotir induḥ RVa matsi vāyum iṣṭaye rādhase ca matsi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ RVc matsi śardho mārutam matsi devān matsi dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma RVa ṛjuḥ pavasva vṛjinasya hantāpāmīvām bādhamāno mṛdhaś ca RVc abhiśrīṇan payaḥ payasābhi gonām indrasya tvaṃ tava vayaṃ sakhāyaḥ RVa madhvaḥ sūdam pavasva vasva utsaṃ vīraṃ ca na ā pavasvā bhagaṃ ca RVc svadasvendrāya pavamāna indo rayiṃ ca na ā pavasvā samudrāt RVa somaḥ suto dhārayātyo na hitvā sindhur na nimnam abhi vājy akṣāḥ RVc ā yoniṃ vanyam asadat punānaḥ sam indur gobhir asarat sam adbhiḥ RVa eṣa sya te pavata indra somaś camūṣu dhīra uśate tavasvān RVc svarcakṣā rathiraḥ satyaśuṣmaḥ kāmo na yo devayatām asarji RVa eṣa pratnena vayasā punānas tiro varpāṃsi duhitur dadhānaḥ RVc vasānaḥ śarma trivarūtham apsu hoteva yāti samaneṣu rebhan RVa nū nas tvaṃ rathiro deva soma pari srava camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ RVc apsu svādiṣṭho madhumāṃ ṛtāvā devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā RVa abhi vāyuṃ vīty arṣā gṛṇāno bhi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ RVc abhī naraṃ dhījavanaṃ ratheṣṭhām abhīndraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhum RVa abhi vastrā suvasanāny arṣābhi dhenūḥ sudughāḥ pūyamānaḥ RVc abhi candrā bhartave no hiraṇyābhy aśvān rathino deva soma RVa abhī no arṣa divyā vasūny abhi viśvā pārthivā pūyamānaḥ RVc abhi yena draviṇam aśnavāmābhy ārṣeyaṃ jamadagnivan naḥ RVa ayā pavā pavasvainā vasūni māṃścatva indo sarasi pra dhanva RVc bradhnaś cid atra vāto na jūtaḥ purumedhaś cit takave naraṃ dāt RVa uta na enā pavayā pavasvādhi śrute śravāyyasya tīrthe RVc ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā naiguto vasūni vṛkṣaṃ na pakvaṃ dhūnavad raṇāya RVa mahīme asya vṛṣanāma śūṣe māṃścatve vā pṛśane vā vadhatre RVc asvāpayan nigutaḥ snehayac cāpāmitrāṃ apācito acetaḥ RVa saṃ trī pavitrā vitatāny eṣy anv ekaṃ dhāvasi pūyamānaḥ RVc asi bhago asi dātrasya dātāsi maghavā maghavadbhya indo RVa eṣa viśvavit pavate manīṣī somo viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā RVc drapsāṃ īrayan vidatheṣv indur vi vāram avyaṃ samayāti yāti RVa induṃ rihanti mahiṣā adabdhāḥ pade rebhanti kavayo na gṛdhrāḥ RVc hinvanti dhīrā daśabhiḥ kṣipābhiḥ sam añjate rūpam apāṃ rasena RVa tvayā vayam pavamānena soma bhare kṛtaṃ vi cinuyāma śaśvat RVc tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ RVa abhi no vājasātamaṃ rayim arṣa puruspṛham RVc indo sahasrabharṇasaṃ tuvidyumnaṃ vibhvāsaham RVa pari ṣya suvāno avyayaṃ rathe na varmāvyata RVc indur abhi druṇā hito hiyāno dhārābhir akṣāḥ RVa pari ṣya suvāno akṣā indur avye madacyutaḥ RVc dhārā ya ūrdhvo adhvare bhrājā naiti gavyayuḥ RVa sa hi tvaṃ deva śaśvate vasu martāya dāśuṣe RVc indo sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ śatātmānaṃ vivāsasi RVa vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vaso vasvaḥ puruspṛhaḥ RVc ni nediṣṭhatamā iṣaḥ syāma sumnasyādhrigo RVa dvir yam pañca svayaśasaṃ svasāro adrisaṃhatam RVc priyam indrasya kāmyam prasnāpayanty ūrmiṇam RVa pari tyaṃ haryataṃ harim babhrum punanti vāreṇa RVc yo devān viśvāṃ it pari madena saha gacchati RVa asya vo hy avasā pānto dakṣasādhanam RVc yaḥ sūriṣu śravo bṛhad dadhe svar ṇa haryataḥ RVa sa vāṃ yajñeṣu mānavī indur janiṣṭa rodasī RVc devo devī giriṣṭhā asredhan taṃ tuviṣvaṇi RVa indrāya soma pātave vṛtraghne pari ṣicyase RVc nare ca dakṣiṇāvate devāya sadanāsade RVa te pratnāso vyuṣṭiṣu somāḥ pavitre akṣaran RVc apaprothantaḥ sanutar huraścitaḥ prātas tāṃ apracetasaḥ RVa taṃ sakhāyaḥ purorucaṃ yūyaṃ vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ RVc aśyāma vājagandhyaṃ sanema vājapastyam RVa ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave dhanus tanvanti pauṃsyam RVc śukrāṃ vayanty asurāya nirṇijaṃ vipām agre mahīyuvaḥ RVa adha kṣapā pariṣkṛto vājāṃ abhi pra gāhate RVc yadī vivasvato dhiyo hariṃ hinvanti yātave RVa tam asya marjayāmasi mado ya indrapātamaḥ RVc yaṃ gāva āsabhir dadhuḥ purā nūnaṃ ca sūrayaḥ RVa taṃ gāthayā purāṇyā punānam abhy anūṣata RVc uto kṛpanta dhītayo devānāṃ nāma bibhratīḥ RVa tam ukṣamāṇam avyaye vāre punanti dharṇasim RVc dūtaṃ na pūrvacittaya ā śāsate manīṣiṇaḥ RVa sa punāno madintamaḥ somaś camūṣu sīdati RVc paśau na reta ādadhat patir vacasyate dhiyaḥ RVa sa mṛjyate sukarmabhir devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ RVc vide yad āsu saṃdadir mahīr apo vi gāhate RVa suta indo pavitra ā nṛbhir yato vi nīyase RVc indrāya matsarintamaś camūṣv ā ni ṣīdasi RVa abhī navante adruhaḥ priyam indrasya kāmyam RVc vatsaṃ na pūrva āyuni jātaṃ rihanti mātaraḥ RVa punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim RVc tvaṃ vasūni puṣyasi viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe RVa tvaṃ dhiyam manoyujaṃ sṛjā vṛṣṭiṃ na tanyatuḥ RVc tvaṃ vasūni pārthivā divyā ca soma puṣyasi RVa pari te jigyuṣo yathā dhārā sutasya dhāvati RVc raṃhamāṇā vy avyayaṃ vāraṃ vājīva sānasiḥ RVa kratve dakṣāya naḥ kave pavasva soma dhārayā RVc indrāya pātave suto mitrāya varuṇāya ca RVa pavasva vājasātamaḥ pavitre dhārayā sutaḥ RVc indrāya soma viṣṇave devebhyo madhumattamaḥ RVa tvāṃ rihanti mātaro harim pavitre adruhaḥ RVc vatsaṃ jātaṃ na dhenavaḥ pavamāna vidharmaṇi RVa pavamāna mahi śravaś citrebhir yāsi raśmibhiḥ RVc śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe RVa tvaṃ dyāṃ ca mahivrata pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe RVc prati drāpim amuñcathāḥ pavamāna mahitvanā RVa purojitī vo andhasaḥ sutāya mādayitnave RVc apa śvānaṃ śnathiṣṭana sakhāyo dīrghajihvyam RVa yo dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ RVc indur aśvo na kṛtvyaḥ RVa taṃ duroṣam abhī naraḥ somaṃ viśvācyā dhiyā RVc yajñaṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ RVa sutāso madhumattamāḥ somā indrāya mandinaḥ RVc pavitravanto akṣaran devān gacchantu vo madāḥ RVa indur indrāya pavata iti devāso abruvan RVc vācas patir makhasyate viśvasyeśāna ojasā RVa sahasradhāraḥ pavate samudro vācamīṅkhayaḥ RVc somaḥ patī rayīṇāṃ sakhendrasya divedive RVa ayam pūṣā rayir bhagaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati RVc patir viśvasya bhūmano vy akhyad rodasī ubhe RVa sam u priyā anūṣata gāvo madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ RVc somāsaḥ kṛṇvate pathaḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ RVa ya ojiṣṭhas tam ā bhara pavamāna śravāyyam RVc yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīr abhi rayiṃ yena vanāmahai RVa somāḥ pavanta indavo smabhyaṃ gātuvittamāḥ RVc mitrāḥ suvānā arepasaḥ svādhyaḥ svarvidaḥ RVa suṣvāṇāso vy adribhiś citānā gor adhi tvaci RVc iṣam asmabhyam abhitaḥ sam asvaran vasuvidaḥ RVa ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ RVc sūryāso na darśatāso jigatnavo dhruvā ghṛte RVa pra sunvānasyāndhaso marto na vṛta tad vacaḥ RVc apa śvānam arādhasaṃ hatā makhaṃ na bhṛgavaḥ RVa ā jāmir atke avyata bhuje na putra oṇyoḥ RVc saraj jāro na yoṣaṇāṃ varo na yonim āsadam RVa sa vīro dakṣasādhano vi yas tastambha rodasī RVc hariḥ pavitre avyata vedhā na yonim āsadam RVa avyo vārebhiḥ pavate somo gavye adhi tvaci RVc kanikradad vṛṣā harir indrasyābhy eti niṣkṛtam RVa krāṇā śiśur mahīnāṃ hinvann ṛtasya dīdhitim RVc viśvā pari priyā bhuvad adha dvitā RVa upa tritasya pāṣyor abhakta yad guhā padam RVc yajñasya sapta dhāmabhir adha priyam RVa trīṇi tritasya dhārayā pṛṣṭheṣv erayā rayim RVc mimīte asya yojanā vi sukratuḥ RVa jajñānaṃ sapta mātaro vedhām aśāsata śriye RVc ayaṃ dhruvo rayīṇāṃ ciketa yat RVa asya vrate sajoṣaso viśve devāso adruhaḥ RVc spārhā bhavanti rantayo juṣanta yat RVa yam ī garbham ṛtāvṛdho dṛśe cārum ajījanan RVc kavim maṃhiṣṭham adhvare puruspṛham RVa samīcīne abhi tmanā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā RVc tanvānā yajñam ānuṣag yad añjate RVa kratvā śukrebhir akṣabhir ṛṇor apa vrajaṃ divaḥ RVc hinvann ṛtasya dīdhitim prādhvare RVa pra punānāya vedhase somāya vaca udyatam RVc bhṛtiṃ na bharā matibhir jujoṣate RVa pari vārāṇy avyayā gobhir añjāno arṣati RVc trī ṣadhasthā punānaḥ kṛṇute hariḥ RVa pari kośam madhuścutam avyaye vāre arṣati RVc abhi vāṇīr ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta nūṣata RVa pari ṇetā matīnāṃ viśvadevo adābhyaḥ RVc somaḥ punānaś camvor viśad dhariḥ RVa pari daivīr anu svadhā indreṇa yāhi saratham RVc punāno vāghad vāghadbhir amartyaḥ RVa pari saptir na vājayur devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ RVc vyānaśiḥ pavamāno vi dhāvati RVa sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata punānāya pra gāyata RVc śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye RVa sam ī vatsaṃ na mātṛbhiḥ sṛjatā gayasādhanam RVc devāvyam madam abhi dviśavasam RVa punātā dakṣasādhanaṃ yathā śardhāya vītaye RVc yathā mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ RVa asmabhyaṃ tvā vasuvidam abhi vāṇīr anūṣata RVc gobhiṣ ṭe varṇam abhi vāsayāmasi RVa sa no madānām pata indo devapsarā asi RVc sakheva sakhye gātuvittamo bhava RVa sanemi kṛdhy asmad ā rakṣasaṃ kaṃ cid atriṇam RVc apādevaṃ dvayum aṃho yuyodhi naḥ RVa taṃ vaḥ sakhāyo madāya punānam abhi gāyata RVc śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ RVa saṃ vatsa iva mātṛbhir indur hinvāno ajyate RVc devāvīr mado matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ RVa ayaṃ dakṣāya sādhano yaṃ śardhāya vītaye RVc ayaṃ devebhyo madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ RVa goman na indo aśvavat sutaḥ sudakṣa dhanva RVc śuciṃ te varṇam adhi goṣu dīdharam RVa sa no harīṇām pata indo devapsarastamaḥ RVc sakheva sakhye naryo ruce bhava RVa sanemi tvam asmad āṃ adevaṃ kaṃ cid atriṇam RVc sāhvāṃ indo pari bādho apa dvayum RVa indram accha sutā ime vṛṣaṇaṃ yantu harayaḥ RVc śruṣṭī jātāsa indavaḥ svarvidaḥ RVa ayam bharāya sānasir indrāya pavate sutaḥ RVc somo jaitrasya cetati yathā vide RVa asyed indro madeṣv ā grābhaṃ gṛbhṇīta sānasim RVc vajraṃ ca vṛṣaṇam bharat sam apsujit RVa pra dhanvā soma jāgṛvir indrāyendo pari srava RVc dyumantaṃ śuṣmam ā bharā svarvidam RVa indrāya vṛṣaṇam madam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ RVc sahasrayāmā pathikṛd vicakṣaṇaḥ RVa asmabhyaṃ gātuvittamo devebhyo madhumattamaḥ RVc sahasraṃ yāhi pathibhiḥ kanikradat RVa pavasva devavītaya indo dhārābhir ojasā RVc ā kalaśam madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ RVa tava drapsā udapruta indram madāya vāvṛdhuḥ RVc tvāṃ devāso amṛtāya kam papuḥ RVa ā naḥ sutāsa indavaḥ punānā dhāvatā rayim RVc vṛṣṭidyāvo rītyāpaḥ svarvidaḥ RVa somaḥ punāna ūrmiṇāvyo vāraṃ vi dhāvati RVc agre vācaḥ pavamānaḥ kanikradat RVa dhībhir hinvanti vājinaṃ vane krīḷantam atyavim RVc abhi tripṛṣṭham matayaḥ sam asvaran RVa asarji kalaśāṃ abhi mīḷhe saptir na vājayuḥ RVc punāno vācaṃ janayann asiṣyadat RVa pavate haryato harir ati hvarāṃsi raṃhyā RVc abhyarṣan stotṛbhyo vīravad yaśaḥ RVa ayā pavasva devayur madhor dhārā asṛkṣata RVc rebhan pavitram pary eṣi viśvataḥ RVa parīto ṣiñcatā sutaṃ somo ya uttamaṃ haviḥ RVc dadhanvāṃ yo naryo apsv antar ā suṣāva somam adribhiḥ RVa nūnam punāno vibhiḥ pari sravādabdhaḥ surabhintaraḥ RVc sute cit tvāpsu madāmo andhasā śrīṇanto gobhir uttaram RVa pari suvānaś cakṣase devamādanaḥ kratur indur vicakṣaṇaḥ RVa punānaḥ soma dhārayāpo vasāno arṣasi RVc ā ratnadhā yonim ṛtasya sīdasy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ RVa duhāna ūdhar divyam madhu priyam pratnaṃ sadhastham āsadat RVc āpṛcchyaṃ dharuṇaṃ vājy arṣati nṛbhir dhūto vicakṣaṇaḥ RVa punānaḥ soma jāgṛvir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ RVc tvaṃ vipro abhavo ṅgirastamo madhvā yajñam mimikṣa naḥ RVa somo mīḍhvān pavate gātuvittama ṛṣir vipro vicakṣaṇaḥ RVc tvaṃ kavir abhavo devavītama ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi RVa soma u ṣuvāṇaḥ sotṛbhir adhi ṣṇubhir avīnām RVc aśvayeva haritā yāti dhārayā mandrayā yāti dhārayā RVa anūpe gomān gobhir akṣāḥ somo dugdhābhir akṣāḥ RVc samudraṃ na saṃvaraṇāny agman mandī madāya tośate RVa ā soma suvāno adribhis tiro vārāṇy avyayā RVc jano na puri camvor viśad dhariḥ sado vaneṣu dadhiṣe RVa sa māmṛje tiro aṇvāni meṣyo mīḷhe saptir na vājayuḥ RVc anumādyaḥ pavamāno manīṣibhiḥ somo viprebhir ṛkvabhiḥ RVa pra soma devavītaye sindhur na pipye arṇasā RVc aṃśoḥ payasā madiro na jāgṛvir acchā kośam madhuścutam RVa ā haryato arjune atke avyata priyaḥ sūnur na marjyaḥ RVc tam īṃ hinvanty apaso yathā rathaṃ nadīṣv ā gabhastyoḥ RVa abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam RVc samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi manīṣiṇo matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ RVa tarat samudram pavamāna ūrmiṇā rājā deva ṛtam bṛhat RVc arṣan mitrasya varuṇasya dharmaṇā pra hinvāna ṛtam bṛhat RVa nṛbhir yemāno haryato vicakṣaṇo rājā devaḥ samudriyaḥ RVa indrāya pavate madaḥ somo marutvate sutaḥ RVc sahasradhāro aty avyam arṣati tam ī mṛjanty āyavaḥ RVa punānaś camū janayan matiṃ kaviḥ somo deveṣu raṇyati RVc apo vasānaḥ pari gobhir uttaraḥ sīdan vaneṣv avyata RVa tavāhaṃ soma rāraṇa sakhya indo divedive RVc purūṇi babhro ni caranti mām ava paridhīṃr ati tāṃ ihi RVa utāhaṃ naktam uta soma te divā sakhyāya babhra ūdhani RVc ghṛṇā tapantam ati sūryam paraḥ śakunā iva paptima RVa mṛjyamānaḥ suhastya samudre vācam invasi RVc rayim piśaṅgam bahulam puruspṛham pavamānābhy arṣasi RVa mṛjāno vāre pavamāno avyaye vṛṣāva cakrado vane RVc devānāṃ soma pavamāna niṣkṛtaṃ gobhir añjāno arṣasi RVa pavasva vājasātaye bhi viśvāni kāvyā RVc tvaṃ samudram prathamo vi dhārayo devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ RVa sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ rajo divyā ca soma dharmabhiḥ RVc tvāṃ viprāso matibhir vicakṣaṇa śubhraṃ hinvanti dhītibhiḥ RVa pavamānā asṛkṣata pavitram ati dhārayā RVc marutvanto matsarā indriyā hayā medhām abhi prayāṃsi ca RVa apo vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣatīndur hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ RVc janayañ jyotir mandanā avīvaśad gāḥ kṛṇvāno na nirṇijam RVa pavasva madhumattama indrāya soma kratuvittamo madaḥ RVc mahi dyukṣatamo madaḥ RVa yasya te pītvā vṛṣabho vṛṣāyate sya pītā svarvidaḥ RVc sa supraketo abhy akramīd iṣo cchā vājaṃ naitaśaḥ RVa tvaṃ hy aṅga daivyā pavamāna janimāni dyumattamaḥ RVc amṛtatvāya ghoṣayaḥ RVa yenā navagvo dadhyaṅṅ aporṇute yena viprāsa āpire RVc devānāṃ sumne amṛtasya cāruṇo yena śravāṃsy ānaśuḥ RVa eṣa sya dhārayā suto vyo vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ RVc krīḷann ūrmir apām iva RVa ya usriyā apyā antar aśmano nir gā akṛntad ojasā RVc abhi vrajaṃ tatniṣe gavyam aśvyaṃ varmīva dhṛṣṇav ā ruja RVa ā sotā pari ṣiñcatāśvaṃ na stomam apturaṃ rajasturam RVc vanakrakṣam udaprutam RVa sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabham payovṛdham priyaṃ devāya janmane RVc ṛtena ya ṛtajāto vivāvṛdhe rājā deva ṛtam bṛhat RVa abhi dyumnam bṛhad yaśa iṣas pate didīhi deva devayuḥ RVc vi kośam madhyamaṃ yuva RVa ā vacyasva sudakṣa camvoḥ suto viśāṃ vahnir na viśpatiḥ RVc vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pavasva rītim apāṃ jinvā gaviṣṭaye dhiyaḥ RVa etam u tyam madacyutaṃ sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ divo duhuḥ RVc viśvā vasūni bibhratam RVa vṛṣā vi jajñe janayann amartyaḥ pratapañ jyotiṣā tamaḥ RVc sa suṣṭutaḥ kavibhir nirṇijaṃ dadhe tridhātv asya daṃsasā RVa sa sunve yo vasūnāṃ yo rāyām ānetā ya iḷānām RVc somo yaḥ sukṣitīnām RVa yasya na indraḥ pibād yasya maruto yasya vāryamaṇā bhagaḥ RVc ā yena mitrāvaruṇā karāmaha endram avase mahe RVa indrāya soma pātave nṛbhir yataḥ svāyudho madintamaḥ RVc pavasva madhumattamaḥ RVa indrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa samudram iva sindhavaḥ RVc juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave divo viṣṭambha uttamaḥ RVa pari pra dhanvendrāya soma svādur mitrāya pūṣṇe bhagāya RVa indras te soma sutasya peyāḥ kratve dakṣāya viśve ca devāḥ RVa evāmṛtāya mahe kṣayāya sa śukro arṣa divyaḥ pīyūṣaḥ RVa pavasva soma mahān samudraḥ pitā devānāṃ viśvābhi dhāma RVa śukraḥ pavasva devebhyaḥ soma dive pṛthivyai śaṃ ca prajāyai RVa divo dhartāsi śukraḥ pīyūṣaḥ satye vidharman vājī pavasva RVa pavasva soma dyumnī sudhāro mahām avīnām anu pūrvyaḥ RVa nṛbhir yemāno jajñānaḥ pūtaḥ kṣarad viśvāni mandraḥ svarvit RVa induḥ punānaḥ prajām urāṇaḥ karad viśvāni draviṇāni naḥ RVa pavasva soma kratve dakṣāyāśvo na nikto vājī dhanāya RVa taṃ te sotāro rasam madāya punanti somam mahe dyumnāya RVa śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ harim mṛjanti pavitre somaṃ devebhya indum RVa induḥ paviṣṭa cārur madāyāpām upasthe kavir bhagāya RVa bibharti cārv indrasya nāma yena viśvāni vṛtrā jaghāna RVa pibanty asya viśve devāso gobhiḥ śrītasya nṛbhiḥ sutasya RVa pra suvāno akṣāḥ sahasradhāras tiraḥ pavitraṃ vi vāram avyam RVa sa vājy akṣāḥ sahasraretā adbhir mṛjāno gobhiḥ śrīṇānaḥ RVa pra soma yāhīndrasya kukṣā nṛbhir yemāno adribhiḥ sutaḥ RVa asarji vājī tiraḥ pavitram indrāya somaḥ sahasradhāraḥ RVa añjanty enam madhvo rasenendrāya vṛṣṇa indum madāya RVa devebhyas tvā vṛthā pājase po vasānaṃ harim mṛjanti RVa indur indrāya tośate ni tośate śrīṇann ugro riṇann apaḥ RVa pary ū ṣu pra dhanva vājasātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ RVc dviṣas taradhyā ṛṇayā na īyase RVa anu hi tvā sutaṃ soma madāmasi mahe samaryarājye RVc vājāṃ abhi pavamāna pra gāhase RVa ajījano hi pavamāna sūryaṃ vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ RVc gojīrayā raṃhamāṇaḥ purandhyā RVa ajījano amṛta martyeṣv āṃ ṛtasya dharmann amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ RVc sadāsaro vājam acchā saniṣyadat RVa abhyabhi hi śravasā tatardithotsaṃ na kaṃ cij janapānam akṣitam RVc śaryābhir na bharamāṇo gabhastyoḥ RVa ād īṃ ke cit paśyamānāsa āpyaṃ vasuruco divyā abhy anūṣata RVc vāraṃ na devaḥ savitā vy ūrṇute RVa tve soma prathamā vṛktabarhiṣo mahe vājāya śravase dhiyaṃ dadhuḥ RVc sa tvaṃ no vīra vīryāya codaya RVa divaḥ pīyūṣam pūrvyaṃ yad ukthyam maho gāhād diva ā nir adhukṣata RVc indram abhi jāyamānaṃ sam asvaran RVa adha yad ime pavamāna rodasī imā ca viśvā bhuvanābhi majmanā RVc yūthe na niṣṭhā vṛṣabho vi tiṣṭhase RVa somaḥ punāno avyaye vāre śiśur na krīḷan pavamāno akṣāḥ RVc sahasradhāraḥ śatavāja induḥ RVa eṣa punāno madhumāṃ ṛtāvendrāyenduḥ pavate svādur ūrmiḥ RVc vājasanir varivovid vayodhāḥ RVa sa pavasva sahamānaḥ pṛtanyūn sedhan rakṣāṃsy apa durgahāṇi RVc svāyudhaḥ sāsahvān soma śatrūn RVa ayā rucā hariṇyā punāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi tarati svayugvabhiḥ sūro na svayugvabhiḥ RVd dhārā sutasya rocate punāno aruṣo hariḥ RVf viśvā yad rūpā pariyāty ṛkvabhiḥ saptāsyebhir ṛkvabhiḥ RVa tvaṃ tyat paṇīnāṃ vido vasu sam mātṛbhir marjayasi sva ā dama ṛtasya dhītibhir dame RVd parāvato na sāma tad yatrā raṇanti dhītayaḥ RVf tridhātubhir aruṣībhir vayo dadhe rocamāno vayo dadhe RVa pūrvām anu pradiśaṃ yāti cekitat saṃ raśmibhir yatate darśato ratho daivyo darśato rathaḥ RVd agmann ukthāni pauṃsyendraṃ jaitrāya harṣayan RVf vajraś ca yad bhavatho anapacyutā samatsv anapacyutā RVa nānānaṃ vā u no dhiyo vi vratāni janānām RVc takṣā riṣṭaṃ rutam bhiṣag brahmā sunvantam icchatīndrāyendo pari srava RVa jaratībhir oṣadhībhiḥ parṇebhiḥ śakunānām RVc kārmāro aśmabhir dyubhir hiraṇyavantam icchatīndrāyendo pari srava RVa kārur ahaṃ tato bhiṣag upalaprakṣiṇī nanā RVc nānādhiyo vasūyavo nu gā iva tasthimendrāyendo pari srava RVa aśvo voḷhā sukhaṃ rathaṃ hasanām upamantriṇaḥ RVc śepo romaṇvantau bhedau vār in maṇḍūka icchatīndrāyendo
